17 #include "Context.h"

19 using namespace helios;
20 
21 Context::Context(void){
22 
23  //---- ALL DEFAULT VALUES ARE SET HERE ----//
24 
25  iscontextinitialized=1;
26 
27  sim_date = make_Date(1,6,2000);
28 
29  sim_time = make_Time(12,0);
30 
31  // --- Initialize random number generator ---- //
32 
33  unsigned seed = std::chrono::system_clock::now().time_since_epoch().count();
34  generator.seed(seed);
35 
36  // --- Set Geometry as `Clean' --- //
37 
38  isgeometrydirty = false;
39 
40  currentUUID = 0;
41 
42 }
43 
44 int Context::selfTest(void){
45 
46  std::cout << "Running Context self-test..." << std::flush;
47 
48  Context context_test;
49 
50  uint error_count=0;
51 
52  double errtol = 1e-7;
53 
54  std::string answer;
55 
56  //------- Add Patch --------//
57 
58  vec3 center,center_r;
59  vec2 size, size_r;
60  std::vector<vec3> vertices, vertices_r;
61  SphericalCoord rotation, rotation_r;
62  vec3 normal, normal_r;
63  RGBcolor color, color_r;
64  uint UUID;
65  std::vector<uint> UUIDs;
66  PrimitiveType type;
67  float area_r;
68  Primitive* prim;
69 
70  //uint addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size );
71  center = make_vec3(1,2,3);
72  size = make_vec2(1,2);
73  vertices.resize(4);
74  vertices.at(0) = center + make_vec3( -0.5f*size.x, -0.5f*size.y, 0.f);
75  vertices.at(1) = center + make_vec3( 0.5f*size.x, -0.5f*size.y, 0.f);
76  vertices.at(2) = center + make_vec3( 0.5f*size.x, 0.5f*size.y, 0.f);
77  vertices.at(3) = center + make_vec3( -0.5f*size.x, 0.5f*size.y, 0.f);
78  UUID = context_test.addPatch(center,size);
79  prim = context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUID);
80  type = prim->getType();
81  center_r = context_test.getPatchPointer(UUID)->getCenter();
82  size_r = context_test.getPatchPointer(UUID)->getSize();
83  normal_r = prim->getNormal();
84  vertices_r = prim->getVertices();
85  area_r = prim->getArea();
86  color_r = prim->getColor();
87 
88  if( type!=PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH ){
89  error_count++;
90  std::cerr << "failed: uint addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size ). Patch::getType did not return `PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH'." << std::endl;
91  }
92  if( center_r.x!=center.x || center_r.y!=center.y || center_r.z!=center.z ){
93  std::cerr << "failed: uint addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size ). Patch::getCenter returned incorrect value." << std::endl;
94  }
95  if( size_r.x!=size.x || size_r.y!=size.y ){
96  error_count++;
97  std::cerr << "failed: uint addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size ). Patch::getSize returned incorrect value." << std::endl;
98  }
99  if( normal_r.x!=0.f || normal_r.y!=0.f || normal_r.z!=1.f ){
100  error_count++;
101  std::cerr << "failed: uint addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size ). Patch::getNormal did not return correct value." << std::endl;
102  }
103  if( vertices.at(0).x!=vertices_r.at(0).x || vertices.at(0).y!=vertices_r.at(0).y || vertices.at(0).z!=vertices_r.at(0).z ||
104  vertices.at(1).x!=vertices_r.at(1).x || vertices.at(1).y!=vertices_r.at(1).y || vertices.at(1).z!=vertices_r.at(1).z ||
105  vertices.at(2).x!=vertices_r.at(2).x || vertices.at(2).y!=vertices_r.at(2).y || vertices.at(2).z!=vertices_r.at(2).z ||
106  vertices.at(3).x!=vertices_r.at(3).x || vertices.at(3).y!=vertices_r.at(3).y || vertices.at(3).z!=vertices_r.at(3).z ){
107  error_count++;
108  std::cerr << "failed: uint addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size ). Patch::getVertices did not return correct value." << std::endl;
109  }
110  if( fabs( area_r - size.x*size.y )>1e-5 ){
111  error_count++;
112  std::cerr << "failed: uint addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size ). Patch::getArea did not return correct value." << std::endl;
113  }
114  if( color_r.r!=0.f || color_r.g!=0.f || color_r.b!=0.f ){
115  error_count++;
116  std::cerr << "failed: uint addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size ). Patch::getColor did not return default color of black." << std::endl;
117  }
118 
119  if( prim->hasTexture() ){
120  error_count++;
121  std::cerr << "failed: Patch without texture mapping returned true for texture map test." << std::endl;
122  }
123 
124  //------- Copy Patch --------//
125 
126  uint UUID_cpy = context_test.copyPrimitive(UUID);
127 
128  vec3 center_cpy = context_test.getPatchPointer(UUID_cpy)->getCenter();
129  vec2 size_cpy = context_test.getPatchPointer(UUID_cpy)->getSize();
130 
131  if( UUID_cpy != 1 ){
132  error_count++;
133  std::cerr << "failed: copyPrimitive. Copied patch does not have the correct UUID." << std::endl;
134  }
135  if( center_cpy.x!=center.x || center_cpy.y!=center.y || center_cpy.z!=center.z ){
136  error_count++;
137  std::cerr << "failed: copyPrimitive. Copied patch did not return correct center coordinates." << std::endl;
138  }
139  if( size_cpy.x!=size.x || size_cpy.y!=size.y ){
140  error_count++;
141  std::cerr << "failed: copyPrimitive. Copied patch did not return correct size." << std::endl;
142  }
143 
144  //translate the copied patch
145  vec3 shift = make_vec3(5,4,3);
146  context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUID_cpy)->translate(shift);
147  center_cpy = context_test.getPatchPointer(UUID_cpy)->getCenter();
148  center_r = context_test.getPatchPointer(UUID)->getCenter();
149 
150  if( fabs(center_cpy.x-center.x-shift.x)>errtol || fabs(center_cpy.y-center.y-shift.y)>errtol || fabs(center_cpy.z-center.z-shift.z)>errtol || center_r.x!=center.x || center_r.y!=center.y || center_r.z!=center.z ){
151  error_count++;
152  std::cerr << "failed: copyPrimitive. Copied patch could not be properly translated." << std::endl;
153  }
154 
155  //------- Delete Patch --------//
156 
157  context_test.deletePrimitive(UUID);
158 
159  if( context_test.getPrimitiveCount()!= 1 ){
160  error_count++;
161  std::cerr << "failed: deletePrimitive. Patch not properly deleted based on primitive count." << std::endl;
162  }
163  if( context_test.doesPrimitiveExist(UUID) ){
164  error_count++;
165  std::cerr << "failed: deletePrimitive. Patch not properly deleted." << std::endl;
166  }
167 
168  UUID = UUID_cpy;
169 
170  //------- Add a Rotated Patch --------//
171 
172  center = make_vec3(1,2,3);
173  size = make_vec2(1,2);
174  rotation.elevation = 0.15*M_PI;
175  rotation.azimuth = 0.5f*M_PI;;
176  UUID = context_test.addPatch(center,size,rotation);
177  prim = context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUID);
178  normal_r = prim->getNormal();
179 
180  rotation_r = make_SphericalCoord( 0.5*M_PI-asinf( normal_r.z ), atan2(normal_r.x,normal_r.y) );
181 
182  context_test.deletePrimitive(UUID);
183 
184  if( fabs(rotation_r.elevation-rotation.elevation)>errtol || fabs(rotation_r.azimuth-rotation.azimuth)>errtol ){
185  error_count++;
186  std::cerr << "failed: Rotated patch did not return correct normal vector." << std::endl;
187  }
188 
189  //------- Add Triangle --------//
190 
191  vec3 v0,v0_r;
192  vec3 v1,v1_r;
193  vec3 v2,v2_r;
194 
195  //uint addTriangle( const vec3& v0, const vec3& v1, const vec3& v2, const RGBcolor &color );
196  v0 = make_vec3(1,2,3);
197  v1 = make_vec3(2,4,6);
198  v2 = make_vec3(3,6,5);
199  vertices.at(0) = v0;
200  vertices.at(1) = v1;
201  vertices.at(2) = v2;
202  color = RGB::red;
203  UUID = context_test.addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,color);
204 
205  prim = context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUID);
206  type = prim->getType();
207  normal_r = prim->getNormal();
208  vertices_r = prim->getVertices();
209  area_r = prim->getArea();
210  color_r = prim->getColor();
211 
212  if( type!=PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE ){
213  error_count++;
214  std::cerr << "failed: uint addTriangle(const vec3& v0, const vec3& v1, const vec3& v2, const RGBcolor &color ). Triangle::getType did not return `PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE'." << std::endl;
215  }
216  normal = cross( v1-v0, v2-v1 );
217  normal.normalize();
218  if( normal_r.x!=normal.x || normal_r.y!=normal.y || normal_r.z!=normal.z ){
219  error_count++;
220  std::cerr << "failed: uint addTriangle(const vec3& v0, const vec3& v1, const vec3& v2, const RGBcolor &color ). Triangle::getNormal did not return correct value." << std::endl;
221  }
222  if( vertices.at(0).x!=vertices_r.at(0).x || vertices.at(0).y!=vertices_r.at(0).y || vertices.at(0).z!=vertices_r.at(0).z ||
223  vertices.at(1).x!=vertices_r.at(1).x || vertices.at(1).y!=vertices_r.at(1).y || vertices.at(1).z!=vertices_r.at(1).z ||
224  vertices.at(2).x!=vertices_r.at(2).x || vertices.at(2).y!=vertices_r.at(2).y || vertices.at(2).z!=vertices_r.at(2).z ){
225  error_count++;
226  std::cerr << "failed: uint addTriangle(const vec3& v0, const vec3& v1, const vec3& v2, const RGBcolor &color ). Triangle::getVertices did not return correct value." << std::endl;
227  }
228  vec3 A(v1-v0);
229  vec3 B(v2-v0);
230  vec3 C(v2-v1);
231  float a = A.magnitude();
232  float b = B.magnitude();
233  float c = C.magnitude();
234  float s = 0.5f*( a+b+c );
235  if( area_r!=sqrtf(s*(s-a)*(s-b)*(s-c)) ){
236  error_count++;
237  std::cerr << "failed: uint addTriangle(const vec3& v0, const vec3& v1, const vec3& v2, const RGBcolor &color ). Triangle::getArea did not return correct value." << std::endl;
238  }
239  if( color_r.r!=color.r || color_r.g!=color.g || color_r.b!=color.b ){
240  error_count++;
241  std::cerr << "failed: uint addTriangle(const vec3& v0, const vec3& v1, const vec3& v2, const RGBcolor &color ). Triangle::getColor did not return correct color." << std::endl;
242  }
243 
244  if( prim->hasTexture() ){
245  error_count++;
246  std::cerr << "failed: Triangle without texture mapping returned true for texture map test." << std::endl;
247  }
248 
249  //------- Copy Triangle --------//
250 
251  UUID_cpy = context_test.copyPrimitive(UUID);
252 
253  std::vector<vec3> vertices_cpy = context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUID_cpy)->getVertices();
254 
255  if( vertices.at(0).x!=vertices_cpy.at(0).x || vertices.at(0).y!=vertices_cpy.at(0).y || vertices.at(0).z!=vertices_cpy.at(0).z ||
256  vertices.at(1).x!=vertices_cpy.at(1).x || vertices.at(1).y!=vertices_cpy.at(1).y || vertices.at(1).z!=vertices_cpy.at(1).z ||
257  vertices.at(2).x!=vertices_cpy.at(2).x || vertices.at(2).y!=vertices_cpy.at(2).y || vertices.at(2).z!=vertices_cpy.at(2).z ){
258  error_count++;
259  std::cerr << "failed: copied triangle did not return correct vertices." << std::endl;
260  }
261 
262  //translate the copied patch
263  shift = make_vec3(5,4,3);
264  context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUID_cpy)->translate(shift);
265 
266  vertices_cpy = context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUID_cpy)->getVertices();
267 
268  if( vertices.at(0).x!=(vertices_cpy.at(0).x-shift.x) || vertices.at(0).y!=(vertices_cpy.at(0).y-shift.y) || vertices.at(0).z!=(vertices_cpy.at(0).z-shift.z) ||
269  vertices.at(1).x!=(vertices_cpy.at(1).x-shift.x) || vertices.at(1).y!=(vertices_cpy.at(1).y-shift.y) || vertices.at(1).z!=(vertices_cpy.at(1).z-shift.z) ||
270  vertices.at(2).x!=(vertices_cpy.at(2).x-shift.x) || vertices.at(2).y!=(vertices_cpy.at(2).y-shift.y) || vertices.at(2).z!=(vertices_cpy.at(2).z-shift.z) ){
271  error_count++;
272  std::cerr << "failed: translated triangle did not return correct vertices." << std::endl;
273  }
274 
275  //------- Delete Patch --------//
276 
277  context_test.deletePrimitive(UUID);
278 
279  if( context_test.doesPrimitiveExist(UUID) ){
280  error_count++;
281  std::cerr << "failed: deletePrimitive. Triangle not properly deleted." << std::endl;
282  }
283 
284  UUID = UUID_cpy;
285 
286  //------- Add a Box --------//
287 
288  //vector<uint> addBox( const vec3& center, const vec2& size, const int3& subdiv );
289  center = make_vec3(1,2,3);
290  vec3 size3(3,2,1);
291  int3 subdiv(1,1,1);
292  UUIDs = context_test.addBox( center, size3, subdiv );
293 
294  normal_r = context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUIDs.at(0))->getNormal();
295  rotation_r = make_SphericalCoord( 0.5*M_PI-asinf( normal_r.z ), atan2(normal_r.x,normal_r.y) );
296 
297  if( fabs(rotation_r.zenith-0.f)>errtol || fabs(rotation_r.azimuth-0.f)>errtol ){
298  error_count++;
299  std::cerr << "failed: addBox(). Face normals incorrect." << std::endl;
300  }
301 
302  normal_r = context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUIDs.at(2))->getNormal();
303  rotation_r = make_SphericalCoord( 0.5*M_PI-asinf( normal_r.z ), atan2(normal_r.x,normal_r.y) );
304 
305  if( fabs(rotation_r.zenith-0.f)>errtol || fabs(rotation_r.azimuth-0.5f*M_PI)>errtol ){
306  error_count++;
307  std::cerr << "failed: addBox(). Face normals incorrect." << std::endl;
308  }
309 
310  size_r = context_test.getPatchPointer(UUIDs.at(0))->getSize();
311 
312  if( fabs(size_r.x-size3.x)>errtol || fabs(size_r.y-size3.z)>errtol ){
313  error_count++;
314  std::cerr << "failed: addBox(). Face sizes incorrect." << std::endl;
315  }
316 
317  size_r = context_test.getPatchPointer(UUIDs.at(2))->getSize();
318 
319  if( fabs(size_r.x-size3.y)>errtol || fabs(size_r.y-size3.z)>errtol ){
320  error_count++;
321  std::cerr << "failed: addBox(). Face sizes incorrect." << std::endl;
322  }
323 
324  //------- Add a Rotated Tile --------//
325 
326  center = make_vec3(1,2,3);
327  size = make_vec2(3,2);
328  int2 subdiv2(3,3);
329  rotation = make_SphericalCoord( 0.25*M_PI, 1.4*M_PI );
330  UUIDs = context_test.addTile( center, size, rotation, subdiv2 );
331 
332  for( int p=0; p<UUIDs.size(); p++ ){
333 
334  normal_r = context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUIDs.at(p))->getNormal();
335 
336  rotation_r = cart2sphere(normal_r);
337 
338  if( fabs(rotation_r.zenith-rotation.zenith)>errtol || fabs(rotation_r.azimuth-rotation.azimuth)>errtol ){
339  error_count++;
340  std::cerr << "failed: addTile(). Sub-patch normals incorrect." << std::endl;
341  break;
342  }
343 
344  }
345 
346  //------- Add a Textured Tile with Transparency (disk) --------//
347 
348  center = make_vec3(1,2,3);
349  size = make_vec2(3,2);
350  subdiv2 = make_int2(5,5);
351  rotation = make_SphericalCoord( 0.1*M_PI, 2.4*M_PI );
352  UUIDs = context_test.addTile( center, size, rotation, subdiv2, "lib/images/disk_texture.png" );
353 
354  float At = 0;
355  for( int p=0; p<UUIDs.size(); p++ ){
356 
357  float area = context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUIDs.at(p))->getArea();
358 
359  At+=area;
360 
361  }
362 
363  float area_exact = 0.25*M_PI*size.x*size.y;
364 
365  if( fabs(At-area_exact)>0.005 ){
366  error_count++;
367  std::cerr << "failed: addTile(). Texture masked area is incorrect." << std::endl;
368  std::cout << At << " " << area_exact << std::endl;
369  }
370 
371  //------- Primitive Transformations --------//
372 
373  vec2 sz_0(0.5,3.f);
374  float A_0 = sz_0.x*sz_0.y;
375 
376  float scale = 2.6f;
377 
378  UUID = context_test.addPatch( make_vec3(0,0,0), sz_0 );
379  context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUID)->scale( make_vec3(scale,scale,scale) );
380 
381  float A_1 = context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUID)->getArea();
382 
383  if( fabs( A_1 - scale*scale*A_0 )>1e-5 ){
384  error_count ++;
385  std::cerr << "failed: Patch scaling - scaled area not correct." << std::endl;
386  }
387 
388  //------- Primitive Data --------//
389 
390  float data = 5;
391  context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUID)->setPrimitiveData("some_data",HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT,1,&data);
392 
393  if( !context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUID)->doesPrimitiveDataExist("some_data") ){
394  error_count ++;
395  std::cerr << "failed: setPrimitiveData - data was added but was not actually created." << std::endl;
396  }
397 
398  float data_return;
399  context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUID)->getPrimitiveData("some_data", data_return);
400  if( data_return!=data ){
401  error_count ++;
402  std::cerr << "failed: set/getPrimitiveData (setting/getting through primitive). Get data did not match set data." << std::endl;
403  std::cout << data_return << std::endl;
404  }
405 
406  context_test.setPrimitiveData(UUID,"some_data",HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT,1,&data);
407  context_test.getPrimitiveData(UUID,"some_data",data_return);
408  if( data_return!=data ){
409  error_count ++;
410  std::cerr << "failed: set/getPrimitiveData (setting/getting through Context). Get data did not match set data." << std::endl;
411  std::cout << data_return << std::endl;
412  }
413 
414  std::vector<float> data_v;
415  for( uint i=0; i<5; i++ ){
416  data_v.push_back(i);
417  }
418  context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUID)->setPrimitiveData("some_data",HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT,5,&data_v[0] );
419 
420  std::vector<float> data_return_v;
421  context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUID)->getPrimitiveData("some_data", data_return_v);
422  for( uint i=0; i<5; i++ ){
423  if( data_return_v.at(i)!=data_v.at(i) ){
424  error_count ++;
425  std::cerr << "failed: set/getPrimitiveData (setting/getting through primitive). Get data did not match set data." << std::endl;
426  std::cout << data_return << std::endl;
427  break;
428  }
429  }
430 
431  data = 10;
432  context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUID)->setPrimitiveData("some_data_2",data);
433 
434  if( !context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUID)->doesPrimitiveDataExist("some_data_2") ){
435  error_count ++;
436  std::cerr << "failed: setPrimitiveData - data was added but was not actually created." << std::endl;
437  }
438 
439  context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUID)->getPrimitiveData("some_data_2", data_return);
440  if( data_return!=data ){
441  error_count ++;
442  std::cerr << "failed: set/getPrimitiveData (setting/getting scalar data). Get data did not match set data." << std::endl;
443  std::cout << data_return << std::endl;
444  }
445 
446  //------- Textures --------- //
447 
448  vec2 sizep = make_vec2(2,3);
449 
450  const char* texture = "lib/images/disk_texture.png";
451 
452  vec2 uv0(0,0);
453  vec2 uv1(1,0);
454  vec2 uv2(1,1);
455  vec2 uv3(0,1);
456 
457  uint UUIDp = context_test.addPatch( make_vec3(2,3,4), sizep, make_SphericalCoord(0,0), texture, 0.5*(uv2+uv0), uv2-uv0 );
458 
459  if( !context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUIDp)->hasTexture() ){
460  error_count ++;
461  std::cerr << "failed: Texture-mapped patch was found not to have texture." << std::endl;
462  }
463 
464  std::string texture2 = context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUIDp)->getTextureFile();
465 
466  if( texture2.compare(texture)!=0 ){
467  error_count ++;
468  std::cerr << "failed: textures - queried texture file does not match that provided when adding primitive." << std::endl;
469  }
470 
471  float Ap = context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUIDp)->getArea();
472 
473  if( fabs(Ap-0.25f*M_PI*sizep.x*sizep.y)/(0.25f*M_PI*sizep.x*sizep.y)>0.01f ){
474  error_count ++;
475  std::cerr << "failed: Texture-masked patch does not have correct area." << std::endl;
476  }
477 
478  std::vector<vec2> uv;
479  uv = context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUIDp)->getTextureUV();
480 
481  if( uv.size()!=4 ){
482  error_count ++;
483  std::cerr << "failed: Texture (u,v) coordinates for patch should have length of 4." << std::endl;
484  }
485  if( uv.at(0).x!=uv0.x || uv.at(0).y!=uv0.y || uv.at(1).x!=uv1.x || uv.at(1).y!=uv1.y || uv.at(2).x!=uv2.x || uv.at(2).y!=uv2.y || uv.at(3).x!=uv3.x || uv.at(3).y!=uv3.y ){
486  error_count ++;
487  std::cerr << "failed: Queried texture (u,v) coordinates do not match that provided when adding primitive." << std::endl;
488  }
489 
490  uv0 = make_vec2( 0.25, 0.25 );
491  uv1 = make_vec2( 0.75, 0.25 );
492  uv2 = make_vec2( 0.75, 0.75 );
493  uv3 = make_vec2( 0.25, 0.75 );
494 
495  uint UUIDp2 = context_test.addPatch( make_vec3(2,3,4), sizep, make_SphericalCoord(0,0), texture, 0.5*(uv2+uv0), uv2-uv0 );
496 
497  float area = context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUIDp2)->getArea();
498 
499  if( fabs(area-sizep.x*sizep.y)>0.001f ){
500  error_count ++;
501  std::cerr << "failed: Patch masked with (u,v) coordinates did not return correct area." << std::endl;
502  }
503 
504  uv0 = make_vec2( 0, 0 );
505  uv1 = make_vec2( 1, 1 );
506  uv2 = make_vec2( 0, 1 );
507 
508  uint UUIDp3 = context_test.addTriangle( make_vec3(2,3,4), make_vec3(2,3+sizep.y,4), make_vec3(2+sizep.x,3+sizep.y,4), texture, uv0, uv1, uv2 );
509 
510  area = context_test.getPrimitivePointer(UUIDp3)->getArea();
511 
512  if( fabs(area-0.5*0.25f*M_PI*sizep.x*sizep.y)>0.01f ){
513  error_count ++;
514  std::cerr << "failed: Triangle masked with (u,v) coordinates did not return correct area." << std::endl;
515  }
516 
517  //------- Global Data --------//
518 
519  float gdata = 5;
520  context_test.setGlobalData("some_data",HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT,1,&gdata);
521 
522  if( !context_test.doesGlobalDataExist("some_data") ){
523  error_count ++;
524  std::cerr << "failed: setGlobalData - data was added but was not actually created." << std::endl;
525  }
526 
527  float gdata_return;
528  context_test.getGlobalData("some_data", gdata_return);
529  if( gdata_return!=gdata ){
530  error_count ++;
531  std::cerr << "failed: set/getGlobalData (setting/getting through primitive). Get data did not match set data." << std::endl;
532  }
533 
534  std::vector<float> gdata_v;
535  for( uint i=0; i<5; i++ ){
536  gdata_v.push_back(i);
537  }
538  context_test.setGlobalData("some_data",HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT,5,&gdata_v[0] );
539 
540  std::vector<float> gdata_return_v;
541  context_test.getGlobalData("some_data", gdata_return_v);
542  for( uint i=0; i<5; i++ ){
543  if( gdata_return_v.at(i)!=gdata_v.at(i) ){
544  error_count ++;
545  std::cerr << "failed: set/getGlobalData (setting/getting vector data). Get data did not match set data." << std::endl;
546  break;
547  }
548  }
549 
550  gdata = 10;
551  context_test.setGlobalData("some_data_2",gdata);
552 
553  if( !context_test.doesGlobalDataExist("some_data_2") ){
554  error_count ++;
555  std::cerr << "failed: setGlobalData - data was added but was not actually created." << std::endl;
556  }
557 
558  context_test.getGlobalData("some_data_2", gdata_return);
559  if( gdata_return!=gdata ){
560  error_count ++;
561  std::cerr << "failed: set/getGlobalData (setting/getting scalar data). Get data did not match set data." << std::endl;
562  }
563 
564 
565 
566  //------- Cartesian/Spherical Coordinate Conversion --------//
567 
568  SphericalCoord sph1 = make_SphericalCoord(1.f,0.25*M_PI,1.5*M_PI);
569  vec3 cart = sphere2cart(sph1);
570  SphericalCoord sph2 = cart2sphere(cart);
571 
572  if( fabs(sph1.radius-sph2.radius)>errtol || fabs(sph1.elevation-sph2.elevation)>errtol || fabs(sph1.zenith-sph2.zenith)>errtol || fabs(sph1.azimuth-sph2.azimuth)>errtol ){
573  std::cerr << "failed: cart2sphere and sphere2cart are not inverses." << std::endl;
574  error_count++;
575  }
576 
577  //------- Julian Day Conversion ---------//
578 
579  int JulianDay = 10;
580  int year = 2000; //leap year
581 
582  Date date = Julian2Calendar(JulianDay,year);
583  if( date.year!=year || date.month!=1 || date.day!=JulianDay ){
584  std::cerr << "failed: Julian2Calendar conversion #1 incorrect." << std::endl;
585  error_count++;
586  }
587 
588  JulianDay = 230;
589  date = Julian2Calendar(JulianDay,year);
590  if( date.year!=year || date.month!=8 || date.day!=17 ){
591  std::cerr << "failed: Julian2Calendar conversion #2 incorrect." << std::endl;
592  error_count++;
593  }
594 
595  year = 2001; //non-leap year
596  date = Julian2Calendar(JulianDay,year);
597  if( date.year!=year || date.month!=8 || date.day!=18 ){
598  std::cerr << "failed: Julian2Calendar conversion #3 incorrect." << std::endl;
599  error_count++;
600  }
601 
602  //-------- Timeseries -----------//
603 
604  Context context_ts;
605 
606  Date date_ts( 12, 3, 2010 );
607  context_ts.setDate( date_ts );
608 
609  Time time_ts( 13, 15, 39 );
610  context_ts.setTime( time_ts );
611 
612  float T0 = 302.3;
613  float T1 = 305.3;
614  Time time0_ts = time_ts;
615  Time time1_ts = make_Time( time_ts.hour, 49, 14 );
616 
617  context_ts.addTimeseriesData( "timeseries", T0, date_ts, time0_ts );
618  context_ts.addTimeseriesData( "timeseries", T1, date_ts, time1_ts );
619 
620  context_ts.setCurrentTimeseriesPoint( "timeseries", 0 );
621 
622  if( context_ts.getTimeseriesLength( "timeseries" )!=2 ){
623  std::cerr << "failed. getTimeseriesLength() did not give correct length." << std::endl;
624  error_count++;
625  }
626 
627  Date d = context_ts.queryTimeseriesDate( "timeseries", 0 );
628 
629  if( d.year!=date_ts.year || d.month!=date_ts.month || d.day!=date_ts.day ){
630  std::cerr << "failed. Set/query timeseries date do not match." << std::endl;
631  error_count++;
632  }
633 
634  d = context_ts.queryTimeseriesDate( "timeseries", 1 );
635 
636  if( d.year!=date_ts.year || d.month!=date_ts.month || d.day!=date_ts.day ){
637  std::cerr << "failed. Set/query timeseries date do not match." << std::endl;
638  error_count++;
639  }
640 
641  Time t = context_ts.queryTimeseriesTime( "timeseries", 0 );
642 
643  if( t.hour!=time0_ts.hour || t.minute!=time0_ts.minute || t.second!=time0_ts.second ){
644  std::cerr << "failed. Set/query timeseries time do not match." << std::endl;
645  error_count++;
646  }
647 
648  t = context_ts.queryTimeseriesTime( "timeseries", 1 );
649 
650  if( t.hour!=time1_ts.hour || t.minute!=time1_ts.minute || t.second!=time1_ts.second ){
651  std::cerr << "failed. Set/query timeseries time do not match." << std::endl;
652  error_count++;
653  }
654 
655  float T_ts = context_ts.queryTimeseriesData( "timeseries", 0 );
656 
657  if( T_ts!=T0 ){
658  std::cerr << "failed: Timeseries set/query data #0 do not match." << std::endl;
659  error_count++;
660  }
661 
662  T_ts = context_ts.queryTimeseriesData( "timeseries", 1 );
663 
664  if( T_ts!=T1 ){
665  std::cerr << "failed: Timeseries set/query data #1 do not match." << std::endl;
666  error_count++;
667  }
668 
669  T_ts = context_ts.queryTimeseriesData( "timeseries", date_ts, time0_ts );
670 
671  if( T_ts!=T0 ){
672  std::cerr << "failed: Timeseries set/query data #0 do not match." << std::endl;
673  error_count++;
674  }
675 
676  T_ts = context_ts.queryTimeseriesData( "timeseries", date_ts, time1_ts );
677 
678  if( T_ts!=T1 ){
679  std::cerr << "failed: Timeseries set/query data #1 do not match." << std::endl;
680  error_count++;
681  }
682 
683  //context_ts.queryTimeseriesData( "timeseries", date_ts, make_Time(0,0,0) ); //this is to test that querying outside of dataset does not throw a segmentation fault.
684 
685  context_ts.queryTimeseriesData( "timeseries", date_ts, make_Time(time0_ts.hour,time0_ts.minute,time0_ts.second+10) );
686 
687  //------- XML I/O --------//
688 
689  Context context_io;
690 
691  RGBcolor color_io = RGB::red;
692 
693  //date/time
694 
695  Date date_io( 12, 3, 2010 );
696  context_io.setDate( date_io );
697 
698  Time time_io( 13, 15, 0 );
699  context_io.setTime( time_io );
700 
701  //patch
702 
703  vec3 p_io(2,3,5);
704  vec2 size_io(3,2);
705  SphericalCoord rot_io(1,0.3*M_PI,0.4*M_PI);
706 
707  uint UUIDp_io = context_io.addPatch( p_io, size_io, rot_io, color_io );
708 
709  int pdatai_p = 4;
710  float pdataf_p = 7.2;
711  context_io.setPrimitiveData( UUIDp_io, "pdatai", pdatai_p );
712  context_io.setPrimitiveData( UUIDp_io, "pdataf", pdataf_p );
713 
714  //triangle
715 
716  vec3 v0_io(2,3,5);
717  vec3 v1_io(5,1,2);
718  vec3 v2_io(8,4,6);
719 
720  uint UUIDt_io = context_io.addTriangle( v0_io, v1_io, v2_io, color_io );
721 
722  int pdatai_t = 9;
723  float pdataf_t = 2.7;
724  context_io.setPrimitiveData( UUIDt_io, "pdatai", pdatai_t );
725  context_io.setPrimitiveData( UUIDt_io, "pdataf", pdataf_t );
726 
727  //global data
728 
729  std::vector<double> gdatad_io;
730  gdatad_io.push_back( 9.432 );
731  gdatad_io.push_back( 2939.9292 );
732  context_io.setGlobalData( "gdatad", HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE, gdatad_io.size(), &gdatad_io[0] );
733 
734  //timeseries
735 
736  float T0_io = 302.3;
737  float T1_io = 305.3;
738  Time time0_io = time_io;
739  Time time1_io = make_Time( time_io.hour, 30, 0 );
740 
741  context_io.addTimeseriesData( "ts_io", T0_io, date_io, time0_io );
742  context_io.addTimeseriesData( "ts_io", T1_io, date_io, time1_io );
743 
744  context_io.writeXML( "xmltest_io.xml" );
745 
746  Context context_oi;
747 
748  context_oi.loadXML( "xmltest_io.xml" );
749 
750  float pdataf;
751  int pdatai;
752 
753  context_oi.getPrimitiveData(0,"pdataf",pdataf);
754  context_oi.getPrimitiveData(0,"pdatai",pdatai);
755 
756  if( pdataf!=pdataf_p || pdatai!=pdatai_p ){
757  std::cerr << "failed. Patch primitive data write/read do not match." << std::endl;
758  error_count ++;
759  }
760 
761  std::vector<double> gdatad;
762  context_oi.getGlobalData("gdatad",gdatad);
763 
764  bool failio = false;
765  if( gdatad_io.size() != gdatad.size() ){
766  failio = true;
767  }
768  for( int i=0; i<gdatad_io.size(); i++ ){
769  if( fabs(gdatad.at(i)-gdatad_io.at(i))>1e-3 ){
770  failio = true;
771  }
772  }
773  if( failio ){
774  std::cerr << "failed. Global data write/read do not match." << std::endl;
775  error_count ++;
776  }
777 
778  //-------------------------------------------//
779 
780  if( error_count==0 ){
781  std::cout << "passed." << std::endl;
782  return 0;
783  }else{
784  return 1;
785  }
786 
787 }
788 
789 Texture* Context::addTexture( const char* texture_file ){
790  if( textures.find(texture_file)==textures.end() ){//texture has not already been added
791  Texture text( texture_file );
792  textures[ texture_file ] = text;
793  }
794  return &textures.at(texture_file);
795 }
796 
797 Texture::Texture( const char* texture_file ){
798  filename = texture_file;
799 
800  //------ determine if transparency channel exists ---------//
801 
802  //check if texture file has extension ".png"
803  std::string ext;
804  for( int i=filename.size()-4; i<filename.size(); i++ ){
805  ext.push_back(filename.at(i));
806  }
807  if( ext.compare(".png")!=0 ){
808  hastransparencychannel = false;
809  }else{
810  hastransparencychannel = PNGHasAlpha( filename.c_str() );
811  }
812 
813  //-------- load transparency channel (if exists) ------------//
814 
815  if( hastransparencychannel ){
816  transparencydata = readPNGAlpha( filename.c_str() );
817  }
818 
819  //-------- determine solid fraction --------------//
820 
821  if( hastransparencychannel ){
822  size_t p = 0.f;
823  for( uint j=0; j<transparencydata.size(); j++ ){
824  for( uint i=0; i<transparencydata.at(j).size(); i++ ){
825  if( transparencydata.at(j).at(i) ){
826  p += 1;
827  }
828  }
829  }
830  float sf = float(p)/float(transparencydata.size()*transparencydata.front().size());
831  if( sf!=sf ){
832  sf = 0.f;
833  }
834  solidfraction = sf;
835  }else{
836  solidfraction = 1.f;
837  }
838 
839 
840 }
841 
842 std::string Texture::getTextureFile( void ) const{
843  return filename;
844 }
845 
846 helios::int2 Texture::getSize( void )const {
847  return make_int2(transparencydata.front().size(),transparencydata.size());
848 }
849 
850 bool Texture::hasTransparencyChannel( void ) const{
851  return hastransparencychannel;
852 }
853 
854 std::vector<std::vector<bool> >* Texture::getTransparencyData( void ){
855  return &transparencydata;
856 }
857 
858 float Texture::getSolidFraction( void ) const{
859  return solidfraction;
860 }
861 
862 void Context::markGeometryClean(void){
863  isgeometrydirty = false;
864 }
865 
866 void Context::markGeometryDirty(void){
867  isgeometrydirty = true;
868 }
869 
870 bool Context::isGeometryDirty(void){
871  return isgeometrydirty;
872 }

874 uint Primitive::getUUID() const{
875  return UUID;

878 PrimitiveType Primitive::getType() const{
879  return prim_type;
880 }
881 
882 void Primitive::getTransformationMatrix( float (&T)[16] )const {
883  for( int i=0; i<16; i++ ){
884  T[i]=transform[i];
885  }
886 }
887 
888 void Primitive::setTransformationMatrix( float (&T)[16] ){
889  for( int i=0; i<16; i++ ){
890  transform[i] = T[i];
891  }
892 }
893 
894 float Patch::getArea() const{
895 
896  vec2 size = getSize();
897 
898  float area = size.x*size.y*solid_fraction;
899 
900  return area;
901 
902 }
903 
904 float Triangle::getArea() const{
905 
906  std::vector<vec3> vertices = getVertices();
907 
908  float area = calculateTriangleArea( vertices.at(0), vertices.at(1), vertices.at(2) );
909  area = area*solid_fraction;
910 
911  return area;
912 }
913 
914 float Voxel::getArea() const{
915 
916  vec3 size(transform[0],transform[5],transform[10]);
917 
918  float area = 2.f*size.x*size.y+2*size.x*size.z+2*size.y*size.z;
919 
920  return area;
921 }
922 
923 vec3 Patch::getNormal() const{
924 
925  vec3 normal;
926 
927  normal.x = transform[2];
928  normal.y = transform[6];
929  normal.z = transform[10];
930 
931  normal.normalize();
932 
933  return normal;
934 
935 }
936 
937 vec3 Triangle::getNormal() const{
938  std::vector<vec3> vertices = getVertices();
939  vec3 norm = cross(vertices.at(1)-vertices.at(0),vertices.at(2)-vertices.at(1));
940  norm.normalize();
941  return norm;
942 }
943 
944 vec3 Voxel::getNormal() const{
945  return make_vec3(0,0,0);
946 }
947 
948 std::vector<vec3> Patch::getVertices() const{
949 
950  vec3 Y[4];
951  std::vector<vec3> vertices;
952  vertices.resize(4);
953  Y[0] = make_vec3( -0.5f, -0.5f, 0.f);
954  Y[1] = make_vec3( 0.5f, -0.5f, 0.f);
955  Y[2] = make_vec3( 0.5f, 0.5f, 0.f);
956  Y[3] = make_vec3( -0.5f, 0.5f, 0.f);
957 
958  for( int i=0; i<4; i++ ){
959  vertices[i].x = transform[0] * Y[i].x + transform[1] * Y[i].y + transform[2] * Y[i].z + transform[3];
960  vertices[i].y = transform[4] * Y[i].x + transform[5] * Y[i].y + transform[6] * Y[i].z + transform[7];
961  vertices[i].z = transform[8] * Y[i].x + transform[9] * Y[i].y + transform[10] * Y[i].z + transform[11];
962  }
963  return vertices;
964 }
965 
966 std::vector<vec3> Triangle::getVertices() const{
967 
968  vec3 Y[3];
969  std::vector<vec3> vertices;
970  vertices.resize(4);
971  Y[0] = make_vec3( 0.f, 0.f, 0.f);
972  Y[1] = make_vec3( 0.f, 1.f, 0.f);
973  Y[2] = make_vec3( 1.f, 1.f, 0.f);
974 
975  for( int i=0; i<3; i++ ){
976  vertices[i].x = transform[0] * Y[i].x + transform[1] * Y[i].y + transform[2] * Y[i].z + transform[3];
977  vertices[i].y = transform[4] * Y[i].x + transform[5] * Y[i].y + transform[6] * Y[i].z + transform[7];
978  vertices[i].z = transform[8] * Y[i].x + transform[9] * Y[i].y + transform[10] * Y[i].z + transform[11];
979  }
980  return vertices;
981 
982 }
983 
984 std::vector<vec3> Voxel::getVertices() const{
985 
986  vec3 Y[8];
987  std::vector<vec3> vertices;
988  vertices.resize(8);
989  Y[0] = make_vec3( -0.5f, -0.5f, -0.5f);
990  Y[1] = make_vec3( 0.5f, -0.5f, -0.5f);
991  Y[2] = make_vec3( 0.5f, 0.5f, -0.5f);
992  Y[3] = make_vec3( -0.5f, 0.5f, -0.5f);
993  Y[4] = make_vec3( -0.5f, -0.5f, 0.5f);
994  Y[5] = make_vec3( 0.5f, -0.5f, 0.5f);
995  Y[6] = make_vec3( 0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f);
996  Y[7] = make_vec3( -0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f);
997 
998  for( int i=0; i<8; i++ ){
999  vertices[i].x = transform[0] * Y[i].x + transform[1] * Y[i].y + transform[2] * Y[i].z + transform[3];
1000  vertices[i].y = transform[4] * Y[i].x + transform[5] * Y[i].y + transform[6] * Y[i].z + transform[7];
1001  vertices[i].z = transform[8] * Y[i].x + transform[9] * Y[i].y + transform[10] * Y[i].z + transform[11];
1002  }
1003  return vertices;
1004 }
1005

1007  return make_RGBcolor(color.r,color.g,color.b);

1011  return make_RGBcolor(color.r,color.g,color.b);

1031  if( texture!=NULL ){
1032  return true;
1033  }else{
1034  return false;
1035  }
1036 }

1038 std::string Primitive::getTextureFile() const{
1039  if( hasTexture() ){
1040  return texture->getTextureFile();
1041  }else{
1042  std::string blank;
1043  return blank;
1044  }
1045 }

1063 void Primitive::scale( const vec3 S ){
1064  float T[16];
1065  makeScaleMatrix(S,T);
1066  matmult(T,transform,transform);
1067 }
1068 
1069 void Primitive::translate( const helios::vec3 shift ){
1070  float T[16];
1071  makeTranslationMatrix(shift,T);
1072  matmult(T,transform,transform);
1073 }
1074 
1075 void Patch::rotate( const float rot, const char* axis ){
1076 
1077  if( strcmp(axis,"z")==0 ){
1078  float Rz[16];
1079  makeRotationMatrix(rot,"z",Rz);
1080  matmult(Rz,transform,transform);
1081  }else if( strcmp(axis,"y")==0 ){
1082  float Ry[16];
1083  makeRotationMatrix(rot,"y",Ry);
1084  matmult(Ry,transform,transform);
1085  }else if( strcmp(axis,"x")==0 ){
1086  float Rx[16];
1087  makeRotationMatrix(rot,"x",Rx);
1088  matmult(Rx,transform,transform);
1089  }else{
1090  std::cerr << "ERROR (Patch::rotate): Rotation axis should be one of x, y, or z." << std::endl;
1091  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
1092  }
1093 
1094 }
1095 
1096 void Patch::rotate( const float rot, const helios::vec3 axis ){
1097  float R[16];
1098  makeRotationMatrix(rot,axis,R);
1099  matmult(R,transform,transform);
1100 }
1101 
1102 void Triangle::rotate( const float rot, const char* axis ){
1103 
1104  if( strcmp(axis,"z")==0 ){
1105  float Rz[16];
1106  makeRotationMatrix(rot,"z",Rz);
1107  matmult(Rz,transform,transform);
1108  }else if( strcmp(axis,"y")==0 ){
1109  float Ry[16];
1110  makeRotationMatrix(rot,"y",Ry);
1111  matmult(Ry,transform,transform);
1112  }else if( strcmp(axis,"x")==0 ){
1113  float Rx[16];
1114  makeRotationMatrix(rot,"x",Rx);
1115  matmult(Rx,transform,transform);
1116  }else{
1117  std::cerr << "ERROR (Triangle::rotate): Rotation axis should be one of x, y, or z." << std::endl;
1118  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
1119  }
1120 
1121 }
1122 
1123 void Triangle::rotate( const float rot, const helios::vec3 axis ){
1124  float R[16];
1125  makeRotationMatrix(rot,axis,R);
1126  matmult(R,transform,transform);
1127 }
1128 
1129 void Voxel::rotate( const float rot, const char* axis ){
1130 
1131  float Rz[16];
1132  makeRotationMatrix(rot,"z",Rz);
1133  matmult(Rz,transform,transform);
1134 
1135 }
1136 
1137 void Voxel::rotate( const float rot, const helios::vec3 axis ){
1138  std::cout << "WARNING (Voxel::rotate) - Voxels can only be rotated about the z-axis. Ignoring this call to rotate()." << std::endl;
1139 }
1140 
1141 void Triangle::makeTransformationMatrix( const helios::vec3 vertex0, const helios::vec3 vertex1, const helios::vec3 vertex2 ){
1142 
1143  //We need to construct the Affine transformation matrix that transforms some generic triangle to a triangle with vertices at vertex0, vertex1, vertex2.
1144 
1145  //V1 is going to be our generic triangle. This is the triangle that we'll intersect in the OptiX ray intersection program. We just need to pass the transformation matrix to OptiX so that we'll end up with the right triangle.
1146 
1147  //We'll assume our generic triangle has vertices
1148  //v0 = (0,0,0)
1149  //v1 = (0,1,0)
1150  //v2 = (1,1,0)
1151  //this needs to match up with the triangle in triangle_intersect() and triangle_bounds() (see primitiveIntersection.cu).
1152  //Note that the matrix is padded with 1's to make it 4x4
1153 
1154  float V1[16];
1155 
1156  /* [0,0] */ V1[0] = 0.f;
1157  /* [0,1] */ V1[1] = 0.f;
1158  /* [0,2] */ V1[2] = 1.f;
1159 
1160  /* [1,0] */ V1[4] = 0.f;
1161  /* [1,1] */ V1[5] = 1.f;
1162  /* [1,2] */ V1[6] = 1.f;
1163 
1164  /* [2,0] */ V1[8] = 0.f;
1165  /* [2,1] */ V1[9] = 0.f;
1166  /* [2,2] */ V1[10] = 0.f;
1167 
1168  /* [0,3] */ V1[3] = 1.f;
1169  /* [1,3] */ V1[7] = 1.f;
1170  /* [2,3] */ V1[11] = 1.f;
1171  /* [3,0] */ V1[12] = 1.f;
1172  /* [3,1] */ V1[13] = 1.f;
1173  /* [3,2] */ V1[14] = 1.f;
1174  /* [3,3] */ V1[15] = 1.f;
1175 
1176  //V2 holds the vertex locations we want to transform to
1177  //Note that the matrix is padded with 1's to make it 4x4
1178 
1179  float V2[16];
1180  /* [0,0] */ V2[0] = vertex0.x;
1181  /* [0,1] */ V2[1] = vertex1.x;
1182  /* [0,2] */ V2[2] = vertex2.x;
1183  /* [0,3] */ V2[3] = 1.f;
1184  /* [1,0] */ V2[4] = vertex0.y;
1185  /* [1,1] */ V2[5] = vertex1.y;
1186  /* [1,2] */ V2[6] = vertex2.y;
1187  /* [1,3] */ V2[7] = 1.f;
1188  /* [2,0] */ V2[8] = vertex0.z;
1189  /* [2,1] */ V2[9] = vertex1.z;
1190  /* [2,2] */ V2[10] = vertex2.z;
1191  /* [2,3] */ V2[11] = 1.f;
1192  /* [3,0] */ V2[12] = 1.f;
1193  /* [3,1] */ V2[13] = 1.f;
1194  /* [3,2] */ V2[14] = 1.f;
1195  /* [3,3] */ V2[15] = 1.f;
1196 
1197  //Now we just need to solve the linear system for our transform matrix T
1198  // [T][V1] = [V2] -->
1199  // [T] = [V2]([V1]^-1)
1200 
1201  double inv[16], det, invV1[16];
1202 
1203  inv[0] = V1[5] * V1[10] * V1[15] -
1204  V1[5] * V1[11] * V1[14] -
1205  V1[9] * V1[6] * V1[15] +
1206  V1[9] * V1[7] * V1[14] +
1207  V1[13] * V1[6] * V1[11] -
1208  V1[13] * V1[7] * V1[10];
1209 
1210  inv[4] = -V1[4] * V1[10] * V1[15] +
1211  V1[4] * V1[11] * V1[14] +
1212  V1[8] * V1[6] * V1[15] -
1213  V1[8] * V1[7] * V1[14] -
1214  V1[12] * V1[6] * V1[11] +
1215  V1[12] * V1[7] * V1[10];
1216 
1217  inv[8] = V1[4] * V1[9] * V1[15] -
1218  V1[4] * V1[11] * V1[13] -
1219  V1[8] * V1[5] * V1[15] +
1220  V1[8] * V1[7] * V1[13] +
1221  V1[12] * V1[5] * V1[11] -
1222  V1[12] * V1[7] * V1[9];
1223 
1224  inv[12] = -V1[4] * V1[9] * V1[14] +
1225  V1[4] * V1[10] * V1[13] +
1226  V1[8] * V1[5] * V1[14] -
1227  V1[8] * V1[6] * V1[13] -
1228  V1[12] * V1[5] * V1[10] +
1229  V1[12] * V1[6] * V1[9];
1230 
1231  inv[1] = -V1[1] * V1[10] * V1[15] +
1232  V1[1] * V1[11] * V1[14] +
1233  V1[9] * V1[2] * V1[15] -
1234  V1[9] * V1[3] * V1[14] -
1235  V1[13] * V1[2] * V1[11] +
1236  V1[13] * V1[3] * V1[10];
1237 
1238  inv[5] = V1[0] * V1[10] * V1[15] -
1239  V1[0] * V1[11] * V1[14] -
1240  V1[8] * V1[2] * V1[15] +
1241  V1[8] * V1[3] * V1[14] +
1242  V1[12] * V1[2] * V1[11] -
1243  V1[12] * V1[3] * V1[10];
1244 
1245  inv[9] = -V1[0] * V1[9] * V1[15] +
1246  V1[0] * V1[11] * V1[13] +
1247  V1[8] * V1[1] * V1[15] -
1248  V1[8] * V1[3] * V1[13] -
1249  V1[12] * V1[1] * V1[11] +
1250  V1[12] * V1[3] * V1[9];
1251 
1252  inv[13] = V1[0] * V1[9] * V1[14] -
1253  V1[0] * V1[10] * V1[13] -
1254  V1[8] * V1[1] * V1[14] +
1255  V1[8] * V1[2] * V1[13] +
1256  V1[12] * V1[1] * V1[10] -
1257  V1[12] * V1[2] * V1[9];
1258 
1259  inv[2] = V1[1] * V1[6] * V1[15] -
1260  V1[1] * V1[7] * V1[14] -
1261  V1[5] * V1[2] * V1[15] +
1262  V1[5] * V1[3] * V1[14] +
1263  V1[13] * V1[2] * V1[7] -
1264  V1[13] * V1[3] * V1[6];
1265 
1266  inv[6] = -V1[0] * V1[6] * V1[15] +
1267  V1[0] * V1[7] * V1[14] +
1268  V1[4] * V1[2] * V1[15] -
1269  V1[4] * V1[3] * V1[14] -
1270  V1[12] * V1[2] * V1[7] +
1271  V1[12] * V1[3] * V1[6];
1272 
1273  inv[10] = V1[0] * V1[5] * V1[15] -
1274  V1[0] * V1[7] * V1[13] -
1275  V1[4] * V1[1] * V1[15] +
1276  V1[4] * V1[3] * V1[13] +
1277  V1[12] * V1[1] * V1[7] -
1278  V1[12] * V1[3] * V1[5];
1279 
1280  inv[14] = -V1[0] * V1[5] * V1[14] +
1281  V1[0] * V1[6] * V1[13] +
1282  V1[4] * V1[1] * V1[14] -
1283  V1[4] * V1[2] * V1[13] -
1284  V1[12] * V1[1] * V1[6] +
1285  V1[12] * V1[2] * V1[5];
1286 
1287  inv[3] = -V1[1] * V1[6] * V1[11] +
1288  V1[1] * V1[7] * V1[10] +
1289  V1[5] * V1[2] * V1[11] -
1290  V1[5] * V1[3] * V1[10] -
1291  V1[9] * V1[2] * V1[7] +
1292  V1[9] * V1[3] * V1[6];
1293 
1294  inv[7] = V1[0] * V1[6] * V1[11] -
1295  V1[0] * V1[7] * V1[10] -
1296  V1[4] * V1[2] * V1[11] +
1297  V1[4] * V1[3] * V1[10] +
1298  V1[8] * V1[2] * V1[7] -
1299  V1[8] * V1[3] * V1[6];
1300 
1301  inv[11] = -V1[0] * V1[5] * V1[11] +
1302  V1[0] * V1[7] * V1[9] +
1303  V1[4] * V1[1] * V1[11] -
1304  V1[4] * V1[3] * V1[9] -
1305  V1[8] * V1[1] * V1[7] +
1306  V1[8] * V1[3] * V1[5];
1307 
1308  inv[15] = V1[0] * V1[5] * V1[10] -
1309  V1[0] * V1[6] * V1[9] -
1310  V1[4] * V1[1] * V1[10] +
1311  V1[4] * V1[2] * V1[9] +
1312  V1[8] * V1[1] * V1[6] -
1313  V1[8] * V1[2] * V1[5];
1314 
1315  det = V1[0] * inv[0] + V1[1] * inv[4] + V1[2] * inv[8] + V1[3] * inv[12];
1316 
1317  //if (det == 0)
1318  //return false;
1319 
1320  det = 1.0 / det;
1321 
1322  for (int i = 0; i < 16; i++)
1323  invV1[i] = inv[i] * det;
1324 
1325  for( int i=0;i<4;i++){
1326  for(int j=0;j<4;j++){
1327  transform[ j+i*4 ] = 0.f;
1328  }
1329  }
1330 
1331  // Multiply to get transformation matrix [T] = [V2]([V1]^-1)
1332  for( int i=0;i<4;i++){
1333  for(int j=0;j<4;j++){
1334  for(int k=0;k<4;k++){
1335  transform[ j+i*4 ] += V2[k+i*4]*invV1[j+k*4];
1336  }
1337  }
1338  }
1339 
1340 }
1341 
1342 void Primitive::setPrimitiveData( const char* label, const int& data ){
1343  std::vector<int> vec;
1344  vec.push_back(data);
1345  primitive_data_int[label] = vec;
1346  primitive_data_types[label] = HELIOS_TYPE_INT;
1347 }

1354 }

1418 
1419 void Primitive::setPrimitiveData( const char* label, HeliosDataType type, uint size, void* data ){
1420 
1421  primitive_data_types[label] = type;
1422 
1423  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
1424 
1425  int* data_ptr = (int*)data;
1426 
1427  std::vector<int> vec;
1428  vec.resize(size);
1429  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
1430  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
1431  }
1432  primitive_data_int[label] = vec;
1433 
1434  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
1435 
1436  uint* data_ptr = (uint*)data;
1437 
1438  std::vector<uint> vec;
1439  vec.resize(size);
1440  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
1441  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
1442  }
1443  primitive_data_uint[label] = vec;
1444 
1445  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
1446 
1447  float* data_ptr = (float*)data;
1448 
1449  std::vector<float> vec;
1450  vec.resize(size);
1451  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
1452  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
1453  }
1454  primitive_data_float[label] = vec;
1455 
1456  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
1457 
1458  double* data_ptr = (double*)data;
1459 
1460  std::vector<double> vec;
1461  vec.resize(size);
1462  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
1463  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
1464  }
1465  primitive_data_double[label] = vec;
1466 
1467  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
1468 
1469  vec2* data_ptr = (vec2*)data;
1470 
1471  std::vector<vec2> vec;
1472  vec.resize(size);
1473  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
1474  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
1475  }
1476  primitive_data_vec2[label] = vec;
1477 
1478  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
1479 
1480  vec3* data_ptr = (vec3*)data;
1481 
1482  std::vector<vec3> vec;
1483  vec.resize(size);
1484  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
1485  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
1486  }
1487  primitive_data_vec3[label] = vec;
1488 
1489  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
1490 
1491  vec4* data_ptr = (vec4*)data;
1492 
1493  std::vector<vec4> vec;
1494  vec.resize(size);
1495  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
1496  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
1497  }
1498  primitive_data_vec4[label] = vec;
1499 
1500  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
1501 
1502  int2* data_ptr = (int2*)data;
1503 
1504  std::vector<int2> vec;
1505  vec.resize(size);
1506  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
1507  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
1508  }
1509  primitive_data_int2[label] = vec;
1510 
1511  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
1512 
1513  int3* data_ptr = (int3*)data;
1514 
1515  std::vector<int3> vec;
1516  vec.resize(size);
1517  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
1518  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
1519  }
1520  primitive_data_int3[label] = vec;
1521 
1522  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
1523 
1524  int4* data_ptr = (int4*)data;
1525 
1526  std::vector<int4> vec;
1527  vec.resize(size);
1528  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
1529  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
1530  }
1531  primitive_data_int4[label] = vec;
1532 
1533  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
1534 
1535  std::string* data_ptr = (std::string*)data;
1536 
1537  std::vector<std::string> vec;
1538  vec.resize(size);
1539  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
1540  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
1541  }
1542  primitive_data_string[label] = vec;
1543 
1544  }
1545 
1546 }
1547 
1548 void Primitive::getPrimitiveData( const char* label, int& data ) const{
1549 
1550  if( !doesPrimitiveDataExist( label ) ){
1551  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Primitive data " << label << " does not exist for primitive " << UUID << std::endl;
1552  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
1553  }
1554 
1555  HeliosDataType type = primitive_data_types.at(label);
1556 
1557  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
1558  std::vector<int> d = primitive_data_int.at(label);
1559  data = d.at(0);
1560  }else{
1561  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Attempted to get data for type int, but data '" << label << "' for primitive " << UUID << " does not have type int." << std::endl;
1562  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
1563  }
1564 
1565 }
1566 
1567 void Primitive::getPrimitiveData( const char* label, std::vector<int>& data ) const{
1568 
1569  if( !doesPrimitiveDataExist( label ) ){
1570  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Primitive data " << label << " does not exist for primitive " << UUID << std::endl;
1571  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
1572  }
1573 
1574  HeliosDataType type = primitive_data_types.at(label);
1575 
1576  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
1577  std::vector<int> d = primitive_data_int.at(label);
1578  data = d;
1579  }else{
1580  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Attempted to get data for type int, but data '" << label << "' for primitive " << UUID << " does not have type int." << std::endl;
1581  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
1582  }
1583 
1584 }
1585 
1586 void Primitive::getPrimitiveData( const char* label, uint& data ) const{
1587 
1588  if( !doesPrimitiveDataExist( label ) ){
1589  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Primitive data " << label << " does not exist for primitive " << UUID << std::endl;
1590  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
1591  }
1592 
1593  HeliosDataType type = primitive_data_types.at(label);
1594 
1595  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
1596  std::vector<uint> d = primitive_data_uint.at(label);
1597  data = d.front();
1598  }else{
1599  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Attempted to get data for type uint, but data '" << label << "' for primitive " << UUID << " does not have type uint." << std::endl;
1600  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
1601  }
1602 
1603 }
1604 
1605 void Primitive::getPrimitiveData( const char* label, std::vector<uint>& data ) const{
1606 
1607  if( !doesPrimitiveDataExist( label ) ){
1608  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Primitive data " << label << " does not exist for primitive " << UUID << std::endl;
1609  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
1610  }
1611 
1612  HeliosDataType type = primitive_data_types.at(label);
1613 
1614  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
1615  std::vector<uint> d = primitive_data_uint.at(label);
1616  data = d;
1617  }else{
1618  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Attempted to get data for type uint, but data '" << label << "' for primitive " << UUID << " does not have type uint." << std::endl;
1619  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
1620  }
1621 
1622 }
1623 
1624 void Primitive::getPrimitiveData( const char* label, float& data ) const{
1625 
1626  if( !doesPrimitiveDataExist( label ) ){
1627  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Primitive data " << label << " does not exist for primitive " << UUID << std::endl;
1628  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
1629  }
1630 
1631  HeliosDataType type = primitive_data_types.at(label);
1632 
1633  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
1634  std::vector<float> d = primitive_data_float.at(label);
1635  data = d.front();
1636  }else{
1637  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Attempted to get data for type float, but data '" << label << "' for primitive " << UUID << " does not have type float." << std::endl;
1638  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
1639  }
1640 
1641 }
1642 
1643 void Primitive::getPrimitiveData( const char* label, std::vector<float>& data ) const{
1644 
1645  if( !doesPrimitiveDataExist( label ) ){
1646  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Primitive data " << label << " does not exist for primitive " << UUID << std::endl;
1647  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
1648  }
1649 
1650  HeliosDataType type = primitive_data_types.at(label);
1651 
1652  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
1653  std::vector<float> d = primitive_data_float.at(label);
1654  data = d;
1655  }else{
1656  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Attempted to get data for type float, but data '" << label << "' for primitive " << UUID << " does not have type float." << std::endl;
1657  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
1658  }
1659 
1660 }
1661 
1662 void Primitive::getPrimitiveData( const char* label, double& data ) const{
1663 
1664  if( !doesPrimitiveDataExist( label ) ){
1665  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Primitive data " << label << " does not exist for primitive " << UUID << std::endl;
1666  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
1667  }
1668 
1669  HeliosDataType type = primitive_data_types.at(label);
1670 
1671  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
1672  std::vector<double> d = primitive_data_double.at(label);
1673  data = d.front();
1674  }else{
1675  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Attempted to get data for type double, but data '" << label << "' for primitive " << UUID << " does not have type double." << std::endl;
1676  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
1677  }
1678 
1679 }
1680

1682 
1683  if( !doesPrimitiveDataExist( label ) ){
1684  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Primitive data " << label << " does not exist for primitive " << UUID << std::endl;
1685  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
1686  }

1928 void Primitive::getPrimitiveData( const char* label, std::string& data ) const{
1929 
1930  if( !doesPrimitiveDataExist( label ) ){
1931  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Primitive data " << label << " does not exist for primitive " << UUID << std::endl;
1932  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
1933  }
1934 
1935  HeliosDataType type = primitive_data_types.at(label);
1936 
1937  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
1938  std::vector<std::string> d = primitive_data_string.at(label);
1939  data = d.front();
1940  }else{
1941  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Attempted to get data for type string, but data '" << label << "' for primitive " << UUID << " does not have type string." << std::endl;
1942  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
1943  }
1944 
1945 }
1946 
1947 void Primitive::getPrimitiveData( const char* label, std::vector<std::string>& data ) const{
1948 
1949  if( !doesPrimitiveDataExist( label ) ){
1950  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Primitive data " << label << " does not exist for primitive " << UUID << std::endl;
1951  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
1952  }
1953 
1954  HeliosDataType type = primitive_data_types.at(label);
1955 
1956  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
1957  std::vector<std::string> d = primitive_data_string.at(label);
1958  data = d;
1959  }else{
1960  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): Attempted to get data for type string, but data '" << label << "' for primitive " << UUID << " does not have type string." << std::endl;
1961  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
1962  }
1963 
1964 }
1965 
1966 HeliosDataType Primitive::getPrimitiveDataType( const char* label ) const{
1967 
1968  if( !doesPrimitiveDataExist( label ) ){
1969  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPrimitiveDataType): Primitive data " << label << " does not exist for primitive " << UUID << std::endl;
1970  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
1971  }
1972 
1973  return primitive_data_types.at(label);
1974 
1975 }
1976 
1977 uint Primitive::getPrimitiveDataSize( const char* label ) const{
1978 
1979  if( !doesPrimitiveDataExist( label ) ){
1980  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPrimitiveDataSize): Primitive data " << label << " does not exist for primitive " << UUID << std::endl;
1981  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
1982  }
1983 
1984  HeliosDataType type = primitive_data_types.at(label);
1985 
1986  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
1987  return primitive_data_int.at(label).size();
1988  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
1989  return primitive_data_uint.at(label).size();
1990  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
1991  return primitive_data_float.at(label).size();
1992  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
1993  return primitive_data_double.at(label).size();
1994  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
1995  return primitive_data_vec2.at(label).size();
1996  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
1997  return primitive_data_vec3.at(label).size();
1998  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
1999  return primitive_data_vec4.at(label).size();
2000  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
2001  return primitive_data_int2.at(label).size();
2002  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
2003  return primitive_data_int3.at(label).size();
2004  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
2005  return primitive_data_int4.at(label).size();
2006  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
2007  return primitive_data_string.at(label).size();
2008  }else{
2009  assert( false );
2010  }
2011 
2012  return 0;
2013 
2014 }
2015 
2016 bool Primitive::doesPrimitiveDataExist( const char* label ) const{
2017 
2018  if( primitive_data_types.find(label) == primitive_data_types.end() ){
2019  return false;
2020  }else{
2021  return true;
2022  }
2023 
2024 }
2025 
2026 std::vector<std::string> Primitive::listPrimitiveData( void ) const{
2027 
2028  std::vector<std::string> labels;
2029 
2030  for( std::map<std::string,HeliosDataType>::const_iterator iter = primitive_data_types.begin(); iter!=primitive_data_types.end(); ++iter ){
2031  labels.push_back( iter->first );
2032  }
2033 
2034  return labels;
2035 
2036 }
2037 
2038 void Context::setPrimitiveData( const uint UUID, const char* label, const int& data ){
2039  if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
2040  std::cerr << "ERROR (setPrimitiveData): UUID of " << UUID << " out of range (only " << primitives.size() << " primitives in the context)." << std::endl;
2041  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
2042  }
2043  primitives.at(UUID)->setPrimitiveData(label,data);
2044 }
2045

2049  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
2050  }
2051  primitives.at(UUID)->setPrimitiveData(label,data);

2135  for( size_t p=0; p<UUIDs.size(); p++ ){
2136  setPrimitiveData( UUIDs.at(p), label, data );
2137  }
2138 }

2201  if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
2202  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPrimitiveData): UUID of " << UUID << " out of range (only " << primitives.size() << " primitives in the context)." << std::endl;
2203  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
2204  }
2205  primitives.at(UUID)->getPrimitiveData(label,data);

2400 void Context::setGlobalData( const char* label, const int& data ){
2401  std::vector<int> vec;
2402  vec.push_back(data);
2403  globaldata[label].type = HELIOS_TYPE_INT;
2404  globaldata[label].size = 1;
2405  globaldata[label].global_data_int = vec;
2406 }

2487 
2488 void Context::setGlobalData( const char* label, HeliosDataType type, size_t size, void* data ){
2489 
2490  globaldata[label].type = type;
2491  globaldata[label].size = size;
2492 
2493  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
2494 
2495  int* data_ptr = (int*)data;
2496 
2497  std::vector<int> vec;
2498  vec.resize(size);
2499  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
2500  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
2501  }
2502  globaldata[label].global_data_int = vec;
2503 
2504  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
2505 
2506  uint* data_ptr = (uint*)data;
2507 
2508  std::vector<uint> vec;
2509  vec.resize(size);
2510  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
2511  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
2512  }
2513  globaldata[label].global_data_uint = vec;
2514 
2515  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
2516 
2517  float* data_ptr = (float*)data;
2518 
2519  std::vector<float> vec;
2520  vec.resize(size);
2521  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
2522  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
2523  }
2524  globaldata[label].global_data_float = vec;
2525 
2526  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
2527 
2528  double* data_ptr = (double*)data;
2529 
2530  std::vector<double> vec;
2531  vec.resize(size);
2532  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
2533  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
2534  }
2535  globaldata[label].global_data_double = vec;
2536 
2537  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
2538 
2539  vec2* data_ptr = (vec2*)data;
2540 
2541  std::vector<vec2> vec;
2542  vec.resize(size);
2543  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
2544  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
2545  }
2546  globaldata[label].global_data_vec2 = vec;
2547 
2548  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
2549 
2550  vec3* data_ptr = (vec3*)data;
2551 
2552  std::vector<vec3> vec;
2553  vec.resize(size);
2554  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
2555  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
2556  }
2557  globaldata[label].global_data_vec3= vec;
2558 
2559  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
2560 
2561  vec4* data_ptr = (vec4*)data;
2562 
2563  std::vector<vec4> vec;
2564  vec.resize(size);
2565  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
2566  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
2567  }
2568  globaldata[label].global_data_vec4 = vec;
2569 
2570  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
2571 
2572  int2* data_ptr = (int2*)data;
2573 
2574  std::vector<int2> vec;
2575  vec.resize(size);
2576  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
2577  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
2578  }
2579  globaldata[label].global_data_int2 = vec;
2580 
2581  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
2582 
2583  int3* data_ptr = (int3*)data;
2584 
2585  std::vector<int3> vec;
2586  vec.resize(size);
2587  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
2588  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
2589  }
2590  globaldata[label].global_data_int3 = vec;
2591 
2592  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
2593 
2594  int4* data_ptr = (int4*)data;
2595 
2596  std::vector<int4> vec;
2597  vec.resize(size);
2598  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
2599  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
2600  }
2601  globaldata[label].global_data_int4 = vec;
2602 
2603  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
2604 
2605  std::string* data_ptr = (std::string*)data;
2606 
2607  std::vector<std::string> vec;
2608  vec.resize(size);
2609  for( size_t i=0; i<size; i++ ){
2610  vec.at(i) = data_ptr[i];
2611  }
2612  globaldata[label].global_data_string = vec;
2613 
2614  }
2615 
2616 }
2617 
2618 void Context::getGlobalData( const char* label, int& data ) const{
2619 
2620  if( !doesGlobalDataExist( label ) ){
2621  std::cerr << "ERROR (getGlobalData): Primitive data " << label << " does not exist." << std::endl;
2622  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
2623  }
2624 
2625  GlobalData gdata = globaldata.at(label);
2626 
2627  if( gdata.type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
2628  std::vector<int> d = gdata.global_data_int;
2629  data = d.front();
2630  }else{
2631  std::cerr << "ERROR (getGlobalData): Attempted to get global data for type int, but data does not have type int." << std::endl;
2632  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
2633  }
2634 
2635 }
2636 
2637 void Context::getGlobalData( const char* label, std::vector<int>& data ) const{
2638 
2639  if( !doesGlobalDataExist( label ) ){
2640  std::cerr << "ERROR (getGlobalData): Global data " << label << " does not exist." << std::endl;
2641  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
2642  }
2643 
2644  GlobalData gdata = globaldata.at(label);
2645 
2646  if( gdata.type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
2647  std::vector<int> d = gdata.global_data_int;
2648  data = d;
2649  }else{
2650  std::cerr << "ERROR (getGlobalData): Attempted to get data for type int, but data does not have type int." << std::endl;
2651  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
2652  }
2653 
2654 }
2655 
2656 void Context::getGlobalData( const char* label, uint& data ) const{
2657 
2658  if( !doesGlobalDataExist( label ) ){
2659  std::cerr << "ERROR (getGlobalData): Primitive data " << label << " does not exist." << std::endl;
2660  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
2661  }
2662 
2663  GlobalData gdata = globaldata.at(label);
2664 
2665  if( gdata.type==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
2666  std::vector<uint> d = gdata.global_data_uint;
2667  data = d.front();
2668  }else{
2669  std::cerr << "ERROR (getGlobalData): Attempted to get global data for type uint, but data does not have type uint." << std::endl;
2670  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
2671  }
2672 
2673 }
2674 
2675 void Context::getGlobalData( const char* label, std::vector<uint>& data ) const{
2676 
2677  if( !doesGlobalDataExist( label ) ){
2678  std::cerr << "ERROR (getGlobalData): Global data " << label << " does not exist." << std::endl;
2679  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
2680  }
2681 
2682  GlobalData gdata = globaldata.at(label);
2683 
2684  if( gdata.type==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
2685  std::vector<uint> d = gdata.global_data_uint;
2686  data = d;
2687  }else{
2688  std::cerr << "ERROR (getGlobalData): Attempted to get data for type uint, but data does not have type int." << std::endl;
2689  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
2690  }
2691 
2692 }
2693 
2694 void Context::getGlobalData( const char* label, float& data ) const{
2695 
2696  if( !doesGlobalDataExist( label ) ){
2697  std::cerr << "ERROR (getGlobalData): Primitive data " << label << " does not exist." << std::endl;
2698  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
2699  }
2700 
2701  GlobalData gdata = globaldata.at(label);
2702 
2703  if( gdata.type==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
2704  std::vector<float> d = gdata.global_data_float;
2705  data = d.front();
2706  }else{
2707  std::cerr << "ERROR (getGlobalData): Attempted to get global data for type float, but data does not have type float." << std::endl;
2708  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
2709  }
2710 
2711 }
2712

3036 bool Context::doesGlobalDataExist( const char* label ) const{
3037 
3038  if( globaldata.find(label) == globaldata.end() ){
3039  return false;
3040  }else{
3041  return true;
3042  }
3043 
3044 }
