3046 
3047 Patch::Patch( const RGBAcolor _color_, const uint _UUID_ ){
3048 
3049  makeIdentityMatrix( transform );
3050 
3051  color = _color_;
3052  assert( color.r>=0 && color.r<=1 && color.g>=0 && color.g<=1 && color.b>=0 && color.b<=1 );
3053  UUID = _UUID_;
3054  prim_type = PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH;
3055  solid_fraction = 1.f;
3056  texture = 0;
3057  texturecoloroverridden = false;
3058 
3059 }
3060 
3061 Patch::Patch( Texture* _texture_, const uint _UUID_ ){
3062 
3063  makeIdentityMatrix( transform );
3064 
3065  UUID = _UUID_;
3066  prim_type = PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH;
3067  texture = _texture_;
3068  solid_fraction = texture->getSolidFraction();
3069  texturecoloroverridden = false;
3070 
3071 }
3072 
3073 Patch::Patch( Texture* _texture_, const std::vector<vec2> _uv_, const float _solid_fraction_, const uint _UUID_ ){
3074 
3075  makeIdentityMatrix( transform );
3076 
3077  UUID = _UUID_;
3078  prim_type = PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH;
3079 
3080  texture = _texture_;
3081  uv = _uv_;
3082  solid_fraction = _solid_fraction_;
3083  texturecoloroverridden = false;
3084 
3085 }
3086 
3087 helios::vec2 Patch::getSize(void) const{
3088  std::vector<vec3> vertices = getVertices();
3089  float l = (vertices.at(1)-vertices.at(0)).magnitude();
3090  float w = (vertices.at(3)-vertices.at(0)).magnitude();
3091  return make_vec2(l,w);
3092 }
3093 
3094 helios::vec3 Patch::getCenter(void) const{
3095  return make_vec3(transform[3],transform[7],transform[11]);
3096 }
3097 
3098 Triangle::Triangle( const vec3 vertex0, const vec3 vertex1, const vec3 vertex2, const RGBAcolor _color_, const uint _UUID_ ){
3099 
3100  makeTransformationMatrix(vertex0,vertex1,vertex2);
3101  color = _color_;
3102  UUID = _UUID_;
3103  prim_type = PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE;
3104  texture = 0;
3105  solid_fraction = 1.f;
3106  texturecoloroverridden = false;
3107 
3108 }
3109 
3110 Triangle::Triangle( const vec3 vertex0, const vec3 vertex1, const vec3 vertex2, Texture* _texture_, const std::vector<vec2> _uv_, const float _solid_fraction_, const uint _UUID_ ){
3111 
3112  makeTransformationMatrix(vertex0,vertex1,vertex2);
3113  color = make_RGBAcolor(RGB::red,1);
3114  UUID = _UUID_;
3115  prim_type = PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE;
3116 
3117  texture = _texture_;
3118  uv = _uv_;
3119  solid_fraction = _solid_fraction_;
3120  texturecoloroverridden = false;
3121 
3122 }
3123 
3124 vec3 Triangle::getVertex( int number ){
3125 
3126  if( number<0 || number>2 ){
3127  std::cerr << "getVertex ERROR: vertex number must be 0, 1, or 2." << std::endl;
3128  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3129  }
3130 
3131  vec3 Y[3];
3132  Y[0] = make_vec3( 0.f, 0.f, 0.f);
3133  Y[1] = make_vec3( 0.f, 1.f, 0.f);
3134  Y[2] = make_vec3( 1.f, 1.f, 0.f);
3135 
3136  vec3 vertex;
3137 
3138  vertex.x = transform[0] * Y[number].x + transform[1] * Y[number].y + transform[2] * Y[number].z + transform[3];
3139  vertex.y = transform[4] * Y[number].x + transform[5] * Y[number].y + transform[6] * Y[number].z + transform[7];
3140  vertex.z = transform[8] * Y[number].x + transform[9] * Y[number].y + transform[10] * Y[number].z + transform[11];
3141 
3142  return vertex;
3143 
3144 }
3145 
3146 Voxel::Voxel( const RGBAcolor _color_, const uint _UUID_ ){
3147 
3148  makeIdentityMatrix(transform);
3149 
3150  color = _color_;
3151  assert( color.r>=0 && color.r<=1 && color.g>=0 && color.g<=1 && color.b>=0 && color.b<=1 );
3152  UUID = _UUID_;
3153  prim_type = PRIMITIVE_TYPE_VOXEL;
3154  texture = 0;
3155  texturecoloroverridden = false;
3156 
3157 }
3158 
3159 float Voxel::getVolume(void){
3160 
3161  return transform[0]*transform[5]*transform[10];
3162 }
3163 
3164 vec3 Voxel::getCenter(void){
3165  return make_vec3(transform[3],transform[7],transform[11]);
3166 }
3167 
3168 vec3 Voxel::getSize(void){
3169  return make_vec3(transform[0],transform[5],transform[10]);
3170 }
3171 
3172 void Context::setDate( int day, int month, int year ){
3173 
3174  if( day<1 || day>31 ){
3175  std::cerr << "ERROR (setDate): Day of month is out of range (day of " << day << " was given)." << std::endl;
3176  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3177  }else if( month<1 || month>12){
3178  std::cerr << "ERROR (setDate): Month of year is out of range (month of " << month << " was given)." << std::endl;
3179  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3180  }else if( year<1000 ){
3181  std::cerr << "ERROR (setDate): Year should be specified in YYYY format." << std::endl;
3182  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3183  }
3184 
3185  sim_date = make_Date(day,month,year);
3186 
3187  return;
3188 
3189 }
3190 
3191 void Context::setDate( Date date ){
3192 
3193  if( date.day<1 || date.day>31 ){
3194  std::cerr << "ERROR (setDate): Day of month is out of range (day of " << date.day << " was given)." << std::endl;
3195  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3196  }else if( date.month<1 || date.month>12){
3197  std::cerr << "ERROR (setDate): Month of year is out of range (month of " << date.month << " was given)." << std::endl;
3198  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3199  }else if( date.year<1000 ){
3200  std::cerr << "ERROR (setDate): Year should be specified in YYYY format." << std::endl;
3201  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3202  }
3203 
3204  sim_date = date;
3205 
3206  return;
3207 
3208 }
3209 
3210 void Context::setDate( int Julian_day, int year ){
3211 
3212  if( Julian_day<1 || Julian_day>366 ){
3213  std::cerr << "ERROR (setDate): Julian day out of range." << std::endl;
3214  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3215  }else if( year<1000 ){
3216  std::cerr << "ERROR (setDate): Year should be specified in YYYY format." << std::endl;
3217  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3218  }
3219 
3220  sim_date = CalendarDay( Julian_day, year );
3221 
3222  return;
3223 
3224 }
3225 
3226 Date Context::getDate( void ) const{
3227  return sim_date;
3228 }
3229 
3230 const char* Context::getMonthString( void ) const{
3231  if( sim_date.month==1 ){
3232  return "JAN";
3233  }else if( sim_date.month==2 ){
3234  return "FEB";
3235  }else if( sim_date.month==3 ){
3236  return "MAR";
3237  }else if( sim_date.month==4 ){
3238  return "APR";
3239  }else if( sim_date.month==5 ){
3240  return "MAY";
3241  }else if( sim_date.month==6 ){
3242  return "JUN";
3243  }else if( sim_date.month==7 ){
3244  return "JUL";
3245  }else if( sim_date.month==8 ){
3246  return "AUG";
3247  }else if( sim_date.month==9 ){
3248  return "SEP";
3249  }else if( sim_date.month==10 ){
3250  return "OCT";
3251  }else if( sim_date.month==11 ){
3252  return "NOV";
3253  }else{
3254  return "DEC";
3255  }
3256 
3257 }
3258 
3259 int Context::getJulianDate( void ) const{
3260  return JulianDay( sim_date.day, sim_date.month, sim_date.year );
3261 }
3262 
3263 void Context::setTime( int minute, int hour ){
3264  setTime(0,minute,hour);
3265 }
3266 
3267 void Context::setTime( int second, int minute, int hour ){
3268 
3269  if( second<0 || second>59 ){
3270  std::cerr << "ERROR (setTime): Second out of range (0-59)." << std::endl;
3271  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3272  }else if( minute<0 || minute>59 ){
3273  std::cerr << "ERROR (setTime): Minute out of range (0-59)." << std::endl;
3274  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3275  }else if( hour<0 || hour>23 ){
3276  std::cerr << "ERROR (setTime): Hour out of range (0-23)." << std::endl;
3277  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3278  }
3279 
3280  sim_time = make_Time(hour,minute,second);
3281 
3282 }
3283 
3284 void Context::setTime( Time time ){
3285 
3286  if( time.minute<0 || time.minute>59 ){
3287  std::cerr << "ERROR (setTime): Minute out of range (0-59)." << std::endl;
3288  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3289  }else if( time.hour<0 || time.hour>23 ){
3290  std::cerr << "ERROR (setTime): Hour out of range (0-23)." << std::endl;
3291  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3292  }
3293 
3294  sim_time = time;
3295 
3296 }
3297 
3298 Time Context::getTime( void ) const{
3299  return sim_time;
3300 }
3301 
3302 float Context::randu(void){
3303  return unif_distribution(generator);
3304 }
3305 
3306 float Context::randu( float min, float max ){
3307  if( max<min ){
3308  std::cerr << "ERROR (randu): Maximum value of range must be greater than minimum value of range." << std::endl;
3309  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3310  }else if( max==min ){
3311  return min;
3312  }else{
3313  return min+unif_distribution(generator)*(max-min);
3314  }
3315 }
3316 
3317 int Context::randu( int min, int max ){
3318  if( max<min ){
3319  std::cerr << "ERROR (randu): Maximum value of range must be greater than minimum value of range." << std::endl;
3320  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3321  }else if( max==min ){
3322  return min;
3323  }else{
3324  return min+round(unif_distribution(generator)*float(max-min));
3325  }
3326 }
3327 
3328 float Context::randn(void){
3329  return norm_distribution(generator);
3330 }
3331 
3332 float Context::randn( float mean, float stddev ){
3333  return mean+norm_distribution(generator)*fabs(stddev);
3334 }
3335 
3336 uint Context::addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size ){
3337  return addPatch(center,size,make_SphericalCoord(0,0),make_RGBAcolor(0,0,0,1));
3338 }
3339 
3340 uint Context::addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size, const SphericalCoord& rotation ){
3341  return addPatch(center,size,rotation,make_RGBAcolor(0,0,0,1));
3342 }
3343 
3344 uint Context::addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size, const SphericalCoord& rotation, const RGBcolor& color ){
3345  return addPatch(center,size,rotation,make_RGBAcolor(color,1));
3346 }
3347 
3348 uint Context::addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size, const SphericalCoord& rotation, const RGBAcolor& color ){
3349 
3350  Patch* patch_new = (new Patch( color, currentUUID ));
3351 
3352  assert( size.x>0.f && size.y>0.f );
3353  patch_new->scale( make_vec3(size.x,size.y,1) );
3354 
3355  if( rotation.elevation!=0 ){
3356  patch_new->rotate(-rotation.elevation, "x");
3357  }
3358  if( rotation.azimuth!=0 ){
3359  patch_new->rotate(-rotation.azimuth, "z");
3360  }
3361 
3362  patch_new->translate( center );
3363 
3364  primitives[currentUUID] = patch_new;
3365  markGeometryDirty();
3366  currentUUID++;
3367  return currentUUID-1;
3368 }
3369 
3370 uint Context::addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size, const SphericalCoord& rotation, const char* texture_file ){
3371 
3372  Texture* texture = addTexture( texture_file );
3373 
3374  Patch* patch_new = (new Patch( texture, currentUUID ));
3375 
3376  assert( size.x>0.f && size.y>0.f );
3377  patch_new->scale( make_vec3(size.x,size.y,1) );
3378 
3379  if( rotation.elevation!=0 ){
3380  patch_new->rotate(-rotation.elevation, "x");
3381  }
3382  if( rotation.azimuth!=0 ){
3383  patch_new->rotate(-rotation.azimuth, "z");
3384  }
3385 
3386  patch_new->translate( center );
3387 
3388  primitives[currentUUID] = patch_new;
3389  markGeometryDirty();
3390  currentUUID++;
3391  return currentUUID-1;
3392 }
3393 
3394 uint Context::addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size, const SphericalCoord& rotation,const char* texture_file, const helios::vec2& uv_center, const helios::vec2& uv_size ){
3395 
3396  if( uv_center.x-0.5*uv_size.x<-1e-3 || uv_center.y-0.5*uv_size.y<-1e-3 || uv_center.x+0.5*uv_size.x-1.f>1e-3 || uv_center.y+0.5*uv_size.y-1.f>1e-3 ){
3397  std::cerr << "ERROR (addPatch): Invalid texture coordinates. uv_center-0.5*uv_size should be >=0 and uv_center+0.5*uv_size should be <=1." << std::endl;
3398  std::cout << (uv_center.x-0.5*uv_size.x>=0.f) << " " << (uv_center.y-0.5*uv_size.y>=0.f) << " " << (uv_center.x+0.5*uv_size.x<=1.f) << " " << (uv_center.y+0.5*uv_size.y<=1.f) << std::endl;
3399  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3400  }
3401 
3402  Texture* texture = addTexture( texture_file );
3403 
3404  std::vector<helios::vec2> uv;
3405  uv.resize(4);
3406  uv.at(0) = uv_center+make_vec2(+0.5*uv_size.x,-0.5*uv_size.y);
3407  uv.at(1) = uv_center+make_vec2(-0.5*uv_size.x,-0.5*uv_size.y);
3408  uv.at(2) = uv_center+make_vec2(-0.5*uv_size.x,+0.5*uv_size.y);
3409  uv.at(3) = uv_center+make_vec2(+0.5*uv_size.x,+0.5*uv_size.y);
3410 
3411  float solid_fraction;
3412  if( texture->hasTransparencyChannel() ){
3413  std::vector<std::vector<bool> >* alpha = texture->getTransparencyData();
3414  int A = 0;
3415  int At = 0;
3416  int2 sz = texture->getSize();
3417  int2 uv_min( floor(uv.at(0).x*sz.x), floor(uv.at(0).y*sz.y) );
3418  int2 uv_max( floor(uv.at(2).x*sz.x), floor(uv.at(2).y*sz.y) );
3419  for( int j=uv_min.y; j<uv_max.y; j++ ){
3420  for( int i=uv_min.x; i<uv_max.x; i++ ){
3421  At += 1;
3422  if( alpha->at(j).at(i) ){
3423  A += 1;
3424  }
3425  }
3426  }
3427  if( At==0 ){
3428  solid_fraction = 0;
3429  }else{
3430  solid_fraction = float(A)/float(At);
3431  }
3432  }else{
3433  solid_fraction = 1.f;
3434  }
3435 
3436  Patch* patch_new = (new Patch( texture, uv, solid_fraction, currentUUID ));
3437 
3438  assert( size.x>0.f && size.y>0.f );
3439  patch_new->scale( make_vec3(size.x,size.y,1) );
3440 
3441  if( rotation.elevation!=0 ){
3442  patch_new->rotate(-rotation.elevation, "x");
3443  }
3444  if( rotation.azimuth!=0 ){
3445  patch_new->rotate(-rotation.azimuth, "z");
3446  }
3447 
3448  patch_new->translate( center );
3449 
3450  primitives[currentUUID] = patch_new;
3451  markGeometryDirty();
3452  currentUUID++;
3453  return currentUUID-1;
3454 }
3455 
3456 uint Context::addTriangle( const vec3& vertex0, const vec3& vertex1, const vec3& vertex2 ){
3457  return addTriangle( vertex0, vertex1, vertex2, make_RGBAcolor(0,0,0,1) );
3458 }
3459 
3460 uint Context::addTriangle( const vec3& vertex0, const vec3& vertex1, const vec3& vertex2, const RGBcolor& color ){
3461  return addTriangle( vertex0, vertex1, vertex2, make_RGBAcolor(color,1) );
3462 }
3463 
3464 bool edgeFunction(const helios::vec2 &a, const helios::vec2 &b, const helios::vec2 &c)
3465 {
3466  return ((c.y - a.y) * (b.x - a.x)-(c.x - a.x) * (b.y - a.y) >= 0);
3467 }
3468 
3469 uint Context::addTriangle( const vec3& vertex0, const vec3& vertex1, const vec3& vertex2, const RGBAcolor& color ){
3470 
3471  Triangle* tri_new = (new Triangle( vertex0, vertex1, vertex2, color, currentUUID ));
3472  primitives[currentUUID] = tri_new;
3473  markGeometryDirty();
3474  currentUUID++;
3475  return currentUUID-1;
3476 }
3477 
3478 uint Context::addTriangle( const helios::vec3& vertex0, const helios::vec3& vertex1, const helios::vec3& vertex2, const char* texture_file, const helios::vec2& uv0, const helios::vec2& uv1, const helios::vec2& uv2 ){
3479 
3480  Texture* texture = addTexture( texture_file );
3481 
3482  std::vector<helios::vec2> uv;
3483  uv.resize(3);
3484  uv.at(0) = uv0;
3485  uv.at(1) = uv1;
3486  uv.at(2) = uv2;
3487 
3488  float solid_fraction;
3489  if( texture->hasTransparencyChannel() ){
3490  std::vector<std::vector<bool> >* alpha = texture->getTransparencyData();
3491  int2 sz = texture->getSize();
3492  int2 uv_min( round(fmin(fmin(uv0.x,uv1.x),uv2.x)*sz.x), round(fmin(fmin(uv0.y,uv1.y),uv2.y)*sz.y) );
3493  int2 uv_max( round(fmax(fmax(uv0.x,uv1.x),uv2.x)*sz.x), round(fmax(fmax(uv0.y,uv1.y),uv2.y)*sz.y) );
3494  int A = 0;
3495  int At = 0;
3496  vec2 xy;
3497  for( int j=uv_min.y; j<uv_max.y; j++ ){
3498  for( int i=uv_min.x; i<uv_max.x; i++ ){
3499  xy.x = float(i+0.5)/float(sz.x-1);
3500  xy.y = float(j+0.5)/float(sz.y-1);
3501  if( edgeFunction( uv.at(0), uv.at(1), xy ) && edgeFunction( uv.at(1), uv.at(2), xy )&& edgeFunction( uv.at(2), uv.at(0), xy ) ){
3502  At += 1;
3503  if( alpha->at(j).at(i) ){
3504  A += 1;
3505  }
3506  }
3507  }
3508  }
3509  if( At==0 ){
3510  solid_fraction = 0;
3511  }else{
3512  solid_fraction = float(A)/float(At);
3513  }
3514  }else{
3515  solid_fraction = 1.f;
3516  }
3517 
3518  Triangle* tri_new = (new Triangle( vertex0, vertex1, vertex2, texture, uv, solid_fraction, currentUUID ));
3519  primitives[currentUUID] = tri_new;
3520  markGeometryDirty();
3521  currentUUID++;
3522  return currentUUID-1;
3523 }
3524 
3525 uint Context::addVoxel( const vec3& center, const vec3& size ){
3526  return addVoxel(center,size,0,make_RGBAcolor(0,0,0,1));
3527 }

3533 uint Context::addVoxel( const vec3& center, const vec3& size, const float& rotation, const RGBcolor& color ){

3535 }
3536 
3537 uint Context::addVoxel( const vec3& center, const vec3& size, const float& rotation, const RGBAcolor& color ){
3538 
3539  Voxel* voxel_new = (new Voxel( color, currentUUID ));
3540 
3541  voxel_new->scale( size );
3542 
3543  if( rotation!=0 ){
3544  voxel_new->rotate( rotation, "z" );
3545  }
3546 
3547  voxel_new->translate( center );
3548 
3549  primitives[currentUUID] = voxel_new;
3550  markGeometryDirty();
3551  currentUUID++;
3552  return currentUUID-1;
3553 }

3561  getPrimitivePointer(UUIDs.at(p))->translate(shift);
3562  }

3572  }

3595 void Context::deletePrimitive( const std::vector<uint> UUIDs ){
3596  for( size_t p=0; p<UUIDs.size(); p++ ){
3597  deletePrimitive( UUIDs.at(p) );
3598  }
3599 }
3600 
3601 void Context::deletePrimitive( const uint UUID ){
3602 
3603  if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
3604  std::cerr << "ERROR (deletePrimitive: UUID of " << UUID << " not found in the context." << std::endl;
3605  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3606  }
3607 
3608  Primitive* prim = primitives.at(UUID);
3609  delete prim;
3610  primitives.erase(UUID);
3611 
3612  markGeometryDirty();
3613 
3614 }
3615 
3616 std::vector<uint> Context::copyPrimitive( const std::vector<uint> UUIDs ){
3617 
3618  std::vector<uint> UUIDs_copy;
3619  for( size_t p=0; p<UUIDs.size(); p++ ){
3620  UUIDs_copy.push_back( copyPrimitive( UUIDs.at(p) ) );
3621  }
3622 
3623  return UUIDs_copy;
3624 
3625 }
3626 
3627 uint Context::copyPrimitive( const uint UUID ){
3628 
3629  if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
3630  std::cerr << "ERROR (copyPrimitive: UUID of " << UUID << " not found in the context." << std::endl;
3631  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3632  }
3633 
3634  PrimitiveType type = primitives.at(UUID)->getType();
3635 
3636  if( type==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH ){
3637  Patch* p = getPatchPointer(UUID);
3638  std::vector<vec2> uv = p->getTextureUV();
3639  vec2 size = p->getSize();
3640  float solid_fraction = p->getArea()/(size.x*size.y);
3641  Patch* patch_new;
3642  if( !p->hasTexture() ){
3643  patch_new = (new Patch( p->getColorRGBA(), currentUUID ));
3644  }else{
3645  Texture* texture = p->getTexture();
3646  if( uv.size()==4 ){
3647  patch_new = (new Patch( texture, uv, solid_fraction, currentUUID ));
3648  }else{
3649  patch_new = (new Patch( texture, currentUUID ));
3650  }
3651  }
3652  float transform[16];
3653  p->getTransformationMatrix(transform);
3654  patch_new->setTransformationMatrix(transform);
3655  primitives[currentUUID] = patch_new;
3656  }else if( type==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE ){
3657  Triangle* p = getTrianglePointer(UUID);
3658  std::vector<vec3> vertices = p->getVertices();
3659  std::vector<vec2> uv = p->getTextureUV();
3660  Triangle* tri_new;
3661  if( !p->hasTexture() ){
3662  tri_new = (new Triangle( vertices.at(0), vertices.at(1), vertices.at(2), p->getColorRGBA(), currentUUID ));
3663  }else{
3664  Texture* texture = p->getTexture();
3665  float solid_fraction = p->getArea()/calculateTriangleArea( vertices.at(0), vertices.at(1), vertices.at(2) );
3666  tri_new = (new Triangle( vertices.at(0), vertices.at(1), vertices.at(2), texture, uv, solid_fraction, currentUUID ));
3667  }
3668  float transform[16];
3669  p->getTransformationMatrix(transform);
3670  tri_new->setTransformationMatrix(transform);
3671  primitives[currentUUID] = tri_new;
3672  }else if( type==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_VOXEL ){
3673  Voxel* p = getVoxelPointer(UUID);
3674  Voxel* voxel_new;
3675  if( !p->hasTexture() ){
3676  voxel_new = (new Voxel( p->getColorRGBA(), currentUUID ));
3677  }else{
3678  voxel_new = (new Voxel( p->getColorRGBA(), currentUUID ));
3679  /* \todo Texture-mapped voxels constructor here */
3680  }
3681  float transform[16];
3682  p->getTransformationMatrix(transform);
3683  voxel_new->setTransformationMatrix(transform);
3684  primitives[currentUUID] = voxel_new;
3685  }
3686 
3687  markGeometryDirty();
3688  currentUUID++;
3689  return currentUUID-1;
3690 }
3691 
3692 Primitive* Context::getPrimitivePointer( uint UUID ) const{
3693  if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
3694  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPrimitivePointer): UUID of " << UUID << " out of range (only " << primitives.size() << " primitives in the context)." << std::endl;
3695  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3696  }
3697  return primitives.at(UUID);
3698 }
3699 
3700 bool Context::doesPrimitiveExist( const uint UUID ) const{
3701  return primitives.find(UUID) != primitives.end();
3702 }
3703 
3704 Patch* Context::getPatchPointer( const uint UUID ) const{
3705  if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
3706  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPatchPointer): UUID of " << UUID << " not found in the context." << std::endl;
3707  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3708  }else if( primitives.at(UUID)->getType()!=PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH ){
3709  std::cerr << "ERROR (getPatchPointer): Primitive " << UUID << " is not a patch." << std::endl;
3710  }
3711  return static_cast<Patch*>(primitives.at(UUID));
3712 }
3713 Triangle* Context::getTrianglePointer( const uint UUID ) const{
3714  if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
3715  std::cerr << "ERROR (getTrianglePointer): UUID of " << UUID << " not found in the context." << std::endl;
3716  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3717  }else if( primitives.at(UUID)->getType()!=PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE ){
3718  std::cerr << "ERROR (getTrianglePointer): Primitive " << UUID << " is not a triangle." << std::endl;
3719  }
3720  return static_cast<Triangle*>(primitives.at(UUID));
3721 }
3722 
3723 Voxel* Context::getVoxelPointer( const uint UUID ) const{
3724  if( primitives.find(UUID) == primitives.end() ){
3725  std::cerr << "ERROR (getVoxelPointer): UUID of " << UUID << " not found in the context." << std::endl;
3726  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3727  }else if( primitives.at(UUID)->getType()!=PRIMITIVE_TYPE_VOXEL ){
3728  std::cerr << "ERROR (getVoxelPointer): Primitive " << UUID << " is not a voxel." << std::endl;
3729  }
3730  return static_cast<Voxel*>(primitives.at(UUID));
3731 }
3732 
3733 uint Context::getPrimitiveCount( void ) const{
3734  return primitives.size();
3735 }
3736 
3737 std::vector<uint> Context::getAllUUIDs( void ) const{
3738  std::vector<uint> UUIDs;
3739  UUIDs.resize(primitives.size());
3740  size_t i=0;
3741  for(std::map<uint,Primitive*>::const_iterator iter = primitives.begin(); iter != primitives.end(); ++iter){
3742  UUIDs.at(i) = iter->first;
3743  i++;
3744  }
3745  return UUIDs;
3746 }
3747 
3748 void Context::addTimeseriesData( const char* label, float value, Date date, Time time ){
3749 
3750  //floating point value corresponding to date and time
3751  double date_value = floor(date.year*366.25) + date.JulianDay();
3752  date_value += double(time.hour)/24. + double(time.minute)/1440. + double(time.second)/86400.;
3753 
3754  //Check if data label already exists
3755  if( timeseries_data.find(label) == timeseries_data.end() ){ //does not exist
3756  timeseries_data[label].push_back( value );
3757  timeseries_datevalue[label].push_back( date_value );
3758  return;
3759  }else{ //exists
3760 
3761  uint N = getTimeseriesLength(label);
3762 
3763  std::vector<float>::iterator it_data = timeseries_data[label].begin();
3764  std::vector<double>::iterator it_datevalue = timeseries_datevalue[label].begin();
3765 
3766  if( N==1 ){
3767 
3768  if( date_value<timeseries_datevalue[label].front() ){
3769  timeseries_data[label].insert(it_data, value);
3770  timeseries_datevalue[label].insert(it_datevalue, date_value);
3771  return;
3772  }else{
3773  timeseries_data[label].insert(it_data+1, value);
3774  timeseries_datevalue[label].insert(it_datevalue+1, date_value);
3775  return;
3776  }
3777 
3778  }else{
3779 
3780  if( date_value<timeseries_datevalue[label].front() ){ //check if data should be inserted at beginning of timeseries
3781  timeseries_data[label].insert(it_data, value);
3782  timeseries_datevalue[label].insert(it_datevalue, date_value);
3783  return;
3784  }else if( date_value>timeseries_datevalue[label].back() ){ //check if data should be inserted at end of timeseries
3785  timeseries_data[label].push_back( value);
3786  timeseries_datevalue[label].push_back( date_value);
3787  return;
3788  }
3789 
3790  //data should be inserted somewhere in the middle of timeseries
3791  for( uint t=0; t<N-1; t++ ){
3792  if( date_value==timeseries_datevalue[label].at(t) ){
3793  std::cout << "WARNING (addTimeseriesData): Skipping duplicate timeseries date/time." << std::endl;
3794  continue;
3795  }
3796  if( date_value>timeseries_datevalue[label].at(t) && date_value<timeseries_datevalue[label].at(t+1) ){
3797  timeseries_data[label].insert(it_data+t+1, value);
3798  timeseries_datevalue[label].insert(it_datevalue+t+1, date_value);
3799  return;
3800  }
3801  }
3802 
3803  }
3804 
3805  }
3806 
3807  std::cerr << "ERROR (addTimeseriesData): Failed to insert timeseries data for unknown reason." << std::endl;
3808  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3809 
3810 }
3811 
3812 void Context::setCurrentTimeseriesPoint( const char* label, const uint index ){
3813  if( timeseries_data.find(label) == timeseries_data.end() ){ //does not exist
3814  std::cerr << "ERROR (setCurrentTimeseriesPoint): Timeseries variable `" << label << "' does not exist." << std::endl;
3815  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3816  }
3817  setDate( queryTimeseriesDate( label, index ) );
3818  setTime( queryTimeseriesTime( label, index ) );
3819 }
3820 
3821 float Context::queryTimeseriesData( const char* label, const Date date, const Time time ) const{
3822  if( timeseries_data.find(label) == timeseries_data.end() ){ //does not exist
3823  std::cerr << "ERROR (queryTimeseriesData): Timeseries variable `" << label << "' does not exist." << std::endl;
3824  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3825  }
3826 
3827  double date_value = floor(date.year*366.25) + date.JulianDay();
3828  date_value += double(time.hour)/24. + double(time.minute)/1440. + double(time.second)/86400.;
3829 
3830  double tmin = timeseries_datevalue.at(label).front();
3831  double tmax = timeseries_datevalue.at(label).back();
3832 
3833  if( date_value<tmin ){
3834  std::cerr << "WARNING (queryTimeseriesData): Timeseries date and time is outside of the range of the data. Using the earliest data point in the timeseries." << std::endl;
3835  return timeseries_data.at(label).front();
3836  }else if( date_value>tmax ){
3837  std::cout << date_value << " " << tmax << std::endl;
3838  std::cerr << "WARNING (queryTimeseriesData): Timeseries date and time is outside of the range of the data. Using the latest data point in the timeseries." << std::endl;
3839  return timeseries_data.at(label).back();
3840  }
3841 
3842  if( timeseries_datevalue.at(label).size() == 0 ){
3843  std::cout << "WARNING (queryTimeseriesData): timeseries " << label << " does not contain any data." << std::endl;
3844  return 0;
3845  }else if( timeseries_datevalue.at(label).size() == 1 ){
3846  return timeseries_data.at(label).front();
3847  }else{
3848  int i;
3849  bool success=false;
3850  for( i=0; i<timeseries_data.at(label).size()-1; i++ ){
3851  if( date_value>=timeseries_datevalue.at(label).at(i) && date_value<=timeseries_datevalue.at(label).at(i+1) ){
3852  success = true;
3853  break;
3854  }
3855  }
3856 
3857  if(!success){
3858 
3859  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3860  }
3861 
3862  double xminus = timeseries_data.at(label).at(i);
3863  double xplus = timeseries_data.at(label).at(i+1);
3864 
3865  double tminus = timeseries_datevalue.at(label).at(i);
3866  double tplus = timeseries_datevalue.at(label).at(i+1);
3867 
3868  return xminus + (xplus-xminus)*(date_value-tminus)/(tplus-tminus);
3869 
3870  }
3871 
3872 }
3873 
3874 float Context::queryTimeseriesData( const char* label, const uint index ) const{
3875 
3876  if( timeseries_data.find(label) == timeseries_data.end() ){ //does not exist
3877  std::cerr << "ERROR (getTimeseriesData): Timeseries variable `" << label << "' does not exist." << std::endl;
3878  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3879  }
3880 
3881  return timeseries_data.at(label).at(index);
3882 
3883 }
3884 
3885 Time Context::queryTimeseriesTime( const char* label, const uint index ) const{
3886 
3887  if( timeseries_data.find(label) == timeseries_data.end() ){ //does not exist
3888  std::cerr << "ERROR (getTimeseriesTime): Timeseries variable `" << label << "' does not exist." << std::endl;
3889  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3890  }
3891 
3892  double dateval = timeseries_datevalue.at(label).at(index);
3893 
3894  int year = floor(floor(dateval)/366.25);
3895  assert( year>1000 && year<10000 );
3896 
3897  int JD = floor(dateval-floor(double(year)*366.25));
3898  assert( JD>0 && JD<367 );
3899 
3900  int hour = floor((dateval-floor(dateval))*24.);
3901  int minute = floor( ((dateval-floor(dateval))*24.-double(hour))*60. );
3902  int second = round( ( ( ( dateval - floor(dateval) )*24. - double(hour))*60. - double(minute) )*60.);
3903 
3904  if( second==60 ){
3905  second = 0;
3906  minute ++;
3907  }
3908 
3909  if( minute==60 ){
3910  minute = 0;
3911  hour ++;
3912  }
3913 
3914  assert( second>=0 && second<60 );
3915  assert( minute>=0 && minute<60 );
3916  assert( hour>=0 && hour<24 );
3917 
3918  return make_Time(hour,minute,second);
3919 
3920 }
3921 
3922 Date Context::queryTimeseriesDate( const char* label, const uint index ) const{
3923 
3924  if( timeseries_data.find(label) == timeseries_data.end() ){ //does not exist
3925  std::cerr << "ERROR (getTimeseriesDate): Timeseries variable `" << label << "' does not exist." << std::endl;
3926  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3927  }
3928 
3929  double dateval = timeseries_datevalue.at(label).at(index);
3930 
3931  int year = floor(floor(dateval)/366.25);
3932  assert( year>1000 && year<10000 );
3933 
3934  int JD = floor(dateval-floor(double(year)*366.25));
3935  assert( JD>0 && JD<367 );
3936 
3937  Date date = Julian2Calendar(JD,year);
3938 
3939  return Julian2Calendar(JD,year);
3940 
3941 }
3942 
3943 uint Context::getTimeseriesLength( const char* label ) const{
3944 
3945  if( timeseries_data.find(label) == timeseries_data.end() ){ //does not exist
3946  std::cerr << "ERROR (getTimeseriesLength): Timeseries variable `" << label << "' does not exist." << std::endl;
3947  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
3948  }else{
3949  return timeseries_data.at(label).size();
3950  }
3951 
3952 }
3953 
3954 void Context::getDomainBoundingBox( vec2& xbounds, vec2& ybounds, vec2& zbounds ) const{
3955 
3956  xbounds.x = 1e8;
3957  xbounds.y = -1e8;
3958  ybounds.x = 1e8;
3959  ybounds.y = -1e8;
3960  zbounds.x = 1e8;
3961  zbounds.y = -1e8;
3962 
3963  for( std::map<uint,Primitive*>::const_iterator iter = primitives.begin(); iter != primitives.end(); ++iter ){
3964 
3965  std::vector<vec3> verts = getPrimitivePointer(iter->first)->getVertices();
3966 
3967  for( int j=0; j<verts.size(); j++ ){
3968  if( verts[j].x<xbounds.x ){
3969  xbounds.x = verts[j].x;
3970  }else if( verts[j].x>xbounds.y ){
3971  xbounds.y = verts[j].x;
3972  }
3973  if( verts[j].y<ybounds.x ){
3974  ybounds.x = verts[j].y;
3975  }else if( verts[j].y>ybounds.y ){
3976  ybounds.y = verts[j].y;
3977  }
3978  if( verts[j].z<zbounds.x ){
3979  zbounds.x = verts[j].z;
3980  }else if( verts[j].z>zbounds.y ){
3981  zbounds.y = verts[j].z;
3982  }
3983  }
3984 
3985  }
3986 
3987  return;
3988 
3989 }
3990 
3991 void Context::getDomainBoundingBox( const std::vector<uint>& UUIDs, vec2& xbounds, vec2& ybounds, vec2& zbounds ) const{
3992 
3993  xbounds.x = 1e8;
3994  xbounds.y = -1e8;
3995  ybounds.x = 1e8;
3996  ybounds.y = -1e8;
3997  zbounds.x = 1e8;
3998  zbounds.y = -1e8;
3999 
4000  for( int p=0; p<UUIDs.size(); p++ ){
4001 
4002  std::vector<vec3> verts = getPrimitivePointer( UUIDs.at(p) )->getVertices();
4003 
4004  for( int j=0; j<verts.size(); j++ ){
4005  if( verts[j].x<xbounds.x ){
4006  xbounds.x = verts[j].x;
4007  }else if( verts[j].x>xbounds.y ){
4008  xbounds.y = verts[j].x;
4009  }
4010  if( verts[j].y<ybounds.x ){
4011  ybounds.x = verts[j].y;
4012  }else if( verts[j].y>ybounds.y ){
4013  ybounds.y = verts[j].y;
4014  }
4015  if( verts[j].z<zbounds.x ){
4016  zbounds.x = verts[j].z;
4017  }else if( verts[j].z>zbounds.y ){
4018  zbounds.y = verts[j].z;
4019  }
4020  }
4021 
4022  }
4023 
4024  return;
4025 
4026 }
4027 
4028 void Context::getDomainBoundingSphere( vec3& center, float& radius ) const{
4029 
4030  vec2 xbounds, ybounds, zbounds;
4031  getDomainBoundingBox( xbounds, ybounds, zbounds );
4032 
4033  center.x = xbounds.x+0.5f*(xbounds.y - xbounds.x);
4034  center.y = ybounds.x+0.5f*(ybounds.y - ybounds.x);
4035  center.z = zbounds.x+0.5f*(zbounds.y - zbounds.x);
4036 
4037  radius = 0.5f*sqrtf( pow(xbounds.y-xbounds.x,2) + pow(ybounds.y-ybounds.x,2) + pow((zbounds.y-zbounds.x),2) );
4038 
4039 
4040 }
4041 
4042 void Context::getDomainBoundingSphere( const std::vector<uint>& UUIDs, vec3& center, float& radius ) const{
4043 
4044  vec2 xbounds, ybounds, zbounds;
4045  getDomainBoundingBox( UUIDs, xbounds, ybounds, zbounds );
4046 
4047  center.x = xbounds.x+0.5f*(xbounds.y - xbounds.x);
4048  center.y = ybounds.x+0.5f*(ybounds.y - ybounds.x);
4049  center.z = zbounds.x+0.5f*(zbounds.y - zbounds.x);
4050 
4051  radius = 0.5f*sqrtf( pow(xbounds.y-xbounds.x,2) + pow(ybounds.y-ybounds.x,2) + pow((zbounds.y-zbounds.x),2) );
4052 
4053 
4054 }
4055 
4056 std::vector<uint> Context::addSphere( const uint Ndivs, const vec3 center, const float radius ){
4057 
4058  RGBcolor color = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
4059 
4060  return addSphere(Ndivs,center,radius,color);
4061 
4062 }
4063 
4064 std::vector<uint> Context::addSphere( const uint Ndivs, const vec3 center, const float radius, const RGBcolor color ){
4065  // return addSphere( Ndivs, center, radius, make_RGBAcolor(color,1.f) );
4066 // }
4067 
4068 // std::vector<uint> Context::addSphere( const uint Ndivs, float center, float radius, RGBAcolor color ){
4069 
4070  std::vector<uint> UUID;
4071 
4072  float theta;
4073  float dtheta=M_PI/float(Ndivs);
4074  float dphi=2.0*M_PI/float(Ndivs);
4075 
4076  //bottom cap
4077  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
4078 
4079  vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5*M_PI, 0 ) );
4080  vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5*M_PI+dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
4081  vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5*M_PI+dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
4082 
4083  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,color) );
4084 
4085  }
4086 
4087  //top cap
4088  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
4089 
4090  vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5*M_PI, 0 ) );
4091  vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5*M_PI-dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
4092  vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, 0.5*M_PI-dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
4093 
4094  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v2,v1,v0,color) );
4095 
4096  }
4097 
4098  //middle
4099  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
4100  for( int i=1; i<Ndivs-1; i++ ){
4101 
4102  vec3 v0 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5*M_PI+float(i)*dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
4103  vec3 v1 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5*M_PI+float(i+1)*dtheta, float(j)*dphi ) );
4104  vec3 v2 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5*M_PI+float(i+1)*dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
4105  vec3 v3 = center + sphere2cart( make_SphericalCoord(radius, -0.5*M_PI+float(i)*dtheta, float(j+1)*dphi ) );
4106 
4107  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,color) );
4108  UUID.push_back( addTriangle(v0,v2,v3,color) );
4109 
4110  }
4111  }
4112 
4113  return UUID;
4114 
4115 
4116 }
4117 
4118 // std::vector<uint> Context::addSphere( const uint Ndivs, std::vector<vec3> nodes, float radius, const char* texture_file ){}
4119 
4120 std::vector<uint> Context::addTube( const uint Ndivs, const std::vector<vec3> nodes, const std::vector<float> radius ){
4121 
4122  uint node_count = nodes.size();
4123 
4124  std::vector<RGBcolor> color;
4125  color.resize(node_count);
4126 
4127  for( uint i=0; i<node_count; i++ ){
4128  color.at(i) = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
4129  }
4130 
4131  return addTube(Ndivs,nodes,radius,color);
4132 
4133 }
4134 
4135 std::vector<uint> Context::addTube( const uint Ndivs, const std::vector<vec3> nodes, const std::vector<float> radius, std::vector<RGBcolor> color ){
4136 
4137  const uint node_count = nodes.size();
4138 
4139  if( node_count==0 ){
4140  std::cerr << "ERROR (Context::addTube): Node and radius arrays are empty." << std::endl;
4141  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
4142  }else if( node_count!=radius.size() ){
4143  std::cerr << "ERROR (Context::addTube): Size of `nodes' and `radius' arguments must agree." << std::endl;
4144  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
4145  }else if( node_count!=color.size() ){
4146  std::cerr << "ERROR (Context::addTube): Size of `nodes' and `color' arguments must agree." << std::endl;
4147  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
4148  }
4149 
4150  vec3 vec, convec;
4151  float cfact[Ndivs+1], sfact[Ndivs+1];
4152  std::vector<std::vector<vec3> > xyz, normal;
4153  xyz.resize(Ndivs+1);
4154  normal.resize(Ndivs+1);
4155  for( uint j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
4156  xyz.at(j).resize(node_count);
4157  normal.at(j).resize(node_count);
4158  }
4159  vec3 nvec(0.1817f,0.6198f,0.7634f);//random vector to get things going
4160 
4161  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
4162  cfact[j]=cos(2.f*M_PI*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
4163  sfact[j]=sin(2.f*M_PI*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
4164  }
4165 
4166  for( int i=0; i<node_count; i++ ){ //looping over tube segments
4167 
4168  if(i==0){
4169  vec.x=nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x;
4170  vec.y=nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y;
4171  vec.z=nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z;
4172  }else if(i==node_count-1){
4173  vec.x=nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x;
4174  vec.y=nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y;
4175  vec.z=nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z;
4176  }else{
4177  vec.x=0.5f*( (nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x)+(nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x) );
4178  vec.y=0.5f*( (nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y)+(nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y) );
4179  vec.z=0.5f*( (nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z)+(nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z) );
4180  }
4181 
4182  float norm;
4183  convec = cross(nvec,vec);
4184  norm=convec.magnitude();
4185  convec.x=convec.x/norm;
4186  convec.y=convec.y/norm;
4187  convec.z=convec.z/norm;
4188  nvec = cross(vec,convec);
4189  norm=nvec.magnitude();
4190  nvec.x=nvec.x/norm;
4191  nvec.y=nvec.y/norm;
4192  nvec.z=nvec.z/norm;
4193 
4194 
4195 
4196  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
4197  normal[j][i].x=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.x+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.x;
4198  normal[j][i].y=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.y+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.y;
4199  normal[j][i].z=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.z+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.z;
4200 
4201  xyz[j][i].x=nodes[i].x+normal[j][i].x;
4202  xyz[j][i].y=nodes[i].y+normal[j][i].y;
4203  xyz[j][i].z=nodes[i].z+normal[j][i].z;
4204 
4205  normal[j][i] = normal[j][i]/radius[i];
4206  }
4207 
4208  }
4209 
4210  vec3 v0, v1, v2;
4211  std::vector<uint> UUID;
4212 
4213  for( int i=0; i<node_count-1; i++ ){
4214  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
4215 
4216  v0 = xyz[j][i];
4217  v1 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
4218  v2 = xyz[j+1][i];
4219 
4220  //if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
4221  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, color.at(i) ));
4222  //}
4223 
4224  v0 = xyz[j][i];
4225  v1 = xyz[j][i+1];
4226  v2 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
4227 
4228  //if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
4229  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, color.at(i) ));
4230  //}
4231 
4232  }
4233  }
4234 
4235  return UUID;
4236 
4237 }
4238 
4239 std::vector<uint> Context::addTube( const uint Ndivs, const std::vector<vec3> nodes, const std::vector<float> radius, const char* texturefile ){
4240 
4241  const uint node_count = nodes.size();
4242 
4243  if( node_count==0 ){
4244  std::cerr << "ERROR (Context::addTube): Node and radius arrays are empty." << std::endl;
4245  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
4246  }else if( node_count!=radius.size() ){
4247  std::cerr << "ERROR (Context::addTube): Size of `nodes' and `radius' arguments must agree." << std::endl;
4248  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
4249  }
4250 
4251  vec3 vec, convec;
4252  float cfact[Ndivs+1], sfact[Ndivs+1];
4253  std::vector<std::vector<vec3> > xyz, normal;
4254  std::vector<std::vector<vec2> > uv;
4255  xyz.resize(Ndivs+1);
4256  normal.resize(Ndivs+1);
4257  uv.resize(Ndivs+1);
4258  for( uint j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
4259  xyz.at(j).resize(node_count);
4260  normal.at(j).resize(node_count);
4261  uv.at(j).resize(node_count);
4262  }
4263  vec3 nvec(0.f,1.f,0.f);
4264 
4265  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
4266  cfact[j]=cos(2.f*M_PI*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
4267  sfact[j]=sin(2.f*M_PI*float(j)/float(Ndivs));
4268  }
4269 
4270  for( int i=0; i<node_count; i++ ){ //looping over tube segments
4271 
4272  if(i==0){
4273  vec.x=nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x;
4274  vec.y=nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y;
4275  vec.z=nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z;
4276  }else if(i==node_count-1){
4277  vec.x=nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x;
4278  vec.y=nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y;
4279  vec.z=nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z;
4280  }else{
4281  vec.x=0.5f*( (nodes[i].x-nodes[i-1].x)+(nodes[i+1].x-nodes[i].x) );
4282  vec.y=0.5f*( (nodes[i].y-nodes[i-1].y)+(nodes[i+1].y-nodes[i].y) );
4283  vec.z=0.5f*( (nodes[i].z-nodes[i-1].z)+(nodes[i+1].z-nodes[i].z) );
4284  }
4285 
4286  float norm;
4287  convec = cross(nvec,vec);
4288  norm=convec.magnitude();
4289  convec.x=convec.x/norm;
4290  convec.y=convec.y/norm;
4291  convec.z=convec.z/norm;
4292  nvec = cross(vec,convec);
4293  norm=nvec.magnitude();
4294  nvec.x=nvec.x/norm;
4295  nvec.y=nvec.y/norm;
4296  nvec.z=nvec.z/norm;
4297 
4298  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs+1; j++ ){
4299  normal[j][i].x=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.x+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.x;
4300  normal[j][i].y=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.y+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.y;
4301  normal[j][i].z=cfact[j]*radius[i]*nvec.z+sfact[j]*radius[i]*convec.z;
4302 
4303  xyz[j][i].x=nodes[i].x+normal[j][i].x;
4304  xyz[j][i].y=nodes[i].y+normal[j][i].y;
4305  xyz[j][i].z=nodes[i].z+normal[j][i].z;
4306 
4307  uv[j][i].x = float(i)/float(node_count-1);
4308  uv[j][i].y = float(j)/float(Ndivs);
4309 
4310  normal[j][i] = normal[j][i]/radius[i];
4311  }
4312 
4313  }
4314 
4315  vec3 v0, v1, v2;
4316  vec2 uv0, uv1, uv2;
4317  std::vector<uint> UUID;
4318 
4319  for( int i=0; i<node_count-1; i++ ){
4320  for( int j=0; j<Ndivs; j++ ){
4321 
4322  v0 = xyz[j][i];
4323  v1 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
4324  v2 = xyz[j+1][i];
4325 
4326  uv0 = uv[j][i];
4327  uv1 = uv[j+1][i+1];
4328  uv2 = uv[j+1][i];
4329 
4330  if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
4331  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, texturefile, uv0, uv1, uv2 ));
4332  }
4333 
4334  v0 = xyz[j][i];
4335  v1 = xyz[j][i+1];
4336  v2 = xyz[j+1][i+1];
4337 
4338  uv0 = uv[j][i];
4339  uv1 = uv[j][i+1];
4340  uv2 = uv[j+1][i+1];
4341 
4342  if( (v1-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v0).magnitude()>1e-6 && (v2-v1).magnitude()>1e-6 ){
4343  UUID.push_back(addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, texturefile, uv0, uv1, uv2 ));
4344  }
4345 
4346  }
4347  }
4348 
4349  return UUID;
4350 
4351 }
4352 
4353 std::vector<uint> Context::addBox( const vec3 center, const vec3 size, const int3 subdiv ){
4354 
4355  RGBcolor color = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
4356 
4357  return addBox(center,size,subdiv,color,false);
4358 }
4359 
4360 std::vector<uint> Context::addBox( const vec3 center, const vec3 size, const int3 subdiv, const RGBcolor color ){
4361  return addBox(center,size,subdiv,color,false);
4362 }
4363 
4364 std::vector<uint> Context::addBox( const vec3 center, const vec3 size, const int3 subdiv, const char* texturefile ){
4365  return addBox(center,size,subdiv,texturefile,false);
4366 }
4367 
4368 std::vector<uint> Context::addBox( const vec3 center, const vec3 size, const int3 subdiv, const RGBcolor color, const bool reverse_normals ){
4369 
4370  std::vector<uint> UUID;
4371 
4372  vec3 subsize;
4373  subsize.x = size.x/float(subdiv.x);
4374  subsize.y = size.y/float(subdiv.y);
4375  subsize.z = size.z/float(subdiv.z);
4376 
4377  vec3 subcenter;
4378  std::vector<uint> U;
4379 
4380  if( reverse_normals ){ //normals point inward
4381 
4382  // x-z faces (vertical)
4383 
4384  //right
4385  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0.5*size.y,0);
4386  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), color );
4387  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4388 
4389  //left
4390  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0.5*size.y,0);
4391  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), color );
4392  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4393 
4394  // y-z faces (vertical)
4395 
4396  //front
4397  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0.5*size.x,0,0);
4398  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,1.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), color );
4399  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4400 
4401  //back
4402  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0.5*size.x,0,0);
4403  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), color );
4404  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4405 
4406  // x-y faces (horizontal)
4407 
4408  //top
4409  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0,0.5*size.z);
4410  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), color );
4411  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4412 
4413  //bottom
4414  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0,0.5*size.z);
4415  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), color );
4416  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4417 
4418  }else{ //normals point outward
4419 
4420  // x-z faces (vertical)
4421 
4422  //right
4423  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0.5*size.y,0);
4424  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), color );
4425  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4426 
4427  //left
4428  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0.5*size.y,0);
4429  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), color );
4430  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4431 
4432  // y-z faces (vertical)
4433 
4434  //front
4435  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0.5*size.x,0,0);
4436  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), color );
4437  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4438 
4439  //back
4440  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0.5*size.x,0,0);
4441  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,1.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), color );
4442  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4443 
4444  // x-y faces (horizontal)
4445 
4446  //top
4447  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0,0.5*size.z);
4448  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), color );
4449  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4450 
4451  //bottom
4452  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0,0.5*size.z);
4453  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), color );
4454  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4455 
4456  }
4457 
4458  return UUID;
4459 
4460 }
4461 
4462 std::vector<uint> Context::addBox( const vec3 center, const vec3 size, const int3 subdiv, const char* texturefile, const bool reverse_normals ){
4463 
4464  std::vector<uint> UUID;
4465 
4466  vec3 subsize;
4467  subsize.x = size.x/float(subdiv.x);
4468  subsize.y = size.y/float(subdiv.y);
4469  subsize.z = size.z/float(subdiv.z);
4470 
4471  vec3 subcenter;
4472  std::vector<uint> U;
4473 
4474  if( reverse_normals ){ //normals point inward
4475 
4476  // x-z faces (vertical)
4477 
4478  //right
4479  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0.5*size.y,0);
4480  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), texturefile );
4481  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4482 
4483  //left
4484  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0.5*size.y,0);
4485  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), texturefile );
4486  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4487 
4488  // y-z faces (vertical)
4489 
4490  //front
4491  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0.5*size.x,0,0);
4492  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,1.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), texturefile );
4493  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4494 
4495  //back
4496  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0.5*size.x,0,0);
4497  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), texturefile );
4498  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4499 
4500  // x-y faces (horizontal)
4501 
4502  //top
4503  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0,0.5*size.z);
4504  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), texturefile );
4505  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4506 
4507  //bottom
4508  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0,0.5*size.z);
4509  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), texturefile );
4510  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4511 
4512  }else{ //normals point outward
4513 
4514  // x-z faces (vertical)
4515 
4516  //right
4517  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0.5*size.y,0);
4518  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), texturefile );
4519  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4520 
4521  //left
4522  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0.5*size.y,0);
4523  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.z), texturefile );
4524  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4525 
4526  // y-z faces (vertical)
4527 
4528  //front
4529  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0.5*size.x,0,0);
4530  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,0.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), texturefile );
4531  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4532 
4533  //back
4534  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0.5*size.x,0,0);
4535  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.y,size.z), make_SphericalCoord(0.5*M_PI,1.5*M_PI), make_int2(subdiv.y,subdiv.z), texturefile );
4536  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4537 
4538  // x-y faces (horizontal)
4539 
4540  //top
4541  subcenter = center + make_vec3(0,0,0.5*size.z);
4542  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), texturefile );
4543  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4544 
4545  //bottom
4546  subcenter = center - make_vec3(0,0,0.5*size.z);
4547  U = addTile( subcenter, make_vec2(size.x,size.y), make_SphericalCoord(M_PI,0), make_int2(subdiv.x,subdiv.y), texturefile );
4548  UUID.insert( UUID.end(), U.begin(), U.end() );
4549 
4550  }
4551 
4552  return UUID;
4553 
4554 }
4555 
4556 std::vector<uint> Context::addTile( const vec3 center, const vec2 size, const SphericalCoord rotation, const int2 subdiv ){
4557 
4558  RGBcolor color = make_RGBcolor(0.f,0.75f,0.f); //Default color is green
4559 
4560  return addTile(center,size,rotation,subdiv,color);
4561 }
4562 
4563 std::vector<uint> Context::addTile( const vec3 center, const vec2 size, const SphericalCoord rotation, const int2 subdiv, const RGBcolor color ){
4564 
4565  std::vector<uint> UUID;
4566 
4567  vec2 subsize;
4568  subsize.x = size.x/float(subdiv.x);
4569  subsize.y = size.y/float(subdiv.y);
4570 
4571  vec3 subcenter;
4572 
4573  for( uint j=0; j<subdiv.y; j++ ){
4574  for( uint i=0; i<subdiv.x; i++ ){
4575 
4576  subcenter = make_vec3(-0.5*size.x+(float(i)+0.5)*subsize.x,-0.5*size.y+(float(j)+0.5)*subsize.y,0);
4577 
4578  UUID.push_back( addPatch( subcenter, subsize, make_SphericalCoord(0,0), color ) );
4579 
4580  if( rotation.elevation!=0.f ){
4581  getPrimitivePointer( UUID.back() )->rotate( -rotation.elevation, "x" );
4582  }
4583  if( rotation.azimuth!=0.f ){
4584  getPrimitivePointer( UUID.back() )->rotate( -rotation.azimuth, "z" );
4585  }
4586  getPrimitivePointer( UUID.back() )->translate( center );
4587 
4588  }
4589  }
4590 
4591  return UUID;
4592 
4593 }
4594 
4595 std::vector<uint> Context::addTile( const vec3 center, const vec2 size, const SphericalCoord rotation, const int2 subdiv, const char* texturefile ){
4596 
4597  std::vector<uint> UUID;
4598 
4599  vec2 subsize;
4600  subsize.x = size.x/float(subdiv.x);
4601  subsize.y = size.y/float(subdiv.y);
4602 
4603  vec3 subcenter;
4604 
4605  std::vector<helios::vec2> uv;
4606  uv.resize(4);
4607  vec2 uv_sub;
4608  uv_sub.x = 1.f/float(subdiv.x);
4609  uv_sub.y = 1.f/float(subdiv.y);
4610 
4611  Texture* texture = addTexture( texturefile );
4612  std::vector<std::vector<bool> >* alpha;
4613  int2 sz;
4614  if( texture->hasTransparencyChannel() ){
4615  alpha = texture->getTransparencyData();
4616  sz = texture->getSize();
4617  }
4618 
4619  for( uint j=0; j<subdiv.y; j++ ){
4620  for( uint i=0; i<subdiv.x; i++ ){
4621 
4622  subcenter = make_vec3(-0.5*size.x+(float(i)+0.5)*subsize.x,-0.5*size.y+(float(j)+0.5)*subsize.y,0);
4623 
4624  uv.at(0) = make_vec2(1.f-float(i)*uv_sub.x,float(j)*uv_sub.y);
4625  uv.at(1) = make_vec2(1.f-float(i+1)*uv_sub.x,float(j)*uv_sub.y);
4626  uv.at(2) = make_vec2(1.f-float(i+1)*uv_sub.x,float(j+1)*uv_sub.y);
4627  uv.at(3) = make_vec2(1.f-float(i)*uv_sub.x,float(j+1)*uv_sub.y);
4628 
4629  float solid_fraction;
4630  if( texture->hasTransparencyChannel() ){
4631  int A = 0;
4632  int At = 0;
4633 
4634  int2 uv_min( floor(uv.at(0).x*(sz.x-1)), floor(uv.at(0).y*(sz.y-1)) );
4635  int2 uv_max( floor(uv.at(2).x*(sz.x-1)), floor(uv.at(2).y*(sz.y-1)) );
4636 
4637  assert( uv_min.x>=0 && uv_min.y>=0 && uv_max.x<sz.x && uv_max.y<sz.y );
4638 
4639  for( int j=uv_min.y; j<uv_max.y; j++ ){
4640  for( int i=uv_min.x; i<uv_max.x; i++ ){
4641  At += 1;
4642  if( alpha->at(j).at(i) ){
4643  A += 1;
4644  }
4645  }
4646  }
4647  if( At==0 ){
4648  solid_fraction = 0;
4649  }else{
4650  solid_fraction = float(A)/float(At);
4651  }
4652  }else{
4653  solid_fraction = 1.f;
4654  }
4655 
4656  Patch* patch_new = (new Patch( texture, uv, solid_fraction, currentUUID ));
4657 
4658  assert( size.x>0.f && size.y>0.f );
4659  patch_new->scale( make_vec3(subsize.x,subsize.y,1) );
4660 
4661  patch_new->translate( subcenter );
4662 
4663  if( rotation.elevation!=0 ){
4664  patch_new->rotate(-rotation.elevation, "x");
4665  }
4666  if( rotation.azimuth!=0 ){
4667  patch_new->rotate(-rotation.azimuth, "z");
4668  }
4669 
4670  patch_new->translate( center );
4671 
4672  primitives[currentUUID] = patch_new;
4673  markGeometryDirty();
4674  currentUUID++;
4675  UUID.push_back(currentUUID-1);
4676 
4677 
4678  }
4679  }
4680 
4681  return UUID;
4682 
4683 }
4684 
4685 std::vector<uint> Context::addDisk( const uint Ndivs, const vec3& center, const vec2& size ){
4686  return addDisk(Ndivs,center,size,make_SphericalCoord(0,0),make_RGBAcolor(1,0,0,1));
4687 }
4688 
4689 std::vector<uint> Context::addDisk( const uint Ndivs, const vec3& center, const vec2& size, const SphericalCoord& rotation ){
4690  return addDisk(Ndivs,center,size,rotation,make_RGBAcolor(1,0,0,1));
4691 }
4692 
4693 std::vector<uint> Context::addDisk( const uint Ndivs, const vec3& center, const vec2& size, const SphericalCoord& rotation, const RGBcolor& color ){
4694  return addDisk(Ndivs,center,size,rotation,make_RGBAcolor(color,1));
4695 }
4696 
4697 std::vector<uint> Context::addDisk( const uint Ndivs, const vec3& center, const vec2& size, const SphericalCoord& rotation, const RGBAcolor& color ){
4698 
4699  std::vector<uint> UUIDs;
4700  UUIDs.resize(Ndivs);
4701 
4702  for( int i=0; i<Ndivs; i++ ){
4703 
4704  float dtheta = 1.f/float(Ndivs)*2.f*M_PI;
4705 
4706  UUIDs.at(i) = addTriangle( make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec3(size.x*cosf(dtheta*float(i)),size.y*sinf(dtheta*float(i)),0), make_vec3(size.x*cosf(dtheta*float(i+1)),size.y*sinf(dtheta*float(i+1)),0), color );
4707  getPrimitivePointer(UUIDs.at(i))->rotate( rotation.elevation, "y" );
4708  getPrimitivePointer(UUIDs.at(i))->rotate( rotation.azimuth, "z" );
4709  getPrimitivePointer(UUIDs.at(i))->translate( center );
4710 
4711  }
4712 
4713  return UUIDs;
4714 
4715 }
4716 
4717 std::vector<uint> Context::addDisk( const uint Ndivs, const vec3& center, const vec2& size, const SphericalCoord& rotation, const char* texture_file ){
4718 
4719  std::vector<uint> UUIDs;
4720  UUIDs.resize(Ndivs);
4721 
4722  for( int i=0; i<Ndivs; i++ ){
4723 
4724  float dtheta = 1.f/float(Ndivs)*2.f*M_PI;
4725 
4726  UUIDs.at(i) = addTriangle( make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec3(size.x*cosf(dtheta*float(i)),size.y*sinf(dtheta*float(i)),0), make_vec3(size.x*cosf(dtheta*float(i+1)),size.y*sinf(dtheta*float(i+1)),0), texture_file, make_vec2(0.5,0.5), make_vec2(0.5*(1+cosf(dtheta*float(i))),0.5*(1+sinf(dtheta*float(i)))), make_vec2(0.5*(1+cosf(dtheta*float(i+1))),0.5*(1+sinf(dtheta*float(i+1)))) );
4727  getPrimitivePointer(UUIDs.at(i))->rotate( rotation.elevation, "y" );
4728  getPrimitivePointer(UUIDs.at(i))->rotate( rotation.azimuth, "z" );
4729  getPrimitivePointer(UUIDs.at(i))->translate( center );
4730 
4731  }
4732 
4733  return UUIDs;
4734 
4735 }
4736 
4737 void Context::loadPData( pugi::xml_node p, uint UUID ){
4738 
4739  for (pugi::xml_node data = p.child("data_int"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data_int")){
4740 
4741  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
4742  std::vector<int> datav;
4743  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
4744  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
4745  int tmp;
4746  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
4747  datav.push_back(tmp);
4748  }
4749  }
4750 
4751  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
4752 
4753  if( datav.size()==1 ){
4754  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,datav.front());
4755  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
4756  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,HELIOS_TYPE_INT,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
4757  }
4758 
4759  }
4760 
4761  for (pugi::xml_node data = p.child("data_uint"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data_uint")){
4762 
4763  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
4764  std::vector<uint> datav;
4765  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
4766  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
4767  uint tmp;
4768  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
4769  datav.push_back(tmp);
4770  }
4771  }
4772 
4773  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
4774 
4775  if( datav.size()==1 ){
4776  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,datav.front());
4777  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
4778  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,HELIOS_TYPE_UINT,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
4779  }
4780 
4781  }
4782 
4783  for (pugi::xml_node data = p.child("data_float"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data_float")){
4784 
4785  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
4786  std::vector<float> datav;
4787  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
4788  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
4789  float tmp;
4790  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
4791  datav.push_back(tmp);
4792  }
4793  }
4794 
4795  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
4796 
4797  if( datav.size()==1 ){
4798  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,datav.front());
4799  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
4800  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
4801  }
4802 
4803  }
4804 
4805  for (pugi::xml_node data = p.child("data_double"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data_double")){
4806 
4807  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
4808  std::vector<double> datav;
4809  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
4810  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
4811  double tmp;
4812  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
4813  datav.push_back(tmp);
4814  }
4815  }
4816 
4817  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
4818 
4819  if( datav.size()==1 ){
4820  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,datav.front());
4821  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
4822  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
4823  }
4824 
4825  }
4826 
4827  for (pugi::xml_node data = p.child("data_vec2"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data_vec2")){
4828 
4829  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
4830  std::vector<vec2> datav;
4831  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
4832  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
4833  std::vector<float> tmp;
4834  tmp.resize(2);
4835  int c = 0;
4836  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
4837  c++;
4838  if( c==2 ){
4839  datav.push_back(make_vec2(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1)));
4840  c=0;
4841  }
4842  }
4843  }
4844 
4845  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
4846 
4847  if( datav.size()==1 ){
4848  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,datav.front());
4849  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
4850  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
4851  }
4852 
4853  }
4854 
4855  for (pugi::xml_node data = p.child("data_vec3"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data_vec3")){
4856 
4857  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
4858  std::vector<vec3> datav;
4859  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
4860  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
4861  std::vector<float> tmp;
4862  tmp.resize(3);
4863  int c = 0;
4864  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
4865  c++;
4866  if( c==3 ){
4867  datav.push_back(make_vec3(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1),tmp.at(2)));
4868  c=0;
4869  }
4870  }
4871  }
4872 
4873  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
4874 
4875  if( datav.size()==1 ){
4876  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,datav.front());
4877  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
4878  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
4879  }
4880 
4881  }
4882 
4883  for (pugi::xml_node data = p.child("data_vec4"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data_vec4")){
4884 
4885  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
4886  std::vector<vec4> datav;
4887  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
4888  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
4889  std::vector<float> tmp;
4890  tmp.resize(4);
4891  int c = 0;
4892  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
4893  c++;
4894  if( c==4 ){
4895  datav.push_back(make_vec4(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1),tmp.at(2),tmp.at(3)));
4896  c=0;
4897  }
4898  }
4899  }
4900 
4901  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
4902 
4903  if( datav.size()==1 ){
4904  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,datav.front());
4905  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
4906  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
4907  }
4908 
4909  }
4910 
4911  for (pugi::xml_node data = p.child("data_int2"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data_int2")){
4912 
4913  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
4914  std::vector<int2> datav;
4915  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
4916  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
4917  std::vector<int> tmp;
4918  tmp.resize(2);
4919  int c = 0;
4920  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
4921  c++;
4922  if( c==2 ){
4923  datav.push_back(make_int2(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1)));
4924  c=0;
4925  }
4926  }
4927  }
4928 
4929  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
4930 
4931  if( datav.size()==1 ){
4932  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,datav.front());
4933  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
4934  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,HELIOS_TYPE_INT2,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
4935  }
4936 
4937  }
4938 
4939  for (pugi::xml_node data = p.child("data_int3"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data_int3")){
4940 
4941  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
4942  std::vector<int3> datav;
4943  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
4944  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
4945  std::vector<int> tmp;
4946  tmp.resize(3);
4947  int c = 0;
4948  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
4949  c++;
4950  if( c==3 ){
4951  datav.push_back(make_int3(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1),tmp.at(2)));
4952  c=0;
4953  }
4954  }
4955  }
4956 
4957  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
4958 
4959  if( datav.size()==1 ){
4960  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,datav.front());
4961  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
4962  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,HELIOS_TYPE_INT3,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
4963  }
4964 
4965  }
4966 
4967  for (pugi::xml_node data = p.child("data_int4"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data_int4")){
4968 
4969  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
4970  std::vector<int4> datav;
4971  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
4972  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
4973  std::vector<int> tmp;
4974  tmp.resize(4);
4975  int c = 0;
4976  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
4977  c++;
4978  if( c==4 ){
4979  datav.push_back(make_int4(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1),tmp.at(2),tmp.at(3)));
4980  c=0;
4981  }
4982  }
4983  }
4984 
4985  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
4986 
4987  if( datav.size()==1 ){
4988  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,datav.front());
4989  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
4990  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,HELIOS_TYPE_INT4,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
4991  }
4992 
4993  }
4994 
4995  for (pugi::xml_node data = p.child("data_string"); data; data = data.next_sibling("data_string")){
4996 
4997  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
4998  std::vector<std::string> datav;
4999  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
5000  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
5001  std::string tmp;
5002  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
5003  datav.push_back(tmp);
5004  }
5005  }
5006 
5007  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
5008 
5009  if( datav.size()==1 ){
5010  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,datav.front());
5011  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
5012  setPrimitiveData(UUID,label,HELIOS_TYPE_STRING,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
5013  }
5014 
5015  }
5016 
5017 }
5018 
5019 std::vector<uint> Context::loadXML( const char* filename ){
5020 
5021  std::cout << "Loading XML file: " << filename << "..." << std::flush;
5022 
5023  XMLfiles.push_back( filename );
5024 
5025  uint ID;
5026  std::vector<uint> UUID;
5027 
5028  // Using "pugixml" parser. See pugixml.org
5029  pugi::xml_document xmldoc;
5030 
5031  //load file
5032  pugi::xml_parse_result result = xmldoc.load_file(filename);
5033 
5034  //error checking
5035  if (!result){
5036  std::cout << "failed." << std::endl;
5037  std::cerr << "XML [" << filename << "] parsed with errors, attr value: [" << xmldoc.child("node").attribute("attr").value() << "]\n";
5038  std::cerr << "Error description: " << result.description() << "\n";
5039  std::cerr << "Error offset: " << result.offset << " (error at [..." << (filename + result.offset) << "]\n\n";
5040  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
5041  }
5042 
5043  pugi::xml_node helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
5044 
5045  if( helios.empty() ){
5046  std::cout << "failed." << std::endl;
5047  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadXML): XML file must have tag '<helios> ... </helios>' bounding all other tags." << std::endl;
5048  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
5049  }
5050 
5051  //-------------- TIME/DATE ---------------//
5052 
5053  for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child("date"); p; p = p.next_sibling("date")){
5054 
5055  pugi::xml_node year_node = p.child("year");
5056  const char* year_str = year_node.child_value();
5057  int year = atoi( year_str );
5058 
5059  pugi::xml_node month_node = p.child("month");
5060  const char* month_str = month_node.child_value();
5061  int month = atoi( month_str );
5062 
5063  pugi::xml_node day_node = p.child("day");
5064  const char* day_str = day_node.child_value();
5065  int day = atoi( day_str );
5066 
5067  setDate( day, month, year );
5068 
5069  }
5070 
5071  for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child("time"); p; p = p.next_sibling("time")){
5072 
5073  pugi::xml_node hour_node = p.child("hour");
5074  const char* hour_str = hour_node.child_value();
5075  int hour = atoi( hour_str );
5076 
5077  pugi::xml_node minute_node = p.child("minute");
5078  const char* minute_str = minute_node.child_value();
5079  int minute = atoi( minute_str );
5080 
5081  pugi::xml_node second_node = p.child("second");
5082  const char* second_str = second_node.child_value();
5083  int second = atoi( second_str );
5084 
5085  setTime( second, minute, hour );
5086 
5087  }
5088 
5089  //-------------- PATCHES ---------------//
5090  for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child("patch"); p; p = p.next_sibling("patch")){
5091 
5092  // * Patch Transformation Matrix * //
5093  float transform[16];
5094  pugi::xml_node transform_node = p.child("transform");
5095 
5096  //note: pugi loads xml data as a character. need to separate it into 3 floats
5097  const char* transform_str = transform_node.child_value();
5098  if( strlen(transform_str)==0 ){
5099  transform[0]=1.f;transform[1]=0.f;transform[2]=0.f;transform[3]=0.f;
5100  transform[4]=0.f;transform[5]=1.f;transform[6]=0.f;transform[7]=0.f;
5101  transform[8]=0.f;transform[9]=0.f;transform[10]=1.f;transform[11]=0.f;
5102  transform[12]=0.f;transform[13]=0.f;transform[14]=0.f;transform[15]=1.f;
5103  }else{
5104  std::istringstream stream(transform_str);
5105  float tmp;
5106  int i=0;
5107  while( stream >> tmp ){
5108  transform[i] = tmp;
5109  i++;
5110  }
5111  if( i!=16 ){
5112  std::cout << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): Transformation matrix does not have 16 elements. Assuming identity matrix." << std::endl;
5113  transform[0]=1.f;transform[1]=0.f;transform[2]=0.f;transform[3]=0.f;
5114  transform[4]=0.f;transform[5]=1.f;transform[6]=0.f;transform[7]=0.f;
5115  transform[8]=0.f;transform[9]=0.f;transform[10]=1.f;transform[11]=0.f;
5116  transform[12]=0.f;transform[13]=0.f;transform[14]=0.f;transform[15]=1.f;
5117  }
5118  }
5119 
5120  // * Patch Texture * //
5121  std::string texture_file;
5122  pugi::xml_node texture_node = p.child("texture");
5123  const char* texfile = deblank(texture_node.child_value());
5124  if( strlen(texfile)==0 ){
5125  texture_file = "none";
5126  }else{
5127  texture_file = texfile;
5128  }
5129 
5130  // * Patch Texture (u,v) Coordinates * //
5131  std::vector<vec2> uv;
5132  pugi::xml_node uv_node = p.child("textureUV");
5133  const char* texUV = uv_node.child_value();
5134  if( strlen(texUV)>0 ){
5135  std::istringstream uv_stream(texUV);
5136  std::vector<float> tmp;
5137  tmp.resize(2);
5138  int c = 0;
5139  while( uv_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
5140  c++;
5141  if( c==2 ){
5142  uv.push_back(make_vec2(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1)));
5143  c=0;
5144  }
5145  }
5146  if( c!=0 ){
5147  std::cerr << "WARNING (loadXML): textureUV for patch does not contain an even number of elements. Skipping..." << std::endl;
5148  uv.resize(0);
5149  }
5150  if( uv.size()!=4 ){
5151  std::cerr << "WARNING (loadXML): textureUV for patch does not contain four pairs of (u,v) coordinates. Skipping..." << std::endl;
5152  uv.resize(0);
5153  }
5154  }
5155 
5156  // * Patch Diffuse Colors * //
5157  RGBAcolor color;
5158  pugi::xml_node color_node = p.child("color");
5159 
5160  //note: pugi loads xml data as a character. need to separate it into 2 floats
5161  const char* color_str = color_node.child_value();
5162  if( strlen(color_str)==0 ){
5163  color = make_RGBAcolor(0,0,0,1);//assume default color of black
5164  }else{
5165  color=string2RGBcolor(color_str);
5166  }
5167 
5168  // * Add the Patch * //
5169  if( strcmp(texture_file.c_str(),"none")==0 ){
5170  ID=addPatch( make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec2(1,1), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), color );
5171  }else{
5172  if( uv.size()==0 ){
5173  ID=addPatch( make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec2(1,1), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), texture_file.c_str() );
5174  }else{
5175  ID=addPatch( make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec2(1,1), make_SphericalCoord(0,0), texture_file.c_str(), 0.5*(uv.at(2)+uv.at(0)), uv.at(2)-uv.at(0) );
5176  }
5177  }
5178  getPrimitivePointer(ID)->setTransformationMatrix(transform);
5179 
5180  UUID.push_back(ID);
5181 
5182  //vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv//
5183  //This is for backward compatability (<v0.5.3)//
5184  //vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv//
5185 
5186  // * Patch Centers * //
5187  vec3 center;
5188  pugi::xml_node center_node = p.child("center");
5189 
5190  //note: pugi loads xml data as a character. need to separate it into 3 floats
5191  const char* center_str = center_node.child_value();
5192  if( strlen(center_str)!=0 ){
5193  center=string2vec3(center_str);
5194  getPatchPointer(ID)->translate(center);
5195  }
5196 
5197  // * Patch Sizes * //
5198  vec2 size;
5199  pugi::xml_node size_node = p.child("size");
5200 
5201  //note: pugi loads xml data as a character. need to separate it into 2 floats
5202  const char* size_str = size_node.child_value();
5203  if( strlen(size_str)!=0 ){
5204  size=string2vec2(size_str);
5205  getPatchPointer(ID)->scale(make_vec3(size.x,size.y,1));
5206  }
5207 
5208  // * Patch Rotations * //
5209  SphericalCoord rotation;
5210  pugi::xml_node rotation_node = p.child("rotation");
5211 
5212  //note: pugi loads xml data as a character. need to separate it into 2 floats
5213  const char* rotation_str = rotation_node.child_value();
5214  if( strlen(rotation_str)!=0 ){
5215  vec2 rot = string2vec2(rotation_str);
5216  getPatchPointer(ID)->rotate(rot.x,"y");
5217  getPatchPointer(ID)->rotate(rot.y,"z");
5218  }
5219 
5220  //^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^//
5221 
5222  // * Primitive Data * //
5223 
5224  loadPData( p, ID );
5225 
5226  }//end patches
5227 
5228  //-------------- TRIANGLES ---------------//
5229 
5230  //looping over any triangles specified in XML file
5231  for (pugi::xml_node tri = helios.child("triangle"); tri; tri = tri.next_sibling("triangle")){
5232 
5233  // * Triangle Transformation Matrix * //
5234  float transform[16];
5235  pugi::xml_node transform_node = tri.child("transform");
5236 
5237  //note: pugi loads xml data as a character. need to separate it into 3 floats
5238  const char* transform_str = transform_node.child_value();
5239  if( strlen(transform_str)==0 ){
5240  transform[0]=1.f;transform[1]=0.f;transform[2]=0.f;transform[3]=0.f;
5241  transform[4]=0.f;transform[5]=1.f;transform[6]=0.f;transform[7]=0.f;
5242  transform[8]=0.f;transform[9]=0.f;transform[10]=1.f;transform[11]=0.f;
5243  transform[12]=0.f;transform[13]=0.f;transform[14]=0.f;transform[15]=1.f;
5244  }else{
5245  std::istringstream stream(transform_str);
5246  float tmp;
5247  int i=0;
5248  while( stream >> tmp ){
5249  transform[i] = tmp;
5250  i++;
5251  }
5252  if( i!=16 ){
5253  std::cout << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): Transformation matrix does not have 16 elements. Assuming identity matrix." << std::endl;
5254  transform[0]=1.f;transform[1]=0.f;transform[2]=0.f;transform[3]=0.f;
5255  transform[4]=0.f;transform[5]=1.f;transform[6]=0.f;transform[7]=0.f;
5256  transform[8]=0.f;transform[9]=0.f;transform[10]=1.f;transform[11]=0.f;
5257  transform[12]=0.f;transform[13]=0.f;transform[14]=0.f;transform[15]=1.f;
5258  }
5259  }
5260 
5261  // * Triangle Texture * //
5262  std::string texture_file;
5263  pugi::xml_node texture_node = tri.child("texture");
5264  const char* texfile = deblank(texture_node.child_value());
5265  if( strlen(texfile)==0 ){
5266  texture_file = "none";
5267  }else{
5268  texture_file = texfile;
5269  }
5270 
5271  // * Triangle Texture (u,v) Coordinates * //
5272  std::vector<vec2> uv;
5273  pugi::xml_node uv_node = tri.child("textureUV");
5274  const char* texUV = uv_node.child_value();
5275  if( strlen(texUV)>0 ){
5276  std::istringstream uv_stream(texUV);
5277  std::vector<float> tmp;
5278  tmp.resize(2);
5279  int c = 0;
5280  while( uv_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
5281  c++;
5282  if( c==2 ){
5283  uv.push_back(make_vec2(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1)));
5284  c=0;
5285  }
5286  }
5287  if( c!=0 ){
5288  std::cerr << "WARNING (loadXML): textureUV for patch does not contain an even number of elements. Skipping..." << std::endl;
5289  uv.resize(0);
5290  }
5291  if( uv.size()!=3 ){
5292  std::cerr << "WARNING (loadXML): textureUV for triangle does not contain three pairs of (u,v) coordinates. Skipping..." << std::endl;
5293  uv.resize(0);
5294  }
5295  }
5296 
5297  // * Triangle Diffuse Colors * //
5298  RGBAcolor color;
5299  pugi::xml_node color_node = tri.child("color");
5300 
5301  //note: pugi loads xml data as a character. need to separate it into 2 floats
5302  const char* color_str = color_node.child_value();
5303  if( strlen(color_str)==0 ){
5304  color = make_RGBAcolor(0,0,0,1);//assume default color of black
5305  }else{
5306  color=string2RGBcolor(color_str);
5307  }
5308 
5309  //vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv//
5310  //This is for backward compatability (<v0.5.3)//
5311  //vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv//
5312 
5313  // * Triangle Vertices //
5314  std::vector<vec3> vert_pos;
5315  vert_pos.resize(3);
5316 
5317  pugi::xml_node vertices = tri.child("vertex");
5318 
5319  for(int i=0;i<3;i++){
5320 
5321  //note: pugi loads xml data as a character. need to separate it into 3 floats
5322  const char* str = vertices.child_value();
5323  vert_pos.at(i)=string2vec3(str);
5324 
5325  if( strlen(str)==0 ){
5326  if( i==0 ){
5327  break;
5328  }else if( i==1 ){
5329  std::cout << "failed." << std::endl;
5330  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadXML): Only 1 vertex was given for triangle #" << tri << " (requires 3)." << std::endl;
5331  }else if( i==2) {
5332  std::cout << "failed." << std::endl;
5333  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadXML): Only 2 vertices were given for triangle #" << tri << " (requires 3)." << std::endl;
5334  }
5335  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
5336  }
5337 
5338  vertices = vertices.next_sibling("vertex");
5339 
5340  }
5341 
5342  //^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^//
5343 
5344  // * Add the Triangle * //
5345  if( strcmp(texture_file.c_str(),"none")==0 || uv.size()==0 ){
5346  ID = addTriangle( vert_pos.at(0), vert_pos.at(1), vert_pos.at(2), color );
5347  }else{
5348  ID = addTriangle( vert_pos.at(0), vert_pos.at(1), vert_pos.at(2), texture_file.c_str(), uv.at(0), uv.at(1), uv.at(2) );
5349  }
5350  getPrimitivePointer(ID)->setTransformationMatrix(transform);
5351 
5352  UUID.push_back(ID);
5353 
5354  // * Primitive Data * //
5355 
5356  loadPData( tri, ID );
5357 
5358  }
5359 
5360  //-------------- VOXELS ---------------//
5361  for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child("voxel"); p; p = p.next_sibling("voxel")){
5362 
5363  // * Voxel Transformation Matrix * //
5364  float transform[16];
5365  pugi::xml_node transform_node = p.child("transform");
5366 
5367  //note: pugi loads xml data as a character. need to separate it into 3 floats
5368  const char* transform_str = transform_node.child_value();
5369  if( strlen(transform_str)==0 ){
5370  transform[0]=1.f;transform[1]=0.f;transform[2]=0.f;transform[3]=0.f;
5371  transform[4]=0.f;transform[5]=1.f;transform[6]=0.f;transform[7]=0.f;
5372  transform[8]=0.f;transform[9]=0.f;transform[10]=1.f;transform[11]=0.f;
5373  transform[12]=0.f;transform[13]=0.f;transform[14]=0.f;transform[15]=1.f;
5374  }else{
5375  std::istringstream stream(transform_str);
5376  float tmp;
5377  int i=0;
5378  while( stream >> tmp ){
5379  transform[i] = tmp;
5380  i++;
5381  }
5382  if( i!=16 ){
5383  std::cout << "WARNING (Context::loadXML): Transformation matrix does not have 16 elements. Assuming identity matrix." << std::endl;
5384  transform[0]=1.f;transform[1]=0.f;transform[2]=0.f;transform[3]=0.f;
5385  transform[4]=0.f;transform[5]=1.f;transform[6]=0.f;transform[7]=0.f;
5386  transform[8]=0.f;transform[9]=0.f;transform[10]=1.f;transform[11]=0.f;
5387  transform[12]=0.f;transform[13]=0.f;transform[14]=0.f;transform[15]=1.f;
5388  }
5389  }
5390 
5391  // * Voxel Diffuse Colors * //
5392  RGBAcolor color;
5393  pugi::xml_node color_node = p.child("color");
5394 
5395  //note: pugi loads xml data as a character. need to separate it into 2 floats
5396  const char* color_str = color_node.child_value();
5397  if( strlen(color_str)==0 ){
