5398  color = make_RGBAcolor(0,0,0,1);//assume default color of black
5399  }else{
5400  color=string2RGBcolor(color_str);
5401  }
5402 
5403  // * Add the Voxel * //
5404  ID = addVoxel( make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec3(0,0,0), 0, color );
5405  getPrimitivePointer(ID)->setTransformationMatrix(transform);
5406 
5407  UUID.push_back(ID);
5408 
5409  //vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv//
5410  //This is for backward compatability (<v0.5.3)//
5411  //vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv//
5412 
5413  // * Voxel Centers * //
5414  vec3 center;
5415  pugi::xml_node center_node = p.child("center");
5416 
5417  //note: pugi loads xml data as a character. need to separate it into 3 floats
5418  const char* center_str = center_node.child_value();
5419  if( strlen(center_str)!=0 ){
5420  center=string2vec3(center_str);
5421  getVoxelPointer(ID)->translate(center);
5422  }
5423 
5424  // * Voxel Sizes * //
5425  vec3 size;
5426  pugi::xml_node size_node = p.child("size");
5427 
5428  //note: pugi loads xml data as a character. need to separate it into 2 floats
5429  const char* size_str = size_node.child_value();
5430  if( strlen(size_str)!=0 ){
5431  size=string2vec3(size_str);
5432  getVoxelPointer(ID)->translate(size);
5433  }
5434 
5435  // * Voxel Rotation * //
5436  float rotation;
5437  pugi::xml_node rotation_node = p.child("rotation");
5438 
5439  //note: pugi loads xml data as a character. need to separate it into 2 floats
5440  const char* rotation_str = rotation_node.child_value();
5441  if( strlen(rotation_str)!=0 ){
5442  rotation = atof(rotation_str);
5443  getVoxelPointer(ID)->rotate(rotation,"z");
5444  }
5445 
5446  //^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^//
5447 
5448  // * Primitive Data * //
5449 
5450  loadPData( p, ID );
5451 
5452  }
5453 
5454  //-------------- GLOBAL DATA ---------------//
5455 
5456  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_int"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_int")){
5457 
5458  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
5459  std::vector<int> datav;
5460  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
5461  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
5462  int tmp;
5463  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
5464  datav.push_back(tmp);
5465  }
5466  }
5467 
5468  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
5469 
5470  if( datav.size()==1 ){
5471  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
5472  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
5473  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_INT,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
5474  }
5475 
5476  }
5477 
5478  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_uint"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_uint")){
5479 
5480  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
5481  std::vector<uint> datav;
5482  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
5483  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
5484  uint tmp;
5485  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
5486  datav.push_back(tmp);
5487  }
5488  }
5489 
5490  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
5491 
5492  if( datav.size()==1 ){
5493  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
5494  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
5495  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_UINT,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
5496  }
5497 
5498  }
5499 
5500  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_float"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_float")){
5501 
5502  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
5503  std::vector<float> datav;
5504  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
5505  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
5506  float tmp;
5507  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
5508  datav.push_back(tmp);
5509  }
5510  }
5511 
5512  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
5513 
5514  if( datav.size()==1 ){
5515  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
5516  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
5517  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
5518  }
5519 
5520  }
5521 
5522  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_double"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_double")){
5523 
5524  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
5525  std::vector<double> datav;
5526  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
5527  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
5528  double tmp;
5529  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
5530  datav.push_back(tmp);
5531  }
5532  }
5533 
5534  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
5535 
5536  if( datav.size()==1 ){
5537  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
5538  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
5539  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
5540  }
5541 
5542  }
5543 
5544  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_vec2"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_vec2")){
5545 
5546  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
5547  std::vector<vec2> datav;
5548  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
5549  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
5550  std::vector<float> tmp;
5551  tmp.resize(2);
5552  int c = 0;
5553  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
5554  c++;
5555  if( c==2 ){
5556  datav.push_back(make_vec2(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1)));
5557  c=0;
5558  }
5559  }
5560  }
5561 
5562  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
5563 
5564  if( datav.size()==1 ){
5565  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
5566  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
5567  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
5568  }
5569 
5570  }
5571 
5572  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_vec3"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_vec3")){
5573 
5574  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
5575  std::vector<vec3> datav;
5576  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
5577  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
5578  std::vector<float> tmp;
5579  tmp.resize(3);
5580  int c = 0;
5581  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
5582  c++;
5583  if( c==3 ){
5584  datav.push_back(make_vec3(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1),tmp.at(2)));
5585  c=0;
5586  }
5587  }
5588  }
5589 
5590  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
5591 
5592  if( datav.size()==1 ){
5593  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
5594  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
5595  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
5596  }
5597 
5598  }
5599 
5600  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_vec4"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_vec4")){
5601 
5602  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
5603  std::vector<vec4> datav;
5604  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
5605  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
5606  std::vector<float> tmp;
5607  tmp.resize(4);
5608  int c = 0;
5609  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
5610  c++;
5611  if( c==4 ){
5612  datav.push_back(make_vec4(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1),tmp.at(2),tmp.at(3)));
5613  c=0;
5614  }
5615  }
5616  }
5617 
5618  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
5619 
5620  if( datav.size()==1 ){
5621  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
5622  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
5623  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
5624  }
5625 
5626  }
5627 
5628  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_int2"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_int2")){
5629 
5630  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
5631  std::vector<int2> datav;
5632  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
5633  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
5634  std::vector<int> tmp;
5635  tmp.resize(2);
5636  int c = 0;
5637  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
5638  c++;
5639  if( c==2 ){
5640  datav.push_back(make_int2(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1)));
5641  c=0;
5642  }
5643  }
5644  }
5645 
5646  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
5647 
5648  if( datav.size()==1 ){
5649  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
5650  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
5651  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_INT2,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
5652  }
5653 
5654  }
5655 
5656  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_int3"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_int3")){
5657 
5658  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
5659  std::vector<int3> datav;
5660  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
5661  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
5662  std::vector<int> tmp;
5663  tmp.resize(3);
5664  int c = 0;
5665  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
5666  c++;
5667  if( c==3 ){
5668  datav.push_back(make_int3(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1),tmp.at(2)));
5669  c=0;
5670  }
5671  }
5672  }
5673 
5674  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
5675 
5676  if( datav.size()==1 ){
5677  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
5678  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
5679  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_INT3,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
5680  }
5681 
5682  }
5683 
5684  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_int4"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_int4")){
5685 
5686  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
5687  std::vector<int4> datav;
5688  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
5689  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
5690  std::vector<int> tmp;
5691  tmp.resize(4);
5692  int c = 0;
5693  while( data_stream >> tmp.at(c) ){
5694  c++;
5695  if( c==4 ){
5696  datav.push_back(make_int4(tmp.at(0),tmp.at(1),tmp.at(2),tmp.at(3)));
5697  c=0;
5698  }
5699  }
5700  }
5701 
5702  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
5703 
5704  if( datav.size()==1 ){
5705  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
5706  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
5707  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_INT4,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
5708  }
5709 
5710  }
5711 
5712  for (pugi::xml_node data = helios.child("globaldata_string"); data; data = data.next_sibling("globaldata_string")){
5713 
5714  const char* data_str = data.child_value();
5715  std::vector<std::string> datav;
5716  if( strlen(data_str)>0 ){
5717  std::istringstream data_stream(data_str);
5718  std::string tmp;
5719  while( data_stream >> tmp ){
5720  datav.push_back(tmp);
5721  }
5722  }
5723 
5724  const char* label = data.attribute("label").value();
5725 
5726  if( datav.size()==1 ){
5727  setGlobalData(label,datav.front());
5728  }else if( datav.size()>1 ){
5729  setGlobalData(label,HELIOS_TYPE_STRING,datav.size(),&datav[0]);
5730  }
5731 
5732  }
5733 
5734  //-------------- TIMESERIES DATA ---------------//
5735  for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child("timeseries"); p; p = p.next_sibling("timeseries")){
5736 
5737  const char* label = p.attribute("label").value();
5738 
5739  for (pugi::xml_node d = p.child("datapoint"); d; d = d.next_sibling("datapoint")){
5740 
5741  Time time;
5742  pugi::xml_node time_node = d.child("time");
5743  const char* time_str = time_node.child_value();
5744  if( strlen(time_str)>0 ){
5745  int3 time_ = string2int3(time_str);
5746  if( time_.x<0 || time_.x>23 ){
5747  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadXML): Invalid hour of " << time_.x << " given in timeseries. Hour must be positive and not greater than 23." << std::endl;
5748  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
5749  }else if( time_.y<0 || time_.y>59 ){
5750  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadXML): Invalid minute of " << time_.y << " given in timeseries. Minute must be positive and not greater than 59." << std::endl;
5751  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
5752  }else if( time_.z<0 || time_.z>59 ){
5753  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadXML): Invalid second of " << time_.z << " given in timeseries. Second must be positive and not greater than 59." << std::endl;
5754  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
5755  }
5756  time = make_Time(time_.x, time_.y,time_.z);
5757  }else{
5758  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadXML): No time was specified for timeseries datapoint." << std::endl;
5759  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
5760  }
5761 
5762  Date date;
5763  bool date_flag=false;
5764 
5765  pugi::xml_node date_node = d.child("date");
5766  const char* date_str = date_node.child_value();
5767  if( strlen(date_str)>0 ){
5768  int3 date_ = string2int3(date_str);
5769  if( date_.x<1 || date_.x>31 ){
5770  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadXML): Invalid day of month " << date_.x << " given in timeseries. Day must be greater than zero and not greater than 31." << std::endl;
5771  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
5772  }else if( date_.y<1 || date_.y>12 ){
5773  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadXML): Invalid month of " << date_.y << " given in timeseries. Month must be greater than zero and not greater than 12." << std::endl;
5774  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
5775  }else if( date_.z<1000 || date_.z>10000 ){
5776  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadXML): Invalid year of " << date_.z << " given in timeseries. Year should be in YYYY format." << std::endl;
5777  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
5778  }
5779  date = make_Date(date_.x, date_.y, date_.z );
5780  date_flag=true;
5781  }
5782 
5783  pugi::xml_node Jdate_node = d.child("dateJulian");
5784  const char* Jdate_str = Jdate_node.child_value();
5785  if( strlen(Jdate_str)>0 ){
5786  int2 date_ = string2int2(Jdate_str);
5787  if( date_.x<1 || date_.x>366 ){
5788  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadXML): Invalid Julian day of year " << date_.x << " given in timeseries. Julian day must be greater than zero and not greater than 366." << std::endl;
5789  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
5790  }else if( date_.y<1000 || date_.y>10000 ){
5791  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadXML): Invalid year of " << date_.y << " given in timeseries. Year should be in YYYY format." << std::endl;
5792  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
5793  }
5794  date = Julian2Calendar( date_.x, date_.y );
5795  date_flag=true;
5796  }
5797 
5798  if( !date_flag ){
5799  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadXML): No date was specified for timeseries datapoint." << std::endl;
5800  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
5801  }
5802 
5803  float value;
5804  pugi::xml_node value_node = d.child("value");
5805  const char* value_str = value_node.child_value();
5806  if( strlen(value_str)>0 ){
5807  value = atof(value_str);
5808  }else{
5809  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadXML): No value was specified for timeseries datapoint." << std::endl;
5810  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
5811  }
5812 
5813  addTimeseriesData(label,value,date,time);
5814 
5815  }
5816 
5817  }
5818 
5819  std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
5820 
5821  return UUID;
5822 
5823 }
5824 
5825 std::vector<std::string> Context::getLoadedXMLFiles( void ){
5826  return XMLfiles;
5827 }
5828 
5829 void Context::writeXML( const char* filename ) const{
5830  std::cout << "Writing XML file " << filename << "..." << std::flush;
5831 
5832  std::ofstream outfile;
5833  outfile.open(filename);
5834 
5835  outfile << "<?xml version=\"1.0\"?>\n\n";
5836 
5837  outfile << "<helios>\n\n";
5838 
5839  // -- time/date -- //
5840 
5841  Date date = getDate();
5842 
5843  outfile << " <date>" << std::endl;
5844 
5845  outfile << "\t<day>" << date.day << "</day>" << std::endl;
5846  outfile << "\t<month>" << date.month << "</month>" << std::endl;
5847  outfile << "\t<year>" << date.year << "</year>" << std::endl;
5848 
5849  outfile << " </date>" << std::endl;
5850 
5851  Time time = getTime();
5852 
5853  outfile << " <time>" << std::endl;
5854 
5855  outfile << "\t<hour>" << time.hour << "</hour>" << std::endl;
5856  outfile << "\t<minute>" << time.minute << "</minute>" << std::endl;
5857  outfile << "\t<second>" << time.second << "</second>" << std::endl;
5858 
5859  outfile << " </time>" << std::endl;
5860 
5861  // -- primitive stuff -- //
5862 
5863  for( std::map<uint,Primitive*>::const_iterator iter = primitives.begin(); iter != primitives.end(); ++iter ){
5864 
5865  uint p = iter->first;
5866 
5867  Primitive* prim = getPrimitivePointer(p);
5868 
5869  RGBAcolor color = prim->getColorRGBA();
5870 
5871  std::string texture_file = prim->getTextureFile();
5872 
5873  std::vector<std::string> pdata = prim->listPrimitiveData();
5874 
5875  if( prim->getType()==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH ){
5876  outfile << " <patch>" << std::endl;
5877  }else if( prim->getType()==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE ){
5878  outfile << " <triangle>" << std::endl;
5879  }else if( prim->getType()==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_VOXEL ){
5880  outfile << " <voxel>" << std::endl;
5881  }
5882 
5883  outfile << "\t<UUID>" << p << "</UUID>" << std::endl;
5884  outfile << "\t<color>" << color.r << " " << color.g << " " << color.b << " " << color.a << "</color>" << std::endl;
5885  if( prim->hasTexture() ){
5886  outfile << "\t<texture>" << texture_file << "</texture>" << std::endl;
5887  }
5888  if( pdata.size()>0 ){
5889  for( int i=0; i<pdata.size(); i++ ){
5890  std::string label = pdata.at(i);
5891  size_t dsize = prim->getPrimitiveDataSize( label.c_str() );
5892  HeliosDataType dtype = prim->getPrimitiveDataType( label.c_str() );
5893  if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
5894  outfile << "\t<data_uint label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
5895  std::vector<uint> data;
5896  prim->getPrimitiveData( label.c_str(), data );
5897  for( int j=0; j<data.size(); j++ ){
5898  outfile << data.at(j) << std::flush;
5899  if( j!=data.size()-1 ){
5900  outfile << " " << std::flush;
5901  }
5902  }
5903  outfile << "</data_uint>" << std::endl;
5904  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
5905  outfile << "\t<data_int label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
5906  std::vector<int> data;
5907  prim->getPrimitiveData( label.c_str(), data );
5908  for( int j=0; j<data.size(); j++ ){
5909  outfile << data.at(j) << std::flush;
5910  if( j!=data.size()-1 ){
5911  outfile << " " << std::flush;
5912  }
5913  }
5914  outfile << "</data_int>" << std::endl;
5915  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
5916  outfile << "\t<data_float label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
5917  std::vector<float> data;
5918  prim->getPrimitiveData( label.c_str(), data );
5919  for( int j=0; j<data.size(); j++ ){
5920  outfile << data.at(j) << std::flush;
5921  if( j!=data.size()-1 ){
5922  outfile << " " << std::flush;
5923  }
5924  }
5925  outfile << "</data_float>" << std::endl;
5926  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
5927  outfile << "\t<data_double label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
5928  std::vector<double> data;
5929  prim->getPrimitiveData( label.c_str(), data );
5930  for( int j=0; j<data.size(); j++ ){
5931  outfile << data.at(j) << std::flush;
5932  if( j!=data.size()-1 ){
5933  outfile << " " << std::flush;
5934  }
5935  }
5936  outfile << "</data_double>" << std::endl;
5937  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
5938  outfile << "\t<data_vec2 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
5939  std::vector<vec2> data;
5940  prim->getPrimitiveData( label.c_str(), data );
5941  for( int j=0; j<data.size(); j++ ){
5942  outfile << data.at(j).x << " " << data.at(j).y << std::flush;
5943  if( j!=data.size()-1 ){
5944  outfile << " " << std::flush;
5945  }
5946  }
5947  outfile << "</data_vec2>" << std::endl;
5948  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
5949  outfile << "\t<data_vec3 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
5950  std::vector<vec3> data;
5951  prim->getPrimitiveData( label.c_str(), data );
5952  for( int j=0; j<data.size(); j++ ){
5953  outfile << data.at(j).x << " " << data.at(j).y << " " << data.at(j).z << std::flush;
5954  if( j!=data.size()-1 ){
5955  outfile << " " << std::flush;
5956  }
5957  }
5958  outfile << "</data_vec3>" << std::endl;
5959  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
5960  outfile << "\t<data_vec4 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
5961  std::vector<vec4> data;
5962  prim->getPrimitiveData( label.c_str(), data );
5963  for( int j=0; j<data.size(); j++ ){
5964  outfile << data.at(j).x << " " << data.at(j).y << " " << data.at(j).z << " " << data.at(j).w << std::flush;
5965  if( j!=data.size()-1 ){
5966  outfile << " " << std::flush;
5967  }
5968  }
5969  outfile << "</data_vec4>" << std::endl;
5970  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
5971  outfile << "\t<data_int2 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
5972  std::vector<int2> data;
5973  prim->getPrimitiveData( label.c_str(), data );
5974  for( int j=0; j<data.size(); j++ ){
5975  outfile << data.at(j).x << " " << data.at(j).y << std::flush;
5976  if( j!=data.size()-1 ){
5977  outfile << " " << std::flush;
5978  }
5979  }
5980  outfile << "</data_int2>" << std::endl;
5981  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
5982  outfile << "\t<data_int3 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
5983  std::vector<int3> data;
5984  prim->getPrimitiveData( label.c_str(), data );
5985  for( int j=0; j<data.size(); j++ ){
5986  outfile << data.at(j).x << " " << data.at(j).y << " " << data.at(j).z << std::flush;
5987  if( j!=data.size()-1 ){
5988  outfile << " " << std::flush;
5989  }
5990  }
5991  outfile << "</data_int3>" << std::endl;
5992  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
5993  outfile << "\t<data_int3 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
5994  std::vector<int4> data;
5995  prim->getPrimitiveData( label.c_str(), data );
5996  for( int j=0; j<data.size(); j++ ){
5997  outfile << data.at(j).x << " " << data.at(j).y << " " << data.at(j).z << " " << data.at(j).w << std::flush;
5998  if( j!=data.size()-1 ){
5999  outfile << " " << std::flush;
6000  }
6001  }
6002  outfile << "</data_int4>" << std::endl;
6003  }else if( dtype==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
6004  outfile << "\t<data_string label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
6005  std::vector<std::string> data;
6006  prim->getPrimitiveData( label.c_str(), data );
6007  for( int j=0; j<data.size(); j++ ){
6008  outfile << data.at(j) << std::flush;
6009  if( j!=data.size()-1 ){
6010  outfile << " " << std::flush;
6011  }
6012  }
6013  outfile << "</data_string>" << std::endl;
6014  }
6015  }
6016  }
6017 
6018  //Patches
6019  if( prim->getType()==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH ){
6020 
6021  Patch* patch = getPatchPointer(p);
6022  float transform[16];
6023  prim->getTransformationMatrix(transform);
6024 
6025  outfile << "\t<transform> ";
6026  for( int i=0; i<16; i++ ){
6027  outfile << transform[i] << " ";
6028  }
6029  outfile << "</transform>" << std::endl;
6030  std::vector<vec2> uv = patch->getTextureUV();
6031  if( uv.size()>0 ){
6032  outfile << "\t<textureUV>" << std::flush;
6033  for( int i=0; i<uv.size(); i++ ){
6034  outfile << uv.at(i).x << " " << uv.at(i).y << std::flush;
6035  if( i!=uv.size()-1 ){
6036  outfile << " " << std::flush;
6037  }
6038  }
6039  outfile << "</textureUV>" << std::endl;
6040  }
6041  outfile << " </patch>" << std::endl;
6042 
6043  //Triangles
6044  }else if( prim->getType()==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE ){
6045 
6046  float transform[16];
6047  prim->getTransformationMatrix(transform);
6048 
6049  outfile << "\t<transform> ";
6050  for( int i=0; i<16; i++ ){
6051  outfile << transform[i] << " ";
6052  }
6053  outfile << "</transform>" << std::endl;
6054 
6055  std::vector<vec2> uv = getTrianglePointer(p)->getTextureUV();
6056  if( uv.size()>0 ){
6057  outfile << "\t<textureUV>" << std::flush;
6058  for( int i=0; i<uv.size(); i++ ){
6059  outfile << uv.at(i).x << " " << uv.at(i).y << std::flush;
6060  if( i!=uv.size()-1 ){
6061  outfile << " " << std::flush;
6062  }
6063  }
6064  outfile << "</textureUV>" << std::endl;
6065  }
6066  outfile << " </triangle>" << std::endl;
6067 
6068  //Voxels
6069  }else if( prim->getType()==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_VOXEL ){
6070 
6071  float transform[16];
6072  prim->getTransformationMatrix(transform);
6073 
6074  outfile << "\t<transform> ";
6075  for( int i=0; i<16; i++ ){
6076  outfile << transform[i] << " ";
6077  }
6078  outfile << "</transform>" << std::endl;
6079 
6080  outfile << " </voxel>" << std::endl;
6081 
6082  }
6083 
6084  }
6085 
6086  // -- global data -- //
6087 
6088  for( std::map<std::string, GlobalData>::const_iterator iter=globaldata.begin(); iter!=globaldata.end(); ++iter ){
6089  std::string label = iter->first;
6090  GlobalData data = iter->second;
6091  HeliosDataType type = data.type;
6092  if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_UINT ){
6093  outfile << " <globaldata_uint label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
6094  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
6095  outfile << data.global_data_uint.at(i) << std::flush;
6096  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
6097  outfile << " " << std::flush;
6098  }
6099  }
6100  outfile << "</globaldata_uint>" << std::endl;
6101  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT ){
6102  outfile << " <globaldata_int label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
6103  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
6104  outfile << data.global_data_int.at(i) << std::flush;
6105  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
6106  outfile << " " << std::flush;
6107  }
6108  }
6109  outfile << "</globaldata_int>" << std::endl;
6110  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT ){
6111  outfile << " <globaldata_float label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
6112  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
6113  outfile << data.global_data_float.at(i) << std::flush;
6114  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
6115  outfile << " " << std::flush;
6116  }
6117  }
6118  outfile << "</globaldata_float>" << std::endl;
6119  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE ){
6120  outfile << " <globaldata_double label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
6121  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
6122  outfile << data.global_data_double.at(i) << std::flush;
6123  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
6124  outfile << " " << std::flush;
6125  }
6126  }
6127  outfile << "</globaldata_double>" << std::endl;
6128  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC2 ){
6129  outfile << " <globaldata_vec2 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
6130  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
6131  outfile << data.global_data_vec2.at(i).x << " " << data.global_data_vec2.at(i).y << std::flush;
6132  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
6133  outfile << " " << std::flush;
6134  }
6135  }
6136  outfile << "</globaldata_vec2>" << std::endl;
6137  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC3 ){
6138  outfile << " <globaldata_vec3 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
6139  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
6140  outfile << data.global_data_vec3.at(i).x << " " << data.global_data_vec3.at(i).y << " " << data.global_data_vec3.at(i).z << std::flush;
6141  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
6142  outfile << " " << std::flush;
6143  }
6144  }
6145  outfile << "</globaldata_vec3>" << std::endl;
6146  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_VEC4 ){
6147  outfile << " <globaldata_vec4 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
6148  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
6149  outfile << data.global_data_vec4.at(i).x << " " << data.global_data_vec4.at(i).y << " " << data.global_data_vec4.at(i).z << " " << data.global_data_vec4.at(i).w << std::flush;
6150  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
6151  outfile << " " << std::flush;
6152  }
6153  }
6154  outfile << "</globaldata_vec4>" << std::endl;
6155  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT2 ){
6156  outfile << " <globaldata_int2 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
6157  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
6158  outfile << data.global_data_int2.at(i).x << " " << data.global_data_int2.at(i).y << std::flush;
6159  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
6160  outfile << " " << std::flush;
6161  }
6162  }
6163  outfile << "</globaldata_int2>" << std::endl;
6164  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT3 ){
6165  outfile << " <globaldata_int3 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
6166  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
6167  outfile << data.global_data_int3.at(i).x << " " << data.global_data_int3.at(i).y << data.global_data_int3.at(i).z << std::flush;
6168  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
6169  outfile << " " << std::flush;
6170  }
6171  }
6172  outfile << "</globaldata_int3>" << std::endl;
6173  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_INT4 ){
6174  outfile << " <globaldata_int4 label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
6175  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
6176  outfile << data.global_data_int4.at(i).x << " " << data.global_data_int4.at(i).y << data.global_data_int4.at(i).z << data.global_data_int4.at(i).w << std::flush;
6177  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
6178  outfile << " " << std::flush;
6179  }
6180  }
6181  outfile << "</globaldata_int4>" << std::endl;
6182  }else if( type==HELIOS_TYPE_STRING ){
6183  outfile << " <globaldata_string label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::flush;
6184  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size; i++ ){
6185  outfile << data.global_data_string.at(i) << std::flush;
6186  if( i!=data.size-1 ){
6187  outfile << " " << std::flush;
6188  }
6189  }
6190  outfile << "</globaldata_string>" << std::endl;
6191  }
6192 
6193  }
6194 
6195  // -- timeseries -- //
6196 
6197  for( std::map<std::string, std::vector<float> >::const_iterator iter=timeseries_data.begin(); iter!=timeseries_data.end(); ++iter ){
6198 
6199  std::string label = iter->first;
6200 
6201  std::vector<float> data = iter->second;
6202  std::vector<double> dateval = timeseries_datevalue.at(label);
6203 
6204  assert( data.size()==dateval.size() );
6205 
6206  outfile << " <timeseries label=\"" << label << "\">" << std::endl;
6207 
6208  for( size_t i=0; i<data.size(); i++ ){
6209 
6210  Date date = queryTimeseriesDate( label.c_str(), i );
6211  Time time = queryTimeseriesTime( label.c_str(), i );
6212 
6213  outfile << "\t<datapoint>" << std::endl;
6214 
6215  outfile << "\t <date>" << date.day << " " << date.month << " " << date.year << "</date>" << std::endl;
6216 
6217  outfile << "\t <time>" << time.hour << " " << time.minute << " " << time.second << "</time>" << std::endl;
6218 
6219  outfile << "\t <value>" << data.at(i) << "</value>" << std::endl;
6220 
6221  outfile << "\t</datapoint>" << std::endl;
6222  }
6223 
6224  outfile << " </timeseries>" << std::endl;
6225 
6226  }
6227 
6228  // ----------------- //
6229 
6230  outfile << "\n</helios>\n";
6231 
6232  outfile.close();
6233 
6234  std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
6235 }
6236 
6237 std::vector<uint> Context::loadPLY( const char* filename, const vec3 origin, const float height ){
6238  return loadPLY( filename, origin, height, make_SphericalCoord(0,0), make_RGBcolor(0,0,1) );
6239 }
6240 
6241 std::vector<uint> Context::loadPLY( const char* filename, const vec3 origin, const float height, const SphericalCoord rotation ){
6242  return loadPLY( filename, origin, height, rotation, make_RGBcolor(0,0,1) );
6243 }
6244 
6245 std::vector<uint> Context::loadPLY( const char* filename, const vec3 origin, const float height, const RGBcolor default_color ){
6246  return loadPLY( filename, origin, height, make_SphericalCoord(0,0), default_color );
6247 }
6248 
6249 std::vector<uint> Context::loadPLY( const char* filename, const vec3 origin, const float height, const SphericalCoord rotation, const RGBcolor default_color ){
6250 
6251  std::cout << "Reading PLY file " << filename << "..." << std::flush;
6252 
6253  std::string line, prop;
6254 
6255  uint vertexCount=0, faceCount=0;
6256 
6257  std::vector<vec3> vertices;
6258  std::vector<std::vector<int> > faces;
6259  std::vector<RGBcolor> colors;
6260  std::vector<std::string> properties;
6261 
6262  bool ifColor=false;
6263 
6264  std::ifstream inputPly;
6265  inputPly.open(filename);
6266 
6267  if (!inputPly.is_open()) {
6268  std::cerr << "Couldn't open " << filename << std::endl;;
6269  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
6270  }
6271 
6272  //--- read header info -----//
6273 
6274  //first line should always be 'ply'
6275  inputPly>>line;
6276  if( strcmp("ply",line.c_str())!=0 ){
6277  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadPLY): " << filename << " is not a PLY file." << std::endl;
6278  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
6279  }
6280 
6281  //read format
6282  inputPly>>line;
6283  if( strcmp("format",line.c_str())!=0 ){
6284  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadPLY): could not determine data format of " << filename << std::endl;
6285  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
6286  }
6287 
6288  inputPly>>line;
6289  if( strcmp("ascii",line.c_str())!=0 ){
6290  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadPLY): Only ASCII data types are supported." << std::endl;
6291  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
6292  }
6293 
6294  while(strcmp("end_header",line.c_str())!=0){
6295 
6296  inputPly>>line;
6297 
6298  if( strcmp("comment",line.c_str())==0 ){
6299  getline(inputPly, line);
6300  }
6301  else if( strcmp("element",line.c_str())==0 ){
6302 
6303  inputPly>>line;
6304 
6305  if( strcmp("vertex",line.c_str())==0 ){
6306  inputPly>>vertexCount;
6307  }else if( strcmp("face",line.c_str())==0 ){
6308  inputPly>>faceCount;
6309  }
6310 
6311 
6312  }else if( strcmp("property",line.c_str())==0 ){
6313 
6314  inputPly>>line; //type
6315 
6316  if( strcmp("list",line.c_str())!=0 ){
6317 
6318  inputPly>>prop; //value
6319  properties.push_back(prop);
6320 
6321  }
6322 
6323  }
6324 
6325 
6326  }
6327 
6328  for( uint i=0; i<properties.size(); i++ ){
6329  if( strcmp(properties.at(i).c_str(),"red")==0 ){
6330  ifColor = true;
6331  }
6332  }
6333  std::cout<< "forming " << faceCount << " triangles..." << std::flush;
6334 
6335  vertices.resize(vertexCount);
6336  colors.resize(vertexCount);
6337  faces.resize(faceCount);
6338 
6339 
6340  //--- read vertices ----//
6341 
6342  for( uint row=0; row<vertexCount; row++ ){
6343 
6344  for( uint i=0; i<properties.size(); i++ ){
6345  if( strcmp(properties.at(i).c_str(),"x")==0 ){ //Note: permuting x,y,z to match our coordinate system (z-vertical instead of y-vertical)
6346  inputPly >> vertices.at(row).y;
6347  }else if( strcmp(properties.at(i).c_str(),"y")==0 ){
6348  inputPly >> vertices.at(row).z;
6349  }else if( strcmp(properties.at(i).c_str(),"z")==0 ){
6350  inputPly >> vertices.at(row).x;
6351  }else if( strcmp(properties.at(i).c_str(),"red")==0 ){
6352  inputPly >> colors.at(row).r;
6353  colors.at(row).r /= 255.f;
6354  }else if( strcmp(properties.at(i).c_str(),"green")==0 ){
6355  inputPly >> colors.at(row).g;
6356  colors.at(row).g /= 255.f;
6357  }else if( strcmp(properties.at(i).c_str(),"blue")==0 ){
6358  inputPly >> colors.at(row).b;
6359  colors.at(row).b /= 255.f;
6360  // }else if( strcmp(properties.at(i).c_str(),"alpha")==0 ){
6361  // inputPly >> colors.at(row).a;
6362  }else{
6363  inputPly >> line;
6364  }
6365  }
6366 
6367  }
6368 
6369  //determine bounding box
6370 
6371  vec3 boxmin = make_vec3(10000,10000,10000);
6372  vec3 boxmax = make_vec3(-10000,-10000,-10000);
6373 
6374  for( uint row=0; row<vertexCount; row++ ){
6375 
6376  if(vertices.at(row).x < boxmin.x ){
6377  boxmin.x = vertices.at(row).x;
6378  }
6379  if(vertices.at(row).y < boxmin.y ){
6380  boxmin.y = vertices.at(row).y;
6381  }
6382  if(vertices.at(row).z < boxmin.z ){
6383  boxmin.z = vertices.at(row).z;
6384  }
6385 
6386  if(vertices.at(row).x > boxmax.x ){
6387  boxmax.x = vertices.at(row).x;
6388  }
6389  if(vertices.at(row).y > boxmax.y ){
6390  boxmax.y = vertices.at(row).y;
6391  }
6392  if(vertices.at(row).z > boxmax.z ){
6393  boxmax.z = vertices.at(row).z;
6394  }
6395 
6396  }
6397 
6398  //center PLY object at `origin' and scale to have height `height'
6399  float scl = height/(boxmax.z-boxmin.z);
6400  for( uint row=0; row<vertexCount; row++ ){
6401  vertices.at(row).z -= boxmin.z;
6402 
6403  vertices.at(row).x *= scl;
6404  vertices.at(row).y *= scl;
6405  vertices.at(row).z *= scl;
6406 
6407  vertices.at(row) = rotatePoint(vertices.at(row),rotation) + origin;
6408  }
6409 
6410  //--- read faces ----//
6411 
6412  uint v, ID;
6413  std::vector<uint> UUID;
6414  for( uint row=0; row<faceCount; row++ ){
6415 
6416  inputPly >> v;
6417 
6418  faces.at(row).resize(v);
6419 
6420  for( uint i=0; i<v; i++ ){
6421  inputPly >> faces.at(row).at(i);
6422  }
6423 
6424  //Add triangles to context
6425 
6426  for( uint t=2; t<v; t++ ){
6427 
6428  RGBcolor color;
6429  if( ifColor ){
6430  color = colors.at(faces.at(row).front());
6431  }else{
6432  color = default_color;
6433  }
6434 
6435  vec3 v0 = vertices.at(faces.at(row).front());
6436  vec3 v1 = vertices.at(faces.at(row).at(t-1));
6437  vec3 v2 = vertices.at(faces.at(row).at(t));
6438 
6439  if( (v0-v1).magnitude()==0 || (v0-v2).magnitude()==0 || (v1-v2).magnitude()==0 ){
6440  continue;
6441  }
6442 
6443  ID = addTriangle( v0, v1, v2, color );
6444 
6445  UUID.push_back(ID);
6446 
6447  }
6448 
6449  }
6450 
6451  std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
6452 
6453  return UUID;
6454 
6455 }
6456 
6457 void Context::writePLY( const char* filename ) const{
6458 
6459  std::ofstream PLYfile;
6460  PLYfile.open(filename);
6461 
6462  PLYfile << "ply" << std::endl << "format ascii 1.0" << std::endl << "comment HELIOS generated" << std::endl;
6463 
6464  std::vector<int3> faces;
6465  std::vector<vec3> verts;
6466  std::vector<RGBcolor> colors;
6467 
6468  size_t vertex_count = 0;
6469 
6470  for( std::map<uint,Primitive*>::const_iterator iter = primitives.begin(); iter != primitives.end(); ++iter ){
6471 
6472  uint p = iter->first;
6473 
6474  std::vector<vec3> vertices = getPrimitivePointer(p)->getVertices();
6475  PrimitiveType type = getPrimitivePointer(p)->getType();
6476  RGBcolor C = getPrimitivePointer(p)->getColor();
6477  C.scale(255.f);
6478 
6479  if( type==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE ){
6480 
6481  faces.push_back( make_int3( vertex_count, vertex_count+1, vertex_count+2 ) );
6482  for( int i=0; i<3; i++ ){
6483  verts.push_back( vertices.at(i) );
6484  colors.push_back( C );
6485  vertex_count ++;
6486  }
6487 
6488  }else if( type==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH ){
6489 
6490  faces.push_back( make_int3( vertex_count, vertex_count+1, vertex_count+2 ) );
6491  faces.push_back( make_int3( vertex_count, vertex_count+2, vertex_count+3 ) );
6492  for( int i=0; i<4; i++ ){
6493  verts.push_back( vertices.at(i) );
6494  colors.push_back( C );
6495  vertex_count ++;
6496  }
6497 
6498  }
6499 
6500  }
6501 
6502  PLYfile << "element vertex " << verts.size() << std::endl;
6503  PLYfile << "property float x" << std::endl << "property float y" << std::endl << "property float z" << std::endl;
6504  PLYfile << "property uchar red" << std::endl << "property uchar green" << std::endl << "property uchar blue" << std::endl;
6505  PLYfile << "element face " << faces.size() << std::endl;
6506  PLYfile << "property list uchar int vertex_indices" << std::endl << "end_header" << std::endl;
6507 
6508  for( size_t v=0; v<verts.size(); v++ ){
6509  PLYfile << verts.at(v).x << " " << verts.at(v).y << " " << verts.at(v).z << " " << round(colors.at(v).r) << " " << round(colors.at(v).g) << " " << round(colors.at(v).b) << std::endl;
6510  }
6511 
6512  for( size_t f=0; f<faces.size(); f++ ){
6513  PLYfile << "3 " << faces.at(f).x << " " << faces.at(f).y << " " << faces.at(f).z << std::endl;
6514  }
6515 
6516  PLYfile.close();
6517 
6518 
6519 }
6520 
6521 std::vector<uint> Context::loadOBJ( const char* filename, const vec3 origin, const float height, const SphericalCoord rotation, const RGBcolor default_color ){
6522  return loadOBJ(filename,origin,height,rotation,default_color,"ZUP");
6523 }
6524 
6525 std::vector<uint> Context::loadOBJ( const char* filename, const vec3 origin, const float height, const SphericalCoord rotation, const RGBcolor default_color, const char* upaxis ){
6526 
6527  std::cout << "Reading OBJ file " << filename << "..." << std::flush;
6528 
6529  if( strcmp(upaxis,"XUP") && strcmp(upaxis,"YUP") && strcmp(upaxis,"ZUP") ){
6530  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadOBJ): Up axis of " << upaxis << " is not valid. Should be one of 'XUP', 'YUP', or 'ZUP'." << std::endl;
6531  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
6532  }
6533 
6534  std::string line, prop;
6535 
6536  std::vector<vec3> vertices;
6537  std::vector<vec2> texture_uv;
6538  std::map<std::string,std::vector<std::vector<int> > > face_inds, texture_inds;
6539  //std::vector<RGBcolor> colors;
6540 
6541  std::map<std::string,std::string> material_textures;
6542 
6543  std::vector<uint> UUID;
6544 
6545  std::ifstream inputOBJ, inputMTL;
6546  inputOBJ.open(filename);
6547 
6548  if (!inputOBJ.is_open()) {
6549  std::cerr << "Couldn't open " << filename << std::endl;;
6550  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
6551  }
6552 
6553  //determine the base file path for 'filename'
6554  std::string fstring = filename;
6555  std::string filebase;
6556  for( int i=fstring.size()-1; i>=0; i-- ){
6557  if( strncmp(&fstring[i],"/",1)==0 ){
6558  for( int ii=0; ii<=i; ii++ ){
6559  filebase.push_back(fstring.at(ii));
6560  }
6561  break;
6562  }
6563  }
6564 
6565  //determine bounding box
6566  float boxmin = 100000;
6567  float boxmax = -100000;
6568 
6569  std::string current_material = "none";
6570 
6571  while( inputOBJ.good() ){
6572 
6573  inputOBJ>>line;
6574 
6575  // ------- COMMENTS --------- //
6576  if( strcmp("#",line.c_str())==0 ){
6577  getline(inputOBJ, line);
6578 
6579  // ------- MATERIAL LIBRARY ------- //
6580  }else if( strcmp("mtllib",line.c_str())==0 ){
6581  getline(inputOBJ, line);
6582  std::string material_file = deblank(line.c_str());
6583  material_textures = loadMTL( filebase, material_file.c_str() );
6584 
6585  // ------- VERTICES --------- //
6586  }else if( strcmp("v",line.c_str())==0 ){
6587  getline(inputOBJ, line);
6588  //parse vertices into points
6589  vec3 verts(string2vec3(line.c_str()));
6590  vertices.push_back(verts);
6591 
6592  if(verts.z < boxmin ){
6593  boxmin = verts.z;
6594  }
6595  if(verts.z > boxmax ){
6596  boxmax = verts.z;
6597  }
6598 
6599  // ------- TEXTURE COORDINATES --------- //
6600  }else if( strcmp("vt",line.c_str())==0 ){
6601  getline(inputOBJ, line);
6602  //parse coordinates into uv
6603  vec2 uv(string2vec2(line.c_str()));
6604  texture_uv.push_back(uv);
6605 
6606  // ------- MATERIALS --------- //
6607  }else if( strcmp("usemtl",line.c_str())==0 ){
6608  getline(inputOBJ, line);
6609  current_material = line;
6610 
6611  // ------- FACES --------- //
6612  }else if( strcmp("f",line.c_str())==0 ){
6613  getline(inputOBJ, line);
6614  //parse face vertices
6615  std::istringstream stream(line);
6616  std::string tmp, digit;
6617  std::vector<int> f, u;
6618  while( stream.good() ){
6619 
6620  stream >> tmp;
6621 
6622  digit="";
6623  int ic = 0;
6624  for( int i=0; i<tmp.size(); i++ ){
6625  if( isdigit(tmp[i]) ){
6626  digit.push_back( tmp[i] );
6627  ic++;
6628  }else{
6629  break;
6630  }
6631  }
6632 
6633  f.push_back( atoi(digit.c_str()) );
6634 
6635  digit="";
6636  for( int i=ic+1; i<tmp.size(); i++ ){
6637  if( isdigit(tmp[i]) ){
6638  digit.push_back( tmp[i] );
6639  }else{
6640  break;
6641  }
6642  }
6643 
6644  u.push_back( atoi(digit.c_str()) );
6645 
6646  }
6647  face_inds[current_material].push_back(f);
6648  texture_inds[current_material].push_back(u);
6649 
6650  // ------ OTHER STUFF --------- //
6651  }else{
6652  getline(inputOBJ, line);
6653  }
6654  }
6655 
6656  float scl = height/(boxmax-boxmin);
6657 
6658  for(std::map<std::string,std::vector<std::vector<int> > >::const_iterator iter = face_inds.begin(); iter != face_inds.end(); ++iter){
6659 
6660  std::string current_material = iter->first;
6661  std::string texture;
6662  if( material_textures.find(current_material)!=material_textures.end() ){
6663  texture = material_textures.at(current_material);
6664  }
6665 
6666  for( size_t i=0; i<face_inds.at(current_material).size(); i++ ){
6667 
6668  for( uint t=2; t<face_inds.at(current_material).at(i).size(); t++ ){
6669 
6670  RGBcolor color = default_color;
6671 
6672  vec3 v0 = vertices.at(face_inds.at(current_material).at(i).at(0)-1);
6673  vec3 v1 = vertices.at(face_inds.at(current_material).at(i).at(t-1)-1);
6674  vec3 v2 = vertices.at(face_inds.at(current_material).at(i).at(t)-1);
6675 
6676  if( (v0-v1).magnitude()==0 || (v0-v2).magnitude()==0 || (v1-v2).magnitude()==0 ){
6677  continue;
6678  }
6679 
6680  if( strcmp(upaxis,"YUP")==0 ){
6681  v0 = rotatePointAboutLine(v0,make_vec3(0,0,0),make_vec3(1,0,0),0.5*M_PI);
6682  v1 = rotatePointAboutLine(v1,make_vec3(0,0,0),make_vec3(1,0,0),0.5*M_PI);
6683  v2 = rotatePointAboutLine(v2,make_vec3(0,0,0),make_vec3(1,0,0),0.5*M_PI);
6684  }
6685 
6686  v0 = rotatePoint(v0,rotation);
6687  v1 = rotatePoint(v1,rotation);
6688  v2 = rotatePoint(v2,rotation);
6689 
6690  uint ID;
6691  if( !texture.empty() && texture_inds.at(current_material).at(i).size()>0 ){//has texture
6692 
6693  if( t<texture_inds.at(current_material).at(i).size() ){
6694  int iuv0 = texture_inds.at(current_material).at(i).at(0)-1;
6695  int iuv1 = texture_inds.at(current_material).at(i).at(t-1)-1;
6696  int iuv2 = texture_inds.at(current_material).at(i).at(t)-1;
6697 
6698  ID = addTriangle( origin+v0*scl, origin+v1*scl, origin+v2*scl, texture.c_str(), texture_uv.at(iuv0), texture_uv.at(iuv1), texture_uv.at(iuv2) );
6699 
6700  vec3 normal = getPrimitivePointer(ID)->getNormal();
6701 
6702  }
6703  }else{
6704  ID = addTriangle( origin+v0*scl, origin+v1*scl, origin+v2*scl, color );
6705  }
6706 
6707  UUID.push_back(ID);
6708 
6709  }
6710  }
6711  }
6712 
6713  std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
6714 
6715  return UUID;
6716 
6717 }
6718 
6719 std::map<std::string, std::string> Context::loadMTL( std::string filebase, std::string material_file ){
6720 
6721  std::ifstream inputMTL;
6722 
6723  //first look for mtl file using path given in obj file
6724  inputMTL.open(material_file.c_str());
6725  if( !inputMTL.is_open() ){
6726  //if that doesn't work, try looking in the same directry where obj file is located
6727  material_file = filebase+material_file;
6728  material_file.erase( remove( material_file.begin(), material_file.end(), ' ' ), material_file.end() );
6729  for( int i=material_file.size()-1; i>=0; i-- ){
6730  if( strcmp(&material_file.at(i),"l")==0 ){
6731  break;
6732  }else{
6733  material_file.erase(material_file.begin()+i);
6734  }
6735  }
6736  if( material_file.empty() ){
6737  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadMTL): Material file does not have correct file extension (.mtl)." << std::endl;
6738  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
6739  }
6740  inputMTL.open( material_file.c_str() );
6741  if( !inputMTL.is_open() ){
6742  std::cerr << "ERROR (loadOBJ): Material file " << material_file << " given in .obj file cannot be found." << std::endl;
6743  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
6744  }
6745  }
6746 
6747  std::map<std::string, std::string> material_textures;
6748 
6749  std::string line;
6750 
6751  inputMTL>>line;
6752 
6753  while( inputMTL.good() ){
6754 
6755  if( strcmp("#",line.c_str())==0 ){ //comments
6756  getline(inputMTL, line);
6757  inputMTL>>line;
6758  }else if( strcmp("newmtl",line.c_str())==0 ){ //material library
6759  getline(inputMTL, line);
6760  std::string material_name = line;
6761  material_textures[material_name] = "";
6762 
6763  //std::cout << "Found a material library: " << material_name << std::endl;
6764 
6765  while( strcmp("newmtl",line.c_str())!=0 && inputMTL.good() ){
6766 
6767  if( strcmp("map_a",line.c_str())==0 ){
6768  getline(inputMTL, line);
6769  }else if( strcmp("map_Ka",line.c_str())==0 ){
6770  getline(inputMTL, line);
6771  }else if( strcmp("map_Kd",line.c_str())==0 ){
6772  getline(inputMTL, line);
6773 
6774  std::istringstream stream(line);
6775  std::string tmp;
6776  while( stream.good() ){
6777  stream >> tmp;
6778  int e = tmp.size();
6779  if( (strncmp(&tmp[e-1],"g",1)==0 && strncmp(&tmp[e-2],"n",1)==0 && strncmp(&tmp[e-3],"p",1)==0 ) || (strncmp(&tmp[e-1],"g",1)==0 && strncmp(&tmp[e-2],"p",1)==0 && strncmp(&tmp[e-3],"j",1)==0 ) || (strncmp(&tmp[e-1],"g",1)==0 && strncmp(&tmp[e-2],"e",1)==0 && strncmp(&tmp[e-3],"p",1)==0 && strncmp(&tmp[e-4],"j",1)==0 ) ){
6780 
6781  std::string texturefile = tmp;
6782  std::ifstream tfile;
6783 
6784  //first look for texture file using path given in mtl file
6785  tfile.open(texturefile.c_str());
6786  if( !tfile.is_open() ){
6787  //if that doesn't work, try looking in the same directry where obj file is located
6788  tfile.close();
6789  texturefile = filebase+texturefile;
6790  tfile.open( texturefile.c_str() );
6791  if( !tfile.is_open() ){
6792  std::cerr << "WARNING (loadOBJ): Texture file " << texturefile << " given in .mtl file cannot be found." << std::endl;
6793  }
6794  }
6795  tfile.close();
6796 
6797  material_textures[material_name] = texturefile;
6798  }
6799  }
6800 
6801  }else if( strcmp("map_Ks",line.c_str())==0 ){
6802  getline(inputMTL, line);
6803  }else{
6804  getline(inputMTL, line);
6805  }
6806 
6807  inputMTL>>line;
6808  }
6809 
6810  }else{
6811  getline(inputMTL, line);
6812  inputMTL>>line;
6813  }
6814  }
6815 
6816  return material_textures;
6817 
6818 }
6819 
6820 void Context::writeOBJ( const char* filename ) const{
6821 
6822  //To-Do list for OBJ writer
6823  // - image files need to be copied to the location where the .obj file is being written otherwise they won't be found.
6824  // - should parse "filename" to check that extension is .obj, and remove .obj extension when appending .mtl for material file.
6825  // - it is possible to get duplicate materials. Should have more sophisticated checking for that.
6826  // - it would make more sense to write patches and alphamasks as quads rather than two triangles
6827 
6828  std::cout << "Writing OBJ file " << filename << "..." << std::flush;
6829 
6830  std::ofstream file;
6831 
6832  file.open(filename);
6833 
6834  file << "# Helios generated OBJ File" << std::endl;
6835  file << "# baileylab.ucdavis.edu/software/helios" << std::endl;
6836  file << "mtllib " << filename << ".mtl" << std::endl;
6837 
6838  std::vector<int3> faces;
6839  std::vector<vec3> verts;
6840  std::vector<vec2> uv;
6841  std::vector<int3> uv_inds;
6842 
6843  std::vector<std::string> textures;
6844  std::vector<RGBcolor> colors;
6845 
6846  size_t vertex_count = 1; //OBJ files start indices at 1
6847  size_t uv_count = 1;
6848 
6849  for( std::map<uint,Primitive*>::const_iterator iter = primitives.begin(); iter != primitives.end(); ++iter ){
6850 
6851  uint p = iter->first;
6852 
6853  std::vector<vec3> vertices = getPrimitivePointer(p)->getVertices();
6854  PrimitiveType type = getPrimitivePointer(p)->getType();
6855  RGBcolor C = getPrimitivePointer(p)->getColor();
6856 
6857  if( type==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE ){
6858 
6859  faces.push_back( make_int3( vertex_count, vertex_count+1, vertex_count+2 ) );
6860  colors.push_back( C );
6861  for( int i=0; i<3; i++ ){
6862  verts.push_back( vertices.at(i) );
6863  vertex_count ++;
6864  }
6865 
6866  std::vector<vec2> uv_v = getTrianglePointer(p)->getTextureUV();
6867  if( getTrianglePointer(p)->hasTexture() ){
6868  uv_inds.push_back( make_int3(uv_count, uv_count+1, uv_count+2) );
6869  textures.push_back(getTrianglePointer(p)->getTextureFile());
6870  for( int i=0; i<3; i++ ){
6871  uv.push_back( uv_v.at(i) );
6872  uv_count ++;
6873  }
6874  }else{
6875  textures.push_back("");
6876  uv_inds.push_back( make_int3(-1,-1,-1) );
6877  }
6878 
6879  }else if( type==PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH ){
6880 
6881  faces.push_back( make_int3( vertex_count, vertex_count+1, vertex_count+2 ) );
6882  faces.push_back( make_int3( vertex_count, vertex_count+2, vertex_count+3 ) );
6883  colors.push_back( C );
6884  colors.push_back( C );
6885  for( int i=0; i<4; i++ ){
6886  verts.push_back( vertices.at(i) );
6887  vertex_count ++;
6888  }
6889 
6890  std::vector<vec2> uv_v;
6891  std::string texturefile;
6892  uv_v = getPatchPointer(p)->getTextureUV();
6893  texturefile = getPatchPointer(p)->getTextureFile();
6894 
6895  if( getPatchPointer(p)->hasTexture() ){
6896  textures.push_back(texturefile);
6897  textures.push_back(texturefile);
6898  uv_inds.push_back( make_int3(uv_count, uv_count+1, uv_count+2) );
6899  uv_inds.push_back( make_int3(uv_count, uv_count+2, uv_count+3) );
6900  if( uv_v.size()==0 ){//default (u,v)
6901  uv.push_back( make_vec2(0,1) );
6902  uv.push_back( make_vec2(1,1) );
6903  uv.push_back( make_vec2(1,0) );
6904  uv.push_back( make_vec2(0,0) );
6905  uv_count+=4;
6906  }else{//custom (u,v)
6907  for( int i=0; i<4; i++ ){
6908  uv.push_back( uv_v.at(i) );
6909  uv_count ++;
6910  }
6911  }
6912  }else{
6913  textures.push_back("");
6914  textures.push_back("");
6915  uv_inds.push_back( make_int3(-1,-1,-1) );
6916  uv_inds.push_back( make_int3(-1,-1,-1) );
6917  }
6918 
6919  }
6920 
6921  }
6922 
6923  assert( uv_inds.size()==faces.size() );
6924  assert( textures.size()==faces.size() );
6925  assert( colors.size()==faces.size() );
6926 
6927  for( size_t v=0; v<verts.size(); v++ ){
6928  file << "v " << verts.at(v).x << " " << verts.at(v).y << " " << verts.at(v).z << std::endl;
6929  }
6930 
6931  for( size_t v=0; v<uv.size(); v++ ){
6932  file << "vt " << uv.at(v).x << " " << uv.at(v).y << std::endl;
6933  }
6934 
6935  std::string current_texture = "";
6936  int material_count = 1;
6937 
6938  for( size_t f=0; f<faces.size(); f++ ){
6939 
6940  if( current_texture.compare(textures.at(f))!=0 ){
6941  current_texture = textures.at(f);
6942  file << "usemtl material" << material_count << std::endl;
6943  material_count ++;
6944  }
6945 
6946  //assert( faces.at(f).x <= verts.size() && faces.at(f).y <= verts.size() && faces.at(f).z <= verts.size() );
6947  if( uv_inds.at(f).x<0 ){
6948  file << "f " << faces.at(f).x << " " << faces.at(f).y << " " << faces.at(f).z << std::endl;
6949  }else{
6950  //assert( uv_inds.at(f).x <= uv.size() && uv_inds.at(f).y <= uv.size() && uv_inds.at(f).z <= uv.size() );
6951  file << "f " << faces.at(f).x << "/" << uv_inds.at(f).x << " " << faces.at(f).y << "/" << uv_inds.at(f).y << " " << faces.at(f).z << "/" << uv_inds.at(f).z << std::endl;
6952  }
6953  }
6954 
6955 
6956  file.close();
6957 
6958  char mtlfilename[50];
6959  sprintf(mtlfilename,"%s.mtl",filename);
6960  file.open(mtlfilename);
6961 
6962  current_texture = "";
6963  material_count = 1;
6964  RGBcolor current_color = make_RGBcolor(0.010203,0.349302,0.8372910);
6965 
6966  for( size_t f=0; f<faces.size(); f++ ){
6967 
6968  if( textures.at(f).compare("")!=0 ){ //has texture
6969  if( current_texture.compare(textures.at(f))!=0 ){ //new texture
6970  current_texture = textures.at(f);
6971  file << "newmtl material" << material_count << std::endl;
6972  file << "Ka 1.0 1.0 1.0" << std::endl;
6973  file << "Kd 1.0 1.0 1.0" << std::endl;
6974  file << "Ks 0.0 0.0 0.0" << std::endl;
6975  file << "illum 2 " << std::endl;
6976  file << "map_Ka " << current_texture << std::endl;
6977  file << "map_Kd " << current_texture << std::endl;
6978  file << "map_d " << current_texture << std::endl;
6979 
6980  material_count ++;
6981  }
6982  }else{ //does not have texture
6983  if( current_color.r!=colors.at(f).r && current_color.g!=colors.at(f).g && current_color.b!=colors.at(f).b ){ //new color
6984  current_texture = textures.at(f);
6985  current_color = colors.at(f);
6986  file << "newmtl material" << material_count << std::endl;
6987  file << "Ka " << current_color.r << " " << current_color.g << " " << current_color.b << std::endl;
6988  file << "Kd " << current_color.r << " " << current_color.g << " " << current_color.b << std::endl;
6989  file << "Ks 0.0 0.0 0.0" << std::endl;
6990  file << "illum 2 " << std::endl;
6991 
6992  material_count ++;
6993  }
6994  }
6995 
6996  }
6997 
6998  file.close();
6999 
7000 
7001  std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
7002 
7003 }
7004 
7005 Context::~Context(){
7006 
7007  for( std::map<uint,Primitive*>::iterator iter = primitives.begin(); iter != primitives.end(); ++iter ){
7008  Primitive* prim = getPrimitivePointer(iter->first);
7009  delete prim;
7010  }
7011 
7012 }
helios::PRIMITIVE_TYPE_VOXEL
Rectangular prism primitive.
Definition: Context.h:39
helios::Primitive::getPrimitiveData
void getPrimitiveData(const char *label, int &data) const
Get data associated with a primitive element (integer scalar)
Definition: Context.cpp:1548
helios::Patch::getSize
helios::vec2 getSize(void) const
Get the size of the Patch in x- and y-directions.
Definition: Context.cpp:3087
helios::makeIdentityMatrix
void makeIdentityMatrix(float(&T)[16])
Construct an identity matrix.
Definition: global.cpp:446
helios
Definition: Context.h:28
helios::Primitive::getVertices
virtual std::vector< helios::vec3 > getVertices(void) const =0
Function to return the (x,y,z) coordinates of the vertices of a Primitve.
helios::Context::getLoadedXMLFiles
